1b1(mdo): 1// rgya gar skad du/ sar+ya me'i tre ya bya ka ra na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa lung
1b2(mdo): bstand pa/ 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sde dpon khyab bdag dpal// shes rab chen po sha
1b3(mdo): ri'i bus / 'jig rten rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// stond pa la ni yongs zhus pa// sngon dang phyi mo'i mdo' las ni//
1b4(mdo): ma 'ongs pa'i sa sa rgyas gang // 'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa po// byams pa zhes bya bstand
1b5(mdo): pa de// 'dre nadapa bdag ni de mthu' dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni don thams cad// rgyal la rab tu nyan
1b6(mdo): 'tshal na// de ni myi mchog bdag la gsungs// de la stond pas bka' stsal dpa// sangs rgyas byams pa myi mchog de'i
1b7(mdo): 'byor da pa rgyas pa khyod la ngas// lung bstand bya yis pa las nyon// de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i ni// khor yug tu ni dpag tshad
1b8(mdo): brgya// skam par gyur da te de yang ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam bzangs yin// de tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yang //
2a1(mdo): chu zheng ba gru mnyam par yang // dpag tshad stong phrag bcu paste// 'thung po kun gyi gnas su 'gyur// de'i chen yul gyi myi// dar cing 'byor dal chags pa myed// 'tshe myed myini de dag kyang /
2a2(mdo): dge ba byed pa dag tu 'gyur// sa gzhi tsher ma myed pa dang // mnyen zhing ne'u sing sngo dang ldan// 'phar zhing nems zhes byed pa ste// shing bal 'dab ma bzhin du 'jam// mngar zhing dri ni zhim pa yi// sa lA ma rmongs par skye'o//
2a3(mdo): sna tshogs tshon gyis mdzes byas pa'i// gos kyi ljon shing 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can de dag skyon myed cing // nyes bral spro ba che dang ldan// lus che kha dog ldan pa ste// chen po che'i stobs dang ldan// nad ni gsum zhog
2a4(mdo): 'byung 'gyur te// 'dod dang myi za dga' ba'o// bu mo 'o da ni lnga brgya dag/ lon nas khyol bag mar 'gro// de tshe tog ldan zhes bya ba'i// rgyal po/ dapho brang 'byung 'gyur te// sreg chags dge ba'i las byed pa/
2a5(mdo): sems can rnams kyi gnas yin no// chur ni dang / ga tshad bcu gnyis te// rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun yod pa// bsod nams byas pa rnam ga gis// grong khyer yid 'ong 'byung bar 'gyur// rin chen bdun
2a6(mdo): las byas mtho ba'i// ra ba 'phang du rgyang grags tsam// shing thags dang ni sgo rnams gang // rin chen sna tshogs dag gis brgyan// rin cen so phag gis rtsigs shing // pad ma ad pal gsal du bkram// dur
2a7(mdo): bas mdzes par byas pa'i// 'obs kyang 'byung ba 'khor nas 'gyur// 'khor yug tu ni ta la'i// phreng ba bdun gyis yongs su bskor// dril bu'i dra ba mdzes byas pa'i// rin chen ba ni rgyu'i tal dag/ rlung bskyod ta la de dag las/
2a8(mdo): snyan pa'i sgra ni 'di ltar dper// sil snyan yan lag lnga ldan bzhin// de las yid 'ong sgra bsgrags 'gyur// myi rnams gang dag grong khyer der// rtse dga' bde don gnyer ba rnams// de dag ta la'i sgra de'is// rab tu mgu zhing rtse
2b1(mdo): bar byed// ud pa la ku mu tas gang ba'i// rdzing bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// grong de skyed mos tshal dang ni// nas nags tshal phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// der ni dung zhes bya ba'i// rgyal po'i gzi brjid che ldan zhing // stobs
2b2(mdo): tshe gling bzhi dbang phyug la// mnga' bdag 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung // dpung gi yan lag bzhi 'byord cing // rin chen bdun dang yang dag ldan// rgyal po de'i sras rnams ni// stong du chang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// myi
2b3(mdo): dbang po de yang ni// sa 'di rgya mtsho mthas klag par// chags pa myed cing chos dang ni// mthun par yongs su skyong bar 'gyur// de tshe dung zhes bya ba'i// sa bdag rgyal po de la ni// rin chen khrag khrig brgyas mtshon
2b4(mdo): pa'i// gter chen bzhini 'byung bar 'gyur/ su'i mtshan na ser skya ste// bcom nAg na ni dkar po yin// sa 'dzin ni e la'i ba ga/ bar na ser grong khyer drung // gter ni bzhi po khon dang /
2b5(mdo): rgyal po yang dag ldan par ni// 'byung 'gyur dpa' po chen po de// bsod nams brgya'i stobs las skyes// de tshe rgyal po'i de'i mdun na 'don// bram ze tshangs rab ces bya ba// thog mar rig byed
2b6(mdo): bzhi 'don pa'i// mkhan po zhig ni 'byung bar 'gyur// 'don du 'jug dang gsang sngags 'dzind// dran ldan rig byed gzhung 'grel dang // sgra nges sbyor bcas pha rol phyind// rnga sprod pa dang tshig dang ldan// de tshe/
2b7(mdo): de'i chung ma ni// tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba ste// mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang // bzugs bzang grags dang ldan pa 'byung // byams pa gang zag mchog gyur pa// dag ldan gnas nas shi 'phos nas// de tshe de'i lhums su ni/
2b8(mdo): nges par nyin mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur// gzi brjid chen po zla ba bcu// tshang bar ldum su zhug nA kyang // byis pa'i yun skyed mo chal// me tog bzang rgyas nang gsheg te// chos spyod ma de myi 'dug cing // myinyal 'greng bzhin dag tu ni// shing gyi yal ga la bzung na
3a1(mdo): shing gi yal ka la bzung nas// byams pa bltam pa nyid du 'gyur// myi'i mchog tu gyurd pa de'i// glo g.yas nas ni 'byung 'gyur te// dper na smin gyi phung po nas/
3a2(mdo): nyi ma 'byung ba bzhin du gsal// ji ltar chu'i pad ma bzhin// mngal gyi 'das kyis myo gos so// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad du// 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs par 'gyur// de nas
3a3(mdo): brgya byin lha dbang po// bde'i bstsogs yang bdag dag gyur da nas// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur da pa// bltam po'i chen len par 'gyur// de tshe bltam ma thag tu yang // gom pa bdun dag
3a4(mdo): 'dor bar 'gyur// gom pa re re gter dang ni// pad dam re re 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bzhi dag tu gzigs na sa ni// bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni// 'di yin yang srid yod
3a5(mdo): ma yin// yang dang yang du phyir mye 'ong // zag myedamya ngan 'das 'gro zhes// gsung yang rab tu bka' stsal/ da to// klu rnams kyis ni chu'i rgyun// bsil dang 'jam pas
3a6(mdo): sku bsil 'gyur// nam mkha'i ngos nas lha rdzas kyi/ gos dang me tog 'bab par 'gyur// de'i dbu la gdug dkar // lha rnams kyis ni 'dzind par 'gyur// mtshan mchog sum bcu
3a7(mdo): pha gnyis mnga'// byams pa dpal gyis 'bar ba de// ma mas yang dag blangs nas su// yum gyi phyag tu 'bum par 'gyur// rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i// khyogs ni yid du 'ong ba
3a8(mdo): la// sras dang bcas par bzhugs gsol nas// lha rnams kyis ni khyer bar 'gyur// sil snyan stong phrag du ma dag// sgra 'byind 'khrol ba'i grong khyer der// byams pa gshegs pa tsam gyis
3a9(mdo): ni// me tog char pa 'bab par 'gyur// de'i nyin par sbrum ma'i// bud myed rnams kyang btsa' 'gyur te// de dag thams cad nyams bde zhing // bde legs su ni btsa' bar 'gyur// tshangs
3b1(mdo): rab mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis// ldan pa'i sras de mthong nas ni// gsang sngags dag la rab brtags nas// de'i 'og tu dga' bar 'gyur// ji ltar sngags las 'byung ba bzhin// gzho
3b2(mdo): nu'i 'gro ba gnyis yin te// myi dbang 'khor los sgyur ba 'am// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyurd pa// dpal de nachod rdzogs nas ni// skye dgu 'di ni
3b3(mdo): sdug bsngal snyam// chos kyi bdag nyid dgongs par mdzad// dbyangs che tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan// 'od che gser gyi mdog dang ldan// stod phel che zhing thal gong rgyas// pad mo'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i
3b4(mdo): s+yan// de'i sku'i khrun du ni// khru ni brgyad bcu dag tu 'gyur// zheng ni khru rnams nyi shu ste// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor de'i phyed// byams pa de ni bram ze'i bu// stong phrag bzhi po dag dang ni// brgyad nus
3b5(mdo): mdun du bdar nas ni// gsang sngags dag kyang 'dod da tu 'jug/ de nas rgyal po chen po dung // sboms su 'a dom ni drug bcu bzhi// 'phang du 'dom ni stong yod pa'i//
3b6(mdo): mchod sdong zhig ni 'dzugs par 'gyur// myi dbang de'imachod sdod de// rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i// ma chod sbyin gyis ni mdun drangs te// bram ze dag la rab tu 'bul//
3b7(mdo): mchod sdong yid 'ong rin chen rgyun// de ni phul ma thag tu yang // bram ze stong po rnams kyis ni// de'i mod la bkod par 'gyur// byams pa mchod sdong de yi ni// myi rtag nyid de mthong nas kyang // 'jo/
3b8(mdo): ba'i mtha' dag rnam bsams te// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir bdag rab tu byung nas ni// bdud rtsi'i ko 'phang reg 'gyur dang // skye bo 'chi bdag na rga ba'i// 'jigs las krol bar
3b9(mdo): 'gyur snyam zhing // byams pa gang zag mchog gyur da te// stong phrag bzhi po dag dang ni// brgyad cu dag gis mdun bdar nas// rab tu 'byung bar nges 'byung 'gyur// de'i tshe ba dan gyi byang chub shing //
4a1(mdo): klu shing zhes bya 'byung 'gyur te// de'i sal ga gnas 'phang du// dpag tshad tsam cu yang dag 'phags// de rje byang chub shing de'i// yal ga 'grel pa thams cad du// kho ra 'or sug rgyang grags
4a2(mdo): druka/ khyebs pa kho na dag tu 'gyur// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur da pa// de'i drung tu bzhugs nas su// bla myed byang chub zhi ba ni// 'thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom myed// gang gi nub mo kho na la// rab
4a3(mdo): tu 'byung bar mngon 'byung ba// de'i nub mo kho na la// byang chub dam pa thob par 'gyur// de'i 'og tu thub mchog de// dam chos sdug bsngal kun spong zhing // zhi ba yan lag brgyad pa'i// gsung gis stond
4a4(mdo): pa mdzad par 'gyur// skye bo rab dag gzigs nas ni// sku ka bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa yi// bden pa
4a5(mdo): dag kyang stond par 'gyur// de'i chos de thos nas kyang // bstan nyed pa la ni nan tan sgrub// me tog mdzes pas rgyas pa'i// skyed mos tshal du de'i 'khor// dpag tshad rgya khyon gang ba dag/
4a6(mdo): yang dag 'du ba kho nar 'gyur// de nas myi dbang rgyal po'i drung // grags pa chen po thos nas ni// sbyin ba grangs myed byas nas kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur// rgyal po stong phrag bzhi dang na
4a7(mdo): brgyad cu dag gis mdun bdar te/ khyim nas nges par byung nas ni// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// byams pa'i yab kyang de bzhin du// de'i tshad dang mnyam pa'i// bram ze rnams kyis mdun ba dar nas// rab
4a8(mdo): tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de na de tshe khyim bdag ni// nor bzangs shes ni rnam grags pa// chos kyi bdag nyid stong dag gis// bskor nas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// dung gi bud myed rin po che// sa
4a9(mdo): ka zhes ni rnam grags pa// bud myed stong phrag bzhi dang ni// brgyad nu dag gis mdun bdar te// de'i 'og tu mngon byung nas// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de'i tshe na byams pa'i// bstand pas ni
4b1(mdo): srog chags dag/ stong phrag dang ni brgya phrag rnams// rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de'i 'og tu thugs rjecan// ston pa byams pa gang gnyis mchog/ 'khor ma rnam par gzigs nas ni// shag kya
4b2(mdo): ser ge thub pa ste// gtsobo skyob par mdzad pa 'o// dam pa'i chos dbyings gzigs gyur dpa// 'jig rten mgon pos 'di dag kus// ba rang pa'i las ni bskyed das kyang // ron kyis nga'i bstan la btang // gdugs
4b3(mdo): dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang // dri dang 'phreng ba byug pa dang // rol mo sba snyan bsgrags pa yis// shag kya thub pa mchod nas ni// pa yi bstan la sngags pa yin// kur gus chu yis kladab pa dang // can dan
4b4(mdo): gyi ni byug pa yis// shaka kya thub pa'i mchod rten la// mchod nas pa yi bstan la lhags// de tshe sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun la yang skyabs song zhing // dge ba'i las kyang byas
4b5(mdo): nas ni// nga'i bstan la lhags pa yin// shag kya seng ge'i/ bstand pa la// bslab gzhi yang dag blangs nas su// ji ltar gsungs bzhin bsgrubs nas ni// pa yi bstand la lhags
4b6(mdo): pa yin// dge 'dun la yang chos gos dang // zhal zas dang ni btung ba dang // snyun gsos sna tshogs sbyin pa rnams// phu la nas nga'i bstan la lhags// bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang //
4b7(mdo): de bzhin zla kacig tshes brgyad dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla ba ya// yan lag brgyad legs mnyam bzhag cing // bsnyen gnas gso sbyong byas nas ni// pa yi bstan la lhags so zhes// don 'di rab tu gsu
4b8(mdo): bar 'gyur// de'i nyan thos rnams kyang ni// cho 'phrul gsum gyis 'dul bar 'gyur// de tshe de dag thams cad ni// zag zad 'grogs na bde bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa dang po ni// nyon mongs sred pa/
4b9(mdo): bcad gyur da pa// dung phyur phrag dgu bye phrag drug/ tshang ba'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni// nyan thos 'ching ba las grol ba// dung phyur phrag dgu bye phrag bzhi// tshang ba'i nyan
5a1(mdo): thos 'byung bar 'gyur// de'i 'dus pa gsum pa ni// sems zhi rnam par grol gyur dpa// rlung phyur phrag dgu bye phrag gnyis// tshang ba'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor so ra
5a2(mdo): bskor nas// lha dang myi rnams rnam btul te// nyan thos dge 'dun thabs gcig tu// grong du bsnyoms spyod la rgyu// de nas tog ldan dga' ldan lha'i// grong khyer der ni gshegs pa na// grong khyer mchog tu
5a3(mdo): man ta ra'i// me tog char chen 'bab par 'gyur// thub pa grong khyer gshegs pa na// lha'i me tog 'thor bar 'gyur// rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang // brgya byin sum bcu cha gsum dbang // tshangs pa lha
5a4(mdo): tshogs thabs gcig tu// de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// lha'i bu ni mthu chen gyis// ud pa la pad ma ku mu ta/ pad ma dkar po dA zhim dang // o ka ru dang tsan dan dang // de
5a5(mdo): bzhin lha rdzas 'phreng ba dang // lha rdzas gos kyang 'thor bar/ 'gyur// 'jig rten 'gon de grong khyer gyi// mchog tu/ gshegs pa mthong nas ni/ shing be la 'dab ltar 'jam pa
5a6(mdo): yi// sa der gding ba rgya chen 'dings// de dag lam kar phreng ba ni// sna tshogs dag ni rnam par 'grems// lha'i bu ni mthu chen dang // myi rnams yid ni rab dang ba// gdugs dang
5a7(mdo): rgyal mtshar ba dan dang // spos dang phreng ba byug pa dang // rol mo sgra snyan bsgrags pa yis// stond pa la ni mchod par 'gyur// brgya byin myig stong lha rnams kyis// rgyal po bde bsdogs bdag
5a8(mdo): po re/ rab mgu thal mo sbyar nas ni// 'jig rten mgon la bstod par byed// skyes bu cang zhes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zag mchog gyur da bcom
5a9(mdo): ldan 'das// skye dku kun la thugs brtser mdzod// de'i tshe na lho'i bu// mthu chen bdud ces bya ba 'byung // de yang thal mo rab sbyar nas// 'jig rten mgon la bstod par byed// tshangs
5b1(mdo): pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor da cing // tshangs pas kyang ni mdun bdar te// tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni bsgrogs bzhin du// dam pa'i chos ni gsung bar 'gyur// zag zad nyes pa rnam bral zhing
5b2(mdo): srid pa'i bcing ba rab spangs pa'i// dgra bcom rnams kyis sa 'di ni// thams cad kun tu gang bar 'gyur// skra dang myi dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin dang ni srin po klu// mthu chen rnams ni mgu gyur
5b3(mdo): nas// ston la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// gang dag byams pa'i bstan pa la// tshangs par spyad pa spyod 'gyur ba// de dag gdon myi za bar ni// nyon mongs myed cing the tsom chod// gang dag byams
5b4(mdo): pa'i bstan pa la// tshangs par spyad par spyod 'gyur ba// de dag gdon myi za bar ni// srid pa'i dra ba bcad pa dang // bsam gtan rdzogs par byas nas ni// dga' dang bde dang yang dag ldan// 'byung
5b5(mdo): po kun la thugs pa che ba// byams pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi/ mchog/ lo ni drug khri'i bar du yang // dam pa'i chos ni stond par 'gyur// de ni srog chags brgya stong dang // 'bum
5b6(mdo): phrag rnam par 'dren pa ste// dam pa'i chos la btul nas su de nas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// thub pa chen po byams pa de// yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang // de tshe de'i dam chos
5b7(mdo): ni// lo khri dag tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal bshag kya thub de la// sems ni rab tu dang bar gyis// de nas byams pa rkang gnyis mchog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de phyir sang
5b8(mdo): rgyus chos dag dang // dge 'dun tshogs kyi mchog bcas la// sems ni rab tu dang gyis dang // don chen rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// thugs rje che ldan de lta bu// byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa
5b9(mdo): de tshe mnyes par byas nas ni// de nas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// ya mtshan 'di dag zos gyurd cing // 'byor da pa myi nyung mthong nas ni// nag po'i ris kyang dang 'gyur nas// mazhes pa su zhig dang
6a1(mdo): myi 'gyur// de phyir 'di dag bdag nyid che// 'dod cing bdag la legs 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bstan da pa dran bzhin du// dran pa'i chos la gus par bya// 'phags pa byams pa
6a2(mdo): lung bstand pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya su khA pa taM byA ha na ma ma ha yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes
6a3(mdo): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan tu yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal
6a4(mdo): byed kyi tshal mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po gnas brtan nyan thos chen po dgra bcom pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan sha
6a5(mdo): ri'i bu dang / me'u dkal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / ka byi na chen po dang / gsus po che dang / nam gru dang / lam bstan blun po dang / dga' bo dang / kun
6a6(mdo): dka' bo dang / dgra ga can zin dang / ba lang bdag dang / ba ra dA dza dang / 'char byed nag po dang / ba ku la dang / ma 'gags pa da pa/ de dag dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / byang chub
6a7(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'pham pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang
6a8(mdo): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson pa myi 'dor dang / de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan mang po
6a9(mdo): dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mye mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / de dag dang swa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po gzhan dag dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
6b1(mdo): dang ldan pag ri'i bus bka' bcwal pa/ sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan zhes bya ba
6b2(mdo): zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpaklu myed ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond to// sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems// 'jig
6b3(mdo): rten gyi khams de ci'i phyir bde ba can zhes bya zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nasems can rnams kyi lus la sdug bsngal myed/ sems la sdug bsngal myed cing bde ba'i rgyu tshad myed pa yod de/
6b4(mdo): de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya'o// sha ri'i bugazhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ 'khyer rim pa dun dang / shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun dang / dril bu g.yen
6b5(mdo): ka'i dra ba rnams kyis kun nas yongs su bskor pa/ bkra ba/ ldan sdug pa'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ ri na po che sna bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya
6b6(mdo): dang / shel dang / rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzha na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ rin po che sna bdun
6b7(mdo): kyi rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su kang ba/ rin po che'i pad mas khebs pa/ bya rog gis btung du rung bar kha da chad du gyur da pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdas pa dag yod de/ rdzib de dag gi phyogs
6b8(mdo): bzhi kun nas/ them smras bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shes dang / rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa bzhi bzhi yod de/ rdzing de dag gi 'gram na rin po che'i shing ljon pa
6b9(mdo): rin po che sna bdun la 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel dang / mu tika dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang / s+phug gi shing bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa dag skyes so// rdzing de dag kun
7a1(mdo): nas pad ma skyes pa 'di lta ste/ gser/ gser gyi kha dog/ gser gyi 'od 'byung ba/ gser lta bur stond pa/ sngon po kha dog sngon po// rdo sngon po 'byung ba/ sngon po lta bur ston pa
7a2(mdo): ser po dang / kha dog ser po/ 'od ser po 'byung ba/ ser po lta bur stond pa/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ 'od dmar po 'byung ba/ dmar po lta bur ston pa/ dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ 'od dkar po
7a3(mdo): 'byung ba/ dkar po lta bur stond pa/ bkra ba/ kha rog bkra ba/ 'od bkra ba 'byung ba/ bkra ba lta bur ston pa/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag skyes so// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs
7a4(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis leg/ sa par brgyan pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can/ lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra rtag tu 'byung ngo // sa chen
7a5(mdo): po ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu ste/ nyams dga' ba'o// ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ rnam pa de lta bu dag gise legs par brgyan
7a6(mdo): ba'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba'i lho'i me tog gi char 'bab bo// der sems can gang dag
7a7(mdo): skyes pa de dag kyang snga dro gcig bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du dong ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang me tog skor bu bye ba phrag
7a8(mdo): 'bum mngon par 'thor te/ gtor nas nyin mo gnas pa'i phyir/ slar 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du dong ngo // sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam
7a9(mdo): pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyand pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ma bya dag yod do/ de dag kyang nyin lan gsum
7b1(mdo): mtshan lan gsum 'dus nas/ glu dbyangs len te/ rang rang gi skad kyis smra'o// de dag smra ba na dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dag 'byung ngo // sems can gang dag der skyes pa
7b2(mdo): de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ sangs rgyas yid la byed pa skye/ chos yid la byed pa skye/ dge 'dun yid la byed pa skye'o// sha ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
7b3(mdo): gyur da pa yin snyam du sems pa lta na/ de ltar myi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ seMs can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i mying
7b4(mdo): yang myed do// bya'i tshogs de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed de nyid kyis chos kyi sgra 'byung ba'i phyir sprus pa dag go// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
7b5(mdo): rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i shing ta la'i 'phreng ba derag dang / dril bu er ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis phog cing / rlung
7b6(mdo): gis bskyod na sgra snyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba nyams dga' ba dga' byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rol mo mkhan gyis ya na laka bye ba 'bum dang ldan pA sti'i sa'i snyan blangs pa bzhin no//
7b7(mdo): der myi dag dag gis sgra de dag thos nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa lus la gnaso// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
7b8(mdo): bkod pa'i rgyan rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o// shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de tshe dpag myed ces bya zhe na/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed de'i
7b9(mdo): tshe'i tshad dpag tu myed de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed ces bya'o// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od dpag myed ces bya zhe na/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
8a1(mdo): myed de'i 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa myed de/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de 'od dpag myed ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed de/ bla na myed
8a2(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa bcu lon no// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das/ de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dag pa/ dgra bcom pasha stag tshad myed
8a3(mdo): de/ de dag gi tshad brjod par sla ba ma yin no// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can dag ni phyir myi ldog pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag pa sha stag go//
8a4(mdo): sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi tshad ni brjod par sla ba ma yi na te/ gzhan du na tshad myed/ grangs myed ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
8a5(mdo): tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu dag gis legs par brgyan pa'o// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gus
8a6(mdo): par yongs su sngo bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag dang phrad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sha ri'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam gyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das de
8a7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed de'i zhing du skye bar myi 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed de'i mtshan thos la/ thos nas kyang
8a8(mdo): yid la byed cing / nub gcig gam/ nub gnyis sam/ nub gsum 'am/ nub bzhi 'am/ nub lnga 'am/ nub drug gam/ nub bdun du/ g.yeng ba myed pa'i sems kyis yid la byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
8a9(mdo): kyi bu mo de 'chi bo'i dus kyi tshe/ phyin ci log myed pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub
8b1(mdo): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun kyis bltas pa'i mdud na bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed de'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i
8b2(mdo): bu de bas na don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gus par smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes de skad bshad do// sha ri'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas da ltar yongs
8b3(mdo): su brjod pa de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po zhes bya
8b4(mdo): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lhun por sdang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam sgra zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs zhes bya ba dang /
8b5(mdo): de dag la stsogs pa shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sdug/ sa kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam
8b6(mdo): kyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// de bzhin du lho phyogs na de bzhin
8b7(mdo): gshegs pa nyi zla'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro'i phung po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
8b8(mdo): pa lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yA tre bya ba dang / de dag la sosogs pa lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi
8b9(mdo): zhing rnams sngags kyi dbang pos khebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis/
9a1(mdo): shig ces gsung bamadzad do// de bzhin du nul phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag myed ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa phung po dpag myed ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan
9a2(mdo): dpag myed ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ce na zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog chen po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
9a3(mdo): gzer dag pa zhes bya ba dang / de dag la gtsogs pa nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos phyebs par mdzad de/ khyed
9a4(mdo): cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// de bzhin du byang
9a5(mdo): phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro 'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sgrol ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba da/ da de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu thul dka' zhes bya ba dang /
9a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma 'byung zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba dang / de dag las mtshogs pa byang phyogs
9a7(mdo): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang pos khyebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa
9a8(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge zhes bya ba dang /
9a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grags 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos shes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin ces bya ba dang / de bzhin
9b1(mdo): gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba dang / de dag la yochags pa 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ka' klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ rang rang gi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ljags kyi dbang
9b2(mdo): pos khebs par mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi nam grangs 'dis med ches par gyis shig ces gsung
9b3(mdo): ba mdzad do// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog ces bya ba dang
9b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa spos 'od ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi phung po ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog shi nad tu rgyas pa'i rigs zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i
9b5(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen/ ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mtho/ nga ba don yod ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ri ra ba lta bu
9b6(mdo): zhes bya ba dang / de dag las stsogs pa steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ 8rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sngags kyi dbang pos khyebs pa
9b7(mdo): mdzad de/ khyed cag yon tan bsam gis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yid ches par gyis shig ces gsung ba mdzad do// sha ri'i bu
9b8(mdo): 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba zhes bya zhe na/ sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / sangs
9b9(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan thos par gyur pa dang / thos pa dang / zos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu seMs
10a1(mdo): can gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi 'ams bde ba cad du sems kyis smon par byed pa 'am/ byas pa 'am byed par 'gyur ba
10a2(mdo): de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog go/ phyir ma log go// phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu ji ltar ngad ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yon
10a3(mdo): tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod pa de bzhin du/ sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / nga'i yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su brjod do// sha ri'i bus gsol pa
10a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa shag kya'i rgyal pos bskal pa'i snyi gas ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs ma dang / tshe'i snyigs ma'i tshe/ 'jig
10a5(mdo): rten gyi khams myi mjed du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya// nga chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ 'jig rten tha/ mas cad dang myi 'thun pa'i chos bstand pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/
10a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yaN+Dal pa/ sha ri'i bu snyigs ma lnga 'i tshe/ 'jig rten du ngas gang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
10a7(mdo): par sangs rgyas te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang myi 'thun pa'i chos bstand pa de ni mchog tu dka' ba byed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHla nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / nyan thos
10a8(mdo): chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
10a9(mdo): pa bde ba can gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo'o/ rdzogs s+ho// @/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra dA dza pa rin ma na// bod skad du/ 'phags
10b1(mdo): pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu dang kyi rgyu'i 'jig rten spa sra du// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang da ltar gyi// rang byung
10b2(mdo): thub dbang thugs rje ldan rnams la// bdag gis bdag kun btud de phyag bgyi'o// chags pa dang ni zhe sdang gti mug gis// bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam ngar sdig pa ni bsags pa/
10b3(mdo): 'azhi pa de kun so sor bshags par 'gyi// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsod nams mdzod gang dang // byang chub sems dpa' las byung bsod nams dang // kang yang nyan pos rkyen gyi theg chen dang // 'jig rten bsod nams
10b4(mdo): de la yang yi rang ngo // byang chub snying por thog mar gang sangs rgyas// pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// sangs rgyas zla myed mtha' yas de dag la// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul/
10b5(mdo): phung po ma lus mya ngan 'das dbyings su// gshegs par gang bzhed myi dang lha'i lha// mgon de dag la 'jig rten sman sla/ pad+ma// bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku dodan mdzad par gsol/
10b6(mdo): phyag 'tshal ba dang bshags pa'i bsod nams dang // bskul ba dang ni gsol ba gdab pa dang // de bzhin yi rang bsod nams ci mchis te// byang chub dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag
10b7(mdo): nibasod nams bsags pa 'dis rtag tu// byang chub sems ni brjed par ma gyur da cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyurd cing // myi khom gnod
10b8(mdo): pa brgyad ni spong bar shog/ bzod dang ldan zhing mtshan kyis lus brgyan pa'o// rtag tu skye dran sems ni gyi mongs dang // rab des pha ros phyin la brtson gyur da cig/ dbang phyug myi rje chos kyi dbang phyug dang /
10b9(mdo): yon tan 'byung gnas nyid ni 'gyur myed shog/ g.yog 'khor mang po mthun par ldan pa dang // bsam pa mthun zhing rgya che dag gyur da cig/ bsod nams myi zad nam dag blo ldan dang // cho ga yon tan dag la
11a1(mdo): dga' bar shog/ bsam gtan mngon zhes so so yang dag rig/ dbang bcu dag la bdag dbang bgyid kyur dacig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lam rdzogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas go 'phang
11a2(mdo): rgyar po shog/ de la gang dag las kun sa rdzogs pa/ de dag tshogs kyi dam pa rnyed gyur da cig/ sems can thams cad blan myed pa'o// byang chub tu ni smon lam snar 'debs gog/ de la dam bcas pa 'i
11a3(mdo): brtan gyur da cing // byang chub thob myin don gzhan byed ma gyur da// lus kun dbang po dag pas rab rgyas shing // nad myed rims nad myed cing mya ngan bral// tshe ring zhi dang sgra ni yid 'ong dang // sdig las
11a4(mdo): ldog cing dge la 'jug gyur cike// ser sna bral zhing zang zing myed chos kyis// rtag tu phan tshun phan 'dogs byed par shog/ gzhan du snying rje dang ni ldan gyur da nas// 'dod pa myi mnga' bar
11a5(mdo): bde bar gshegs gyuradacig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal bying la lan ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bla na myed mchog tu// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yongs sngo'i rgyal po gang // des ni rang gi bsod nams
11a6(mdo): yongs su bsngo// bde gshegs kun tu bzang dag mkhyend pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i bsngo dge ji lta ba// de bzhin bdag kyang ku na tu bzang spyod dang // rgyal ba dam pa kun tu bzang por shog/
11a7(mdo): 'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba/ rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya kar smad du/ a byas pa ta/ ta ba ga ta pUrba pra ti d+ya
11a8(mdo): na bi she sha pi sta ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
11a9(mdo): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yongs pa can du byon te/ yangs pa can na rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na
11b1(mdo): dge slong bcur song gi dge 'dun chen po dang / rgyang chub sems dpa' sum 'i drun mongs 'din te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jas dpal dang / rgya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen no/
11b2(mdo): blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 'chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
11b3(mdo): gnod pa don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blta na sdug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa mun nag thams cad nges par 'jom pa'i glo gros dang / byang chub sems
11b4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa legs pa rnaM sa smra pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po legs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dang /
11b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po chen po'i'adzin rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po lag na rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
11b6(mdo): sus khri ts+tsha// gong dang 'grus kacig tu zhugs te/ da swA dang / gnod sbyin / tshwab dang / rnam yin dang / ma'a' 'did/ cidang / 'gyi chen po dang /
11b7(mdo): po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru
11b8(mdo): bzang po'i chos stond cing / chos kyi gtam gyis sems can rnams tshim par mdzad/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
11b9(mdo): dpa' chen po chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stand las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga pas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la log logs su thal mo sbyar ba
12a1(mdo): btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto'apha chen
12a2(mdo): po dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / khyim bdag dang / mya dang myi la lag pa mang po dag chos nyan pa'i slad du 'dus shing mchis na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs
12a3(mdo): bar dgongs te/ thos nas mi nas sems can thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing yongs
12a4(mdo): su bas par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis myi rdzi bar 'gyur par de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan bkod pa'i gan
12a5(mdo): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ pa rnams la ni ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ rnam par myi mkhyend pa myi mnga' bas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
12a6(mdo): khrig brgyad stong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang dper na/ deng ngam sang gi ltar dgongs pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dang po byang chub kyi thugs yid la
12a7(mdo): mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dmyigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstand par spyod na/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i
12a8(mdo): dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas
12a9(mdo): par bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ka la bying ka'i sgra skad dang / dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal kazho nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs
12b1(mdo): so// 'jam dpal khyod snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis snying rje dpag tu myed pa bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nang /
12b2(mdo): sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzi rid pa/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa'i lha dang myi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ni sde legs so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
12b3(mdo): gshegs pa'i byin kyis rlabs kyis khyod kyi spobs pa 'di skyes so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pas bcom ldan 'das
12b4(mdo): de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la da to/ 'jam dpal shar da phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
12b5(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 2/ jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis myi thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs/ pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs
12b6(mdo): par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zham ring ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong du ma dang ldan pa ban kas te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa chos kyang stond pa yod de/ 'jas
12b7(mdo): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni shi nad tu yongs su dag pa/ zag grur dpag tshad brgyad stong
12b8(mdo): nu ma yod pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyurd pa/ ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra myed pa/ bud myed kyi dngos po myed pa/ tsher ma dang / kayang sa dang / ri dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo myed pa
12b9(mdo): 'jam pa sa'i ngos la reg na bde ba/ lha'i dri gsung dang ldan pa/ lha'i rin po che'i shing sngon pa dang / mye tog dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khris legs par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems
13a1(mdo): dpa' dag pa phyir myi ldog pa'i sa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser dang nor bu dang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i rdzing kyis mdzes par byas pa'o// 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems
13a2(mdo): dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ni rdzus te skyes pa/ rin po che sna bdun kyi pad ma las byung ba sha stag go// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar spon
13a3(mdo): thob shig/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub sems
13a4(mdo): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ des smon lam chen po brgyad rgyun ma dpar btab bo// brgyad gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po de nga po ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa
13a5(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs// rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang la la dag na ba'i nad sna tshogs// kyis lus yongs su gzir te/ snying nad dang / gshed byed dang /
13a6(mdo): byad dang / ro langs dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyis gtses pa de dag bdag gi mthus gdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying san bdun brjod pas de dag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da
13a7(mdo): cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug kyi bar du rims dang / sdig pa can gyi gnod pa rnams myed par gyur dacig ces btab po// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na ma
13a8(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag long ba dang / 'or ba dang / myos pa dang / sha bkra dang / nad tshabs chen pos btab par gyur pa de dag
13a9(mdo): bdag gi mthus bdag gi myir yid la gnas shing / bdag gi myi nga lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar zug gyi bar du dbang po thams cad yongs su chang bar gyur da cig/ sdug bsngal dang nang
13b1(mdo): thams cad rgyun chad par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni kang ki tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
13b2(mdo): rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa/ bya ba ma yin pa spyod pa mang ba/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i
13b3(mdo): las sna tshogs byed pa/ ngan song gsum dang / sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying yi
13b4(mdo): la gnas shing bdag gi myi nga yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag gi mtshams myed pa lnga las sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang zhing yongs su zad par gyurd cig/ bla na myed pa yang dag
13b5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// kyi bar du yang sems can dmyal ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar// ma gyur da cig/ lha yul pa'i lha'i bde ba dang / myi'i bde
13b6(mdo): ba'i myong bar gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang ki dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na rtse/ pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
13b7(mdo): par sangs rgyas pa de na sems can gang su dag dbul por gyurd te/ zas dang skom dang / kos dang nor dang / 'bru dang mal cha dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba myi bdog pa de dag bdag gis mthus
13b8(mdo): bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang chub kyi mthar zug gi bar du dbyig dang gos dang / nor dang 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba 'phel ba
13b9(mdo): gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ seMs
14a1(mdo): can gang dag bcing ba dang / bdeg pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / mtshon cha'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi phyi ba yid la gnas zhing / bdag/
14a2(mdo): ki mying yid kyis brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang / brdeg pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par gyur da cig/ lus kyi gdung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur da cig ces btab
14a3(mdo): de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag mgon byed par gyur/
14a4(mdo): sus la gdung ba'i me 'bar ba dang / seng ge dang / stag dang dom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pa'i nang du chud de/ srog la 'jigs skrag cing mgon myed de/ smre sngags sna tshogs 'dzad
14a5(mdo): pa de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying lan bdud yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag byang / chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lus la gdung ba'i mye thams cad zhi
14a6(mdo): bar gyur da cig/ seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred du da/ sbrul gdug pa de dag kyang byams pa la gnas par gyurd cig/ 'jigs pa myed pa dang / zhi ba'i gnas la gnas par
14a7(mdo): gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po 'dun pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ra/ sems
14a8(mdo): can gang dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang / chod pa dang / 'gyed par gyur te/ 'khrugs shing 'jigs skrag nas spangs pa de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying lan bdud yid kyis
14a9(mdo): brjod pas de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / yod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ phan tshun byams pa la gnas par gyur dacig ces btab bo//
14b1(mdo): de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni/ gang gi che badrag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni/ sems can de dag chu'i nang du son te/ grur zhugs pa/
14b2(mdo): gling myed par phyi nad pa/ khrog 'dod su krung dang / rgya mtsho'i nang du sor te/ smre sngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi myir yid kyis lan bdun brjod pas/ de dag byang chub
14b3(mdo): kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ chu klung chen po las dbugs phyin pa sbyin par gyur da cig/ 'jigs pa myed par rgal bar gyurd cig ces btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yod
14b4(mdo): bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po des smon lam chen po brgyad po de dag btab bo// 'jam dpal de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de'i thugs dang po
14b5(mdo): bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ smon lam dang ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs kyis gnas pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par mdzad pa/ dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
14b6(mdo): pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / zham ring ba byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
14b7(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lo brgyar yang brjod par phyi nu so//
14b8(mdo): 'jam dpal de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ khyim bdag yon tan don tu gnyer ba rnams kyis/ zhe sdang dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bral bar de bzhin
14b9(mdo): gshegs pa de'i mtshan bzung bar bya/ klag par bya ste/ rab tu gus par de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas na/ de'i sdig pa thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
15a1(mdo): re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
15a2(mdo): ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang / zla ba dang pad mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa/ gza'i brjid
15a3(mdo): kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig stond pa yod do// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs dgra brtsom
15a4(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de sngon byang chub sems dang 'i khyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po brgyad btab bo// brgyad gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po na/ gang gi tshe bdag ma
15a5(mdo): 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag zhing las kyi mtha' dang tshong la dka' ste/ g.yeng ba
15a6(mdo): sna tshogs mang bas dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams pa dang / byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa las yongs su nyams te/ de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thard
15a7(mdo): par gyur da cig/ so sor 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams myong ba de
15a8(mdo): dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi mying yo la gnas shing bdag gi myong yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsams ma thag tu
15a9(mdo): mgo ba dang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser rnams 'byung bar gyur da cig/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar gyur cin
15b1(mdo): byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang myi 'bral bar gyur da cig/ ngan song gsum dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su tha dad par gyur cig ces btab bo// bcom ldan 'das
15b2(mdo): de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ stong gsum kyigyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
15b3(mdo): khams na sgo ba las skyes pa 'am/ mngal na skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gang dag grang ba dang / tsha ba dang bkres pa dang / skom pas lus yongs su gdungs/
15b4(mdo): shing sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyams zag pa de dag bdag gi mthu sa bdag gi rna lam du grag cang de dag gis bdag gi mying dran pa dang brjod pas sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa de byang bar gyur da cig/ skye ba
15b5(mdo): de ya ba mar gyur da cig/ za da myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du// skye ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad lus yongs su tha rad par gyuradu
15b6(mdo): cig/ lha yul pa'i lha'i bde ba myong bar gyur de cig ces btaso// de smon sum chen po gsum pa ni gang gi tshe dag la 'angs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
15b7(mdo): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ bud myed gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gang zhing bud myed
15b8(mdo): kyi skye gnas la spod pa dang / gang dag btsas pa'i dus na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi myi ngan lam du grag cing de dag gis bdag gi mying dran pa dang brjod pas
15b9(mdo): tshor ba thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par gyur da cig/ skye ba de yang tha mar gyur da cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa nyid thob par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i
16a1(mdo): smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems
16a2(mdo): can gang dag 'chi ba dang / dgra dang dgon pas gtses pa dang / phan tshun du pha ma dang sring mo dang / mdza' bo dang nye bu'i mya ngan myong zhing / sdug bsngal dang / mya ngan gyi zug rngus lus la zug pa de dag
16a3(mdo): bdag gi mthus bdag gi phyi rnams du grag pa dang / kha ton tu bton pas byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'chi ba dang kra dang / dkon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ mya ngan dang sdug
16a4(mdo): bsngal dang bral bar gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon la ma chen po lnga pa ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs po'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
16a5(mdo): sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag mtshan mo mun pa mun nag rnam par rgyu ba/ las kyi mtha' rnam pa sna tshogs la zhugs pa sdig pa can gyi gdon sna tshogs kyis gtses pa
16a6(mdo): 'jigs pas smre/ sngags sna tshogs 'dond pa de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing / bdag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du mun
16a7(mdo): pa mun na ka thams cad myed par gyur da cig/ sdig pa can gyi gdon thams can byams pa la gnas par gyur da cig/ mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par batshon par gyurd cig ces
16a8(mdo): btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po drug pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag dman
16a9(mdo): ba la mos shing shes rab chung la dran pa rmongs te/ dge ba'i chos rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun
16b1(mdo): rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams pa de dag bdag gi ma thus/ bdag gi phying yid la gnas shing gdag gi phyir yid kyis 'arjod pas/ de dag rgya rgyas kyis par thug gi 'du/ ting 'dzin dang / dran pa dang /
16b2(mdo): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon tu gyur da cig/ shes rab chen po rjes su rgyu bar gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po btsun pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i
16b3(mdo): dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag dman pa las mos shing nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dod pa skyed de/
16b4(mdo): de la gnas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur pa de dag bdag gi mthus bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing bdag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas
16b5(mdo): de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 'ang NA/ gas par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ blan byed pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par gyur da cig/ 1na
16b6(mdo): zos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur da cig byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang myi 'bral bar gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa ni gang gi tshe
16b7(mdo): bdag ma 'ongs pa'i yu na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa den/ sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po zad pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu 'bar zhing rab
16b8(mdo): 'bar 'khrugs par gyur da te ngu zhing mya ngan byed la sngon gyi myi dge ba'i las kyi rgyus sdug bsngal myong zhing skyabs myed pa/ mgon myed pa'i sems can de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying yid la gnas shing
16b9(mdo): bdag gi mying yid kyis brjod pas/ de dag sdug bsngas dang / mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig/ bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur da cig/ de nas shi 'phos nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pa man/
17a1(mdo): phying ba'i seng ge'i ni sa sdus te skye bar gyur cig ces btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' khyad pa gyod pa na/ smon lam chen po brgyad po de dag btab bo//
17a2(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang / zla ba dang pad mas rab tu brgyand pa/ mkhas pa gzi brjid kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni
17a3(mdo): mnyam pa thag grur che ba yangs pa lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa lha'i spos kyi zhing ljon pa rnams kyis rab tu brgya nad pa/ spos gtsang zhing skyon myed pa dang / lha'i spos dang / me tog gis rab tu brgyan pa
17a4(mdo): lha'i rol mo'i sgra skad dang / klu'i nga ro 'byung ba/ sgo'i rin po 'dril bu gser ka'i dra bas legs par brgya nad pa/ lha'i rin po che'i seng ge'i khri mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rin po che'i rdzing
17a5(mdo): kyis rab tu brgya nad pa/ sa'i gzhi'i 'jam zhing snyan pa/ ri/ dang rdo dang / gseg ma dang / tsher ma myed pa/ bud myed kyi da ngos po myed pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa myed pa/ phyir myi ldog
17a6(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ar gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te byung ba/ lha'i rin po che'i rgyan dang / kos kyi mdun legs
17a7(mdo): par brgyan pa sha stag go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bsams ma zag pa tsam gyis gos dang / zas dang skom dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'
17a8(mdo): yongs pyod thams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs chas thams cad dang / lha'i rin po che'i longs spyod thams cad byung ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpa'
17a9(mdo): de lta bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang / zla ba dang / pad mas rab tu brgyan pa/ mkhas pa
17b1(mdo): gzi'i brjid kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan/ nyin lan gsum mtshan las gsum yid la bya// rab tu gus pas gzung bar bya/ dang par bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs kyang byed
17b2(mdo): du gzhug/ me tog dang gdugs dang / spos dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / mar me rnams kyis mchod par bya/ yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas la
17b3(mdo): nyin mtshan gtsang bar byas la/ sa phyogs gtsang mar bzhag par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de skye bar smon lam gdab cing sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems su byas na/ de la
17b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems dpar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams
17b5(mdo): kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems yi/ da la byed pa dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug srabs par 'gyur ro// yun ring
17b6(mdo): du 'tsho zhing nad myed par 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa'i bsamab de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'ab pa dang 'thab mo dang / cod pa dpa' byed pa thams cad rab tu
17b7(mdo): zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes ma thag tu ting nge 'dzind dang
17b8(mdo): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan 'dzind pa de ni/ de ltar yon tan mang po dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal shar phyog
17b9(mdo): logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis yongs gang rin chen bsags pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
18a1(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs dri myed rid chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ka zhes la chos kyang ston cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
18a2(mdo): khrig brgyad stong du mas bskor ba yod do// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa pyod pa na smon lam chen po
18a3(mdo): btab bo// bzhi gang zhe na de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag srog
18a4(mdo): gcod pa/ srog gcod pa'i myi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bye da pa/ srog chags rnam pa sna tshogs kyi srog gcod pa de dag srog gcod pa byas pas/ tshe zung zhing nad mung ba dang / chu dang / dug
18a5(mdo): dang / mtshon dang / mye dang / nad sna tshogs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ ba de dag gis bdag gi mying zos nas 'dzind pa dang / mchod pa/ sa las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su byang ste tshe ring bar gyur da cig/
18a6(mdo): nad myed par gyur da cig/ su yang dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam che na po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/
18a7(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag sdig pa myi dge ba sna tshogs byas te/ gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pas dbul po'i khyim du skyes te/ sgren mo dang /
18a8(mdo): bkres pa dang / skom pas lus yongs su gdungs shing sdug bsngal myong ba de dag gis bdag gi mying zos nas bzung bas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sdig pa thos
18a9(mdo): cad byang bar gyur da cig/ ma tshang ba myed pa thob par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
18b1(mdo): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa den/ sems can gang dag gnod sems dang ldan pa de dag gis bdag gi mying thos na/ bla ra myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phan tshun pa ma sbyar
18b2(mdo): byams pa la gnas par gyur pa cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam ched po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe/ bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems
18b3(mdo): can kang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gis bsgribs te/ tshul khrims 'chal par gyur nas de dag sdig pa kun tu spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa 'dral bas ngan song gsum du ltung ba dang /
18b4(mdo): sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi mying thos ma bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su
18b5(mdo): byang bar gyur da cig/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral par gyur da cig/ tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin da cing / lu sa dang / ngag dang / yid sdom pa la gnas par gyur dacig/
18b6(mdo): byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang myi 'bral bar gyur da cig tu sa btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshen/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga
18b7(mdo): bzangs dri myed rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
18b8(mdo): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni/ sa gzhi la rin po che'i spos sna tshogs gnas pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po 'dri dang ldan pa/ mnyam pa yangs pa/ thag gru che ba tsan dan
18b9(mdo): sbrul gyi snying po'i dro'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ sgra'i nor bu dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / ring po che sbyangs pa/ lha'i nor bu rin po che'i spos chus yongs su gang bas mdzes par byas pa/ dar gyil
19a1(mdo): lnga bres shing dbyangs pa/ rin po che'i skud pa myig mangs ris su bris pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba myed pa/ bud myed kyi dngos po myed pa
19a2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams kyis rol mo'i sgra dang / snyil snyan dang / klu dbyangs ma blangs par sgra 'byung ba/ sil snyan de dag las dngos po'i ngo bo nyid kyi sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam kyi sgra 'byung
19a3(mdo): ba sgra de thos pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi thabs mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon
19a4(mdo): tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kaser bzangs dri myed rin chen sdang brtul zhugs grub pa des/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
19a5(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te/ sems can 'do/ da chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnams
19a6(mdo): kazig ni nad sna tshogs kyis gzir pa/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang dkon pas gnod par gyur da pa/ tshe bskal par thug pa'i sa can dmyal bar gzhol ba'i sems can rnams gzigs nas
19a7(mdo): sems can de dag gi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so// tad yA wA/ sid de srid
19a8(mdo): dwe/ su sid d+he/ mo tsa ni/ mo krA Ni/ muka te/ byi mug te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ mang grA l+ye/ hi ra N+ya ga rbe/ nad na ka rbe/ sarba a na sa dA ni/ ba ra ma r+tha sa da ni/ ma na se/ ma ha ma na se/ had pu te
19a9(mdo): ad t+yad bud te/ bi dA b+ha yAM/ su ba ne/ pra mA go She/ pra ma d+hu shi te/ sarba a r+the she pa ra dzi te/ sarba tra a pra ti ha te/ tsa tu shaSh+Ti bud ta go ti/ b+hi sha te/ na ma sarba taHka ta nan/ swa hA// bcom ldan
19b1(mdo): 'das kyis gzungs 'di gsungs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la legs so zhes bya
19b2(mdo): ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can thams cad la thugs bache ba'i slad du/ sdig pa thams cad bsal ba dang / nad thabs cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i
19b3(mdo): skud du/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'dri lta bu 'di dag bka' maNal pa legs so// legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la ba/ grogs po dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal
19b4(mdo): po 'am/ rgyal bu 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma yon tan don tu gnyer ba gang su yang rung ste/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed
19b5(mdo): pa dang / dad par byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems yid la/ byed pa dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / spos dang / mar me/
19b6(mdo): rnams kyis mchod pa dang / gtsang mar byas te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan laka brgyad pa dang ldan par byas na/ de'i mtsham sa myed pa lnga las stsogs pa/ sdig pa thams cad yongs
19b7(mdo): su byang bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang
19b8(mdo): dgra dang dkon pa'i gdon thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par 'gyur/ re ba dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'jam
19b9(mdo): rapal shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan myed pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
20a1(mdo): mya ngan myed mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond pa yod do// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20a2(mdo): sangs rgyas mya ngan byed mchog dpal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni lag mthil mar mnyam pa/ thag mu che ba yangs pa/ mya ngan dang / ngan song dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra myed pa/ bud myed kyi dngos po myed pa/ sa gzhi 'ja
20a3(mdo): zhing shind tu snyi ba/ lha'i spos kyis bdugs pa/ lha'i nor bu rin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi rdzing spos chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa
20a4(mdo): dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang ldan pa/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sgra dang ldan pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
20a5(mdo): 'od dpag myed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed mchog dpal
20a6(mdo): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa yang de 'dra'o// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed mchog dpal
20a7(mdo): de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i khyad pa pyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bzhi btab po// bzhi gang zhe na/ smon lam chen po dang po ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
20a8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mang ba/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong
20a9(mdo): ba der sems can gang dag gis bdag gi mying thos la/ zos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag bdag gi mthus mya ngan dang sdug bsngal dang / yid myi bde ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur
20b1(mdo): cig/ su yang sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal myong bA pa gyurd cig/ tshe ring por gyur da cig ces btab bo// / de'i tshe smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ kang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa lnga/
20b2(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag sdig pa myi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po stir myed pa chen po mun pa mun nag
20b3(mdo): can du skyes pa de dag la bdag gi mthus/ bdag gi lus las 'od gser gyi sdang ba 'di lta bu byung ste/ des sems can dmyal ba de dag la reg cing mthong ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad byang nas sems can da
20b4(mdo): ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su tha rad par gyur/ cig/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur da cig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
20b5(mdo): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du lha dang myi'i bde ba myong bar gyur da cig/ ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ ga nga gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
20b6(mdo): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag sdig pa myi dge ba byas te/ gzhan gyi rdzas phrogs pas dbul po dma' ba'i khyim du skyes nas/ gos dang zas
20b7(mdo): dang / btung ba dang mal ma dang / rgyun gyi bdog pa/ grang ba dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba/ bkres pa dang / skom pas lus ka'ir cing mdog ngan pa de dag gis bdag gi mying thos nas brjod pas
20b8(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bgo ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha thams cad yongs su longs spyad par gyur da cig/ yus
20b9(mdo): la lha'i lus kyi kha dog gis brgyan par gyur da cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni sems can gang dag gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za rnams kyis gtses shing
21a1(mdo): mdangs phrogs te/ nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba de dag gis bdag gi mying thos nas bdag gi mthus/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
21a2(mdo): rgyas kyi bar du gnod sbyin dang / sbyin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha zas mdangs phrogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur da cig/ byams pa la gnas par gyurd cig/ nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs las
21a3(mdo): yongs su tha rad par gyur da cig ces btab bo// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das des smon lam chen po bzhi po de dag btab bo// 'jam dpal gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
21a4(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya na myed mchog dpal de'i mtshan thos te/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brjod pas/ sems can thams cad la byams
21a5(mdo): pa gnas par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la yang de // ka gi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur// mya ngan dang sdug bsngal dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug
21a6(mdo): pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ rtag tu na dmyed par 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho zhing nad thams cad la sa yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi/
21a7(mdo): bar du log par ltung bar 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ skye ba drang par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rin po che sna bdud kyi pad ma'i khri la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ sna thams cad kyis rjes su
21a8(mdo): bsrung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan thos pa de ni de ltar yon tan mang po dang ldan no// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yun
21a9(mdo): sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs
21b1(mdo): par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis brjod par myi nus so// 'jam dpal shar daphyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang kwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshad
21b2(mdo): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos spags rgya mtsho'o dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang stond pa yod do// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das
21b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shind tu yongs su dag pa/ mnyam pa dri ma myed pa/ 'od gsal ba ka an du
21b4(mdo): sAl gyi rang bzhin can/ tshig pa dang / ra ba dang / skar bung dang / da rta babs dang / rna ba dang / bgam shes las mub pa sa gnyis 'arin po che'i shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa// gser gyi srung
21b5(mdo): pa myig mangs ris su bris pa rin po che'i sngon shing la yang dri la bu e ra ka'i dra bas bres shing sbyangs pa/ lha'i dar gyi snga ldi da nga/ lha'i me tog dang / spos kyis mdzes par byas pa rin
21b6(mdo): po che'i sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i spos chus yongs su gang ba dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing bskus na/ lha'i yid du 'ong ba sems can thams cad yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dngos po myed
21b7(mdo): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi sgra skad 'byung ba lho'i sil snyan dang / rol mo rnams las theg pa chen po'i chos kyi sgra skad 'byung ba/ sems can gang dag chos kyi sgra de thos pa de dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang kaN+Di
21b8(mdo): mug dang bral bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi sems myi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ngan song gi sdug bsngal gyi sgra myed pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa myed pa
21b9(mdo): bud myed kyi dngos po myed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam chen po bzhi btab po// bzhi kang gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni/ gang gi
22a1(mdo): tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'idus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag log par smra ba can gyi khyim du skyes pa/ sangs rgyas
22a2(mdo): dang chos dang / dge 'dun la sems dad pa/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa las ring du gyur da pa de dag gis/ bdag gi mying thos nas bdag gi mthus/ las kyi sgrib pa de zad par gyurd nas/ byang chub kyi
22a3(mdo): mthar thug gi bar du yang dag pa'i lta ba can du gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa myi phyed pa dang ldan par gyur da cig/ byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang / phyir myi ldog par gyur da cig
22a4(mdo): ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi/ tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems
22a5(mdo): can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra myi grag pa/ chos kyi sgra myi grag/ pa/ dge 'dun gyi sgra myi grag pa/ yul mtha' kho ba dag tu skye/ sa te myi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rgyus/ sdig pa'i las byed
22a6(mdo): pa/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas ngan song gnas su ltung zhing / dge ba'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba de dag la bdag gi mthus bdag gi mying rna lam du grag cing / chos kyi sprin dang rgya mtsho/
22a7(mdo): sgra byung bar gyur da cig/ de dag gis chos kyi sgra de thos nas sngon gyi las zad par gyur da te/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang myi 'bral bar gyur da cig ces btab bo//
22a8(mdo): de'i smon lam chen po gsum pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can gang dag gos dang /
22a9(mdo): rgyan dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / rna ba'i gso sman dang bral zhing / myi ldan pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong zhing sdig pa byed pa de dag bdag gi mthus gos dang rgyan dang
22b1(mdo): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / longs spyad rnams bsams ma thag tu 'byung zhing myi ldan pa myed par gyur da cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug
22b2(mdo): gi bar du su yang ci dang yang myi ldan pa myed par gyurd cig ces btab bo// de smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
22b3(mdo): par sangs rgyas pa de na/ sems can de dag sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sbyin pas phan tshun thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang yod pa dang / 'gyed par gyurd cing gcig la gcig gnod par bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba
22b4(mdo): phyir rtul ba dang / mtshon dang / mda' dang / dbyig pa dag gis bsnun pa de na/ gang dag gis de'i bdag gi mying thos shing yid la ka nas pa de dag bdag gi mthus yid kyis brjod pa/ mda' dang
22b5(mdo): mtshon dang / dbyig pa las sogs pa slar log par gyur da cig/ phyir phyogs par gyur da cig/ dgra thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur da cig/ su'i srog gi dbang po yang 'gag par
22b6(mdo): ma gyurd cig/ byang chub kyi mthur thug gi bar du rang rang gi rdzas dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag gis chog shes par rgyu rad cig ces btab ste/ 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de
22b7(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de sdod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sprod lam chen po bzhi pa de dag btab bo// 'jam
22b8(mdo): dpal gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i mtshan zos pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / dad par byed pa dang /
22b9(mdo): rab tu gus par mchod pa byed pa de dag sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nam du yang
23a1(mdo): byang chub kyi sems dang myi 'bral bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ rtag tu nad myed cing tshe ring bar 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten
23a2(mdo): kyi zham su skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ gang dang kang du skyes par bsams ma thag tu/ gos dang / rgyan dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos
23a3(mdo): sman dang / yo byad dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ chos bsgrags
