44b2(mdo): myi gnas pa ni de la ma chags pa'i phyir ro// rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i phyir te/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bsreg par bya ba ni sregs shig/
44b3(mdo): tshig pa ni skyed cig/ skyes pa ni zong shig/ rnam par phye ba ni sdus shig/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsreg par bgyi ba lags// ji ltam na cig sa nas skyed pa lak+Sha ri lta ma skyes pa rnas
44b4(mdo): ji ltar na rnam par sde ba rnams sdud pa lags/ hra)'amaN+Dal dpa/ bsreg par bya ba sreg pa ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad shes rab kyi myis sreg pa'o// chog pa skyed pa ni thabs kyis
44b5(mdo): phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gzung ba'o// skyes nas gtong ba ni sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa la sI nga las su bya'o// rnam par phye ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba de ni/
44b6(mdo): yongs su bsngo ba'i tshig bla dgas so// / rigs kyi bu dag de sta bas na dus ma yin pa'i dus su zhes par gyis shig/ dus dang dus ma yin par shes par gyis shig/ dus da nga dus ma yin pa la mkhas par yang gyis shig/ gsol
44b7(mdo): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal rnams dus ma lags pa la dus su 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na dus ma lags par 'chal pa lags/ ji ltar na dus dang dus ma lags pa la
44b8(mdo): mkhas pa lags// bka' saja la da pa/ gang nyan thos kyis thob par bya ba'i dus ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dus ma yin no// pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na myed
44b9(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dus so// dus dang dus ma yin pa la mkhas par bya ba ni/ dus bzhin du dge pa'i ra ba yang dag par sgrub pA
45a1(mdo): phyir de de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na 'byor da pa ni phye shig/ ma 'byor da pa ni sbyor cig/ 'byor da pa dang ma 'byor da pa la chags par yang ma byed cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra/
45a2(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byor pa 'byed pa lags/ ji ltar nam 'byor da pa ni sbyor ba lags/ ji ltar na 'byor pa dang myi 'byor pa la ma chags pa lags// bka' sa lad pa/ 'byor da pa ni phyin
45a3(mdo): ci log bzhi 'khor ba'i 'dam dang 'byor pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' dbye bar bya'o// ma 'byor da pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bzhin yid la bya ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'as sbyar bar bya'o//
45a4(mdo): 'byor da pa dang ma 'byor da pa la chags par myi bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa la ma chags par bya ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ dbugs
45a5(mdo): phyin pa rnams ni dbugs ma dbyung shig/ dbugs ma phyi nad pa na/ rnams ni dbugs phyung shig/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'ad// sa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbugs myi 'byind pa lags
45a6(mdo): ji ltar na dbugs ma phyind pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa lags bka' stsal da pa/ dbugs phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba ni/ yongs su smyin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par myi bya'o/
45a7(mdo): dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba ni/ yongs su ma sbyin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su sbyind par bya ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na ma byung bar yang gyis shig/ ma sbas par yang gyis
45a8(mdo): shig/ rma byung ba rnams ni sos par gyis shig/ mam byung ba rnams ni rma ma dbyung shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'abyin pa lags/ ji ltar na ma sbas pa lags
45a9(mdo): ji ltar na ma byung ba rnams gso' ba lags// ji ltar na rma ma byung ba rnams rma myi 'byin pa lags// bka' saN+Dald pa/ mang byung ba ni yan lag dang / nying lag yongs su gtang ba'i phyir ro// ma smas par bya ba ni sems kyis
45b1(mdo): so/ mabyung ba rnams gso ba ni ltung ba byung ba rnams chos bzhin du bcos pa'o// mam byung ba ma myi 'byung ba ni srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las 'gal bar myi bya ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na nye bar 'che ba
45b2(mdo): myed par yang gyis shig/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'gro bar yang kyis shig/ ma bsngags pa rnams kyang sgrogs cig/ bsngags pa rnams kyang chung la kA zan cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji skam na/ byang chub ses
45b3(mdo): dpa' rnams nye bar 'tsho ba ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba lags/ ji ltar ra bsngags pa sogs pa lags/ ji ltar na bsngags pa chung myi gzon pa lags// bka' ba la da pa/ 1
45b4(mdo): bar 'chor myed pa ni bdud dang / mu stegs can thams cad kyis kla/ das myi rnyed pa'o// sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ni/ dpag pa sems kyi zhing lta bu'o// ma bsngags pa bachags pa ni/ dge ba'i
45b5(mdo): ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro// bsngags pa chud myi gzan pa ni dge ba'i sems skyes so cog/ byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na stobs chung bar yang gyis
45b6(mdo): shig/ stobs dang ldan par yang gyis shig/ rten myed par yang gyis shika/ dpung gnyen myed par yang gyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams stobs chung ba lags
45b7(mdo): ji ltar na stobs dang ldan pa lags/ ji ltar na rten ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na dpung gnyen ma mchis pa lags// bkalas lad pa/ stobs chung ngu bya ba ni gnod par bye ba rnams la lan gyi bya 'o// stobs dang ldan
45b8(mdo): ba zhes bya ba ni/ phan par myi byed pa rnams la bzod pas phan gdags pa'o// rten myed par bya ba ni so so rang gis shes pas so// dpung gnyen myed par bya ba ni gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs
45b9(mdo): kyi bu dag de lta bas na dang ba dag ni rnyog pa can du gyis shig/ rnyog pa can dag ni dang bar gyis shig/ rnyog pa myed par yang kyis shigang / rtag tu dang bar yang kyis shig/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
46a1(mdo): sems dpa' rnams dang ba dag rnyog pa can du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na rnyog pa can dag ni dang bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na rnyog pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na rtag tu dang ba lags// bka'
46a2(mdo): saHlad pa/ dang bdag rnyog pa can du bya ba ni bar gzhag pa' sems la dge ba'i cha ba dag gis skom pa'o// rnyog pa can dag dang bar bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pas rnyogs pa'i sems/ byang chub kyi sems su dang bar bya'o/
46a3(mdo): rnyog pa myed par bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'o// rtag tu dang bar bya ba ni sems can thams cad la sems dang ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na lugs las bzlog par 'jug
46a4(mdo): par yang gyis shig/ lugs bzhin du yang spobs cig/ spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud kyang shes par gyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lugs las bzlog
46a5(mdo): par 'jug pa lags/ ji ltar na lugs bzhin du slob pa lag/ sa/ ji ltar na s+yi'u tshugs kyi rgyud 'tshal ba lags/ bka' sarba lad pa/ lugs las bzlog par 'jug par bya ba ni/ byis pa
46a6(mdo): so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa las phyir log pa'o// lug sa bzhin du slob pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la'o// spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud shes par bya ba ni/ 'du shes
46a7(mdo): myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las log ste/ 'dod pa'i khams su snang bar bya ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na bdud rtsi dang / dug tu ma 'dres par gyis shig/ dug myed
46a8(mdo): pa rnams dang ma stend cig/ dug dang ldan pa rnams la bdud rtsi'i sbyin pa gyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud ci da'adug tu ma 'dres pa lags/ ji ltar
46a9(mdo): na dug ma mtshas pa rnams dang myi sten pa lags/ ji ltar na dug dang ldan pa rnams la bcud ci'i sbyin pa bgyid pa lags// bka' saHla pa/ bdud citsi zhes bya ba ni bag yod pa'o// dug ces bya ba ni bag myed pa'i
46b1(mdo): ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' bka yod par bya zhing / bag myed pa'i sems can dang ma 'dres par bya'o// dug myed pa rnams shes bya ba ni nyan thos rnams te/ de dag dang sten par myi bya'o// dug dang ldan pa zhes/
46b2(mdo): bya ba ni so so'i skye bo rnams te/ de dag la bdud mi bstan par bya ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na mngon par dga' bar bya ba la ni/ mngon par dka' bar ma byed cig/ mngon par dga' bar myi bya
46b3(mdo): ya ni mngon par dka' bar gyis shig/ dga' ba dang 'dod chags dang ldan pa ma yang gyis shig/ dga' ba dnga'adod chags yongs su gcad par yang gyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
46b4(mdo): sems dpa' rnams mngon par dka' bar bgyi ba la mngon par gyibagyid pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par dka' bar myi bgyi ba la ma don par bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dka' ba dpa'adod chags dang
46b5(mdo): ldan pa lags/ ji ltar na dga' ba dang 'dod chags yongs su// gcod pa lags// bka' saN+Dal dpa/ mngon par dka'/ ba zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzind pa dang / ngi'ir 'dzind pa ste/ de
46b6(mdo): dag la mngon par dga' bar myi bya'o// mngon par myi dka' ba ni bdud rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ste/ de la mngon bar dga' bar bya'o// dga' ba dang 'dod chags dang ldan par
46b7(mdo): bya ba ni 'khor ba sred pa mi zla zin pa'o// dka' ba dang 'dod chags yongs su gcad pa ni 'gog pa yongs su shes par bya ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ bcing bus btsongs
46b8(mdo): pAr yang kyis shig/ bcing bas bcings pa rnams kyang zhol cig/ grol ba rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur gyis/ ma grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang kyis shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
46b9(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bcing bas bcings pa lags/ ji ltar na bcings pa rnams 'grol ba lags ji ltar na grol ba rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na ma grol ba
46'a1(mdo): rnams rjes su 'brang ba lags// bka' sa lad pa/ bcing bas bcings par bya ba ni/ bslab pa'i bcing bas so// bcings pa 'grel pa ni sred pa'i bcing ba las so// grol ba dz+ras
46'a2(mdo): la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la'o// ma grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams yongs su sbyin par bya ba ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi
46'a3(mdo): bu dag de lta bas na 'dod par bya ba rnams la ni 'dod par gyis shig/ 'dod pa myi bya ba rnams la ni 'dod par ma byed cig/ 'dod pa dang bral bar yang gyis shig/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang
46'a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal bar bgyi ba rnams 'tshal ba lags ji ltar na 'tshal bar myi bgyi ba rnams myi 'tshal ba lags ji lta ra na 'tshal ba dang bral ba lags// bka' saHla pa/ byang
46'a5(mdo): chub sems dpa'i 'dod par myi bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sa// ngas rgyas thams cad de/ de dag la 'dod par myi bya'o// lha'o// dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'dod par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas btso
46'a6(mdo): ldan 'das rnams te/ de dag la 'dod pa myi bya'o// 'dod pa da da bral bar bya ba ni/ brgya byin dang / tshangs par skye ba la ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ ji tsam du chung ba'i
46'a7(mdo): sa bon la'ang ma brnyas shig/ zhing tshad myed pa la yang mos par gyis shig/ 'thob pa chen po na me sbub shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar da/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji tsam du chung ba'i sa
46'a8(mdo): thon la yang brnyas par myi bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na zhing tshad ma mchis pa la yang mos pa sags/ ji ltar na 'thob pa chen po myi sgrub pa lags/ bkalu saHlad pa/ ji tsam du chung ba'i sa 'o na zhes bya ba ni
46'a9(mdo): ci tsam du chung ba'i dge ba'i cha ba ste/ de la brnyas par myi bya'o// zhing tshad myed pa la yang mos par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sbyin pa tshad myed pa la mos par bya'o// 'thob pa chen po myi sgrub pa ni sems
46'b1(mdo): can thams cad la sbyin pa'i phyir te/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chags pa rnams ni khong du chud par gyis shig/ chags pa rnams la ni spyod cig/ chags pa sa zhen pa rnams la ni ltos shig/ chags pa
46'b2(mdo): myed par ni ma srung zhig/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags pa rnams 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar ma chags pa rnams la pyod pa lags/ ji ltar mchags pa
46'b3(mdo): zhen pa rnams la lta ba lags/ ji ltar na chags pa ma mchis pa nyid du myi ltung ba lags// bka' sa sad pa/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa dang / khong khro ba'i sems te/ de gnyis ni byang
46'b4(mdo): chub sems dpa' srung bar bya'o// chags pa rnams la s+yad pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs myed pa rnams su'o// chags pa myed pa nyid du myi ltung ba ni mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa ste/ de ni
46'b5(mdo): tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na yang bar yang kyis shi/ ka/ khur chen po yang khyer cig/ ma blangs pa ni ma lend cig/ blangs pa ni nyams 'og tu chud par gyis shig/ gsol pa
46'b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang ba la kas/ ji ltar na khur chen po khyer ba lags/ ji ltar na ma blangs pa myi len pa lags/ ji ltar na blangs pa nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi
46'b7(mdo): pa lags/ bka' sa yad pa/ yang bar bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad do// zhur chen po bkung ba ni sems can thams cad do// ma blangs pa myi blang ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// blangs
46'b8(mdo): pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba ni theg pa chen po ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na smad par yang kyis shig/ bstod par yang gyis shig/ nye bar sten par yang gyis shig/ spang bar yang gyis shig/
46'b9(mdo): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams smad pa lags/ ji ltar na bstod pa lags/ ji ltar na nye bar sten pa lags/ ji ltar na spang ba lags// bka' saN+Dal da pa/ smad pa
47a1(mdo): myi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'o// stod pa ni dge ba'i chos thams cad stong pa'o// bsten pa ni 'phags pa'i lam mo// spangs pa ni myi dge ba'i phyogs kyi lam thams cad de/ de ni tshul lo//
47a2(mdo): rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na grong dang grong khyer dang / yul dang pho brang 'khor dag tu ni/ bsam gtan gyi stobs ston cig/ dgon pa dang bas mtha' rnams su ni nyon mongs pa chung bar ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom
47a3(mdo): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams grong dang grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor rnams su bsam gtan gyi stobs stond pa lags/ ji ltar na dgon pa dang bas mtha' rnams su nyon mongs pa chung bar
47a4(mdo): stond pa lags/ bka' saN lad pa/ grong dang grong khyer dang yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu phyi nad pa na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dI dang / ro dang / reg bya rags pa dag snang bar 'gyur te/ de
47a5(mdo): dag ni bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis gnan par bya'o// dgon pa/ dang bas mtha' rnams na 'dug po'i tshe/ nyon mongs pa gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ dben pa'i yon tan gyis gnan par bya ste/
47a6(mdo): de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na chu'i nang na yang 'dug par gyis shig/ rtag par skom par yang gyis shig/ skom pa yang sol cig/ skom pa myed par yang ma byed cig/ gsol pa
47a7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chab kyi nang na sa mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na rtag tu skom pa lags/ ji ltar na skom pa bsal ba lags/ ji ltar na skom pa ma mchis par myi bgyid pa la ga
47a8(mdo): bka' stsal da pa/ chu'i nang na 'dug par bya ba ni chos kyi tshul gnas par bya'o// rtag par sgom par bya ba ni chos kyis skom par bya'o// skom pa bsal ba ni chos kyis chos kyi bya ba sgrub pa'o// skom pa myed
47a9(mdo): par myi bya ba ni 'dus ma byas su lhung bar myi bya ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na/ gcig pu grogs myed par yang kyis shika/ g.yog mang po dang 'khor mang po dang ldan par yang kyis
47b1(mdo): shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ gcig pu grogs ma mchis par yang bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na g.yog mang po dpa' khor mang po dang ldan pa lags
47b2(mdo): bka' stsal da pa/ gcig pu grogs myed par bya ba ni dge ba'i tsha ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa la'o// g.yog mang po dang ldan par bya ba ni/ dge ba'i ra ba de dag sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o//
47b3(mdo): 'khor mang po dang ldan par bya ba la 'khor mang po zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs pa'i chos phyogs 'di ste/ de ni tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na grol bar yang gyis shig/ btson rar chud par yA
47b4(mdo): kyis shig/ pha rol tu phyind par yang kyis shig/ chu bo chen po 'i nang du yang 'dug par yang kyis shig/ gsol dpa/ ma ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams grol ba
47b5(mdo): lags/ ji ltar na btson rang chud pa lags/ ji ltar na pa/ rol tu phyind pa lags/ ji ltar na chu bo chen po'i nang na kan pa lags// bka' sa la dra pa/ grol bar bya ba ni nyon
47b6(mdo): mongs pa dang bdud kyi bcing ba thams cad las so// btson rang chud par yang bya ba ni bsams bzhin du skye ba rnams su'o// pha rol tu phyind par yang bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi skad
47b7(mdo): shes pa la'o// chu bo chen po'i nang na gnas par yang bya ba ni/ chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i phyir te/ de na tshul lo// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar bas na tshad yod pa yang so sor rtogs par gyis
47b8(mdo): shig/ tshad byed pa yang mnyam pa nyid du 'ong du chud par gyis shig/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshad ma mchis pa la ya so sor rtog pa lags/ ji ltar na tshad
47b9(mdo): ma mchis pa yang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sald pa/ rigs kyi bu dag tshad yod pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas so// tshad myed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas
48a1(mdo): de la byang chub sems dpa'as 'dus byas kyang spang bar myi bya ste/ 'dus byas su rtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang 'grogs par myi bya'o// 'dus ma byas la yang brtag par bya ste/ skyon
48a2(mdo): myed par yang 'jug par myi bya'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i zhes rab kyis/ byang chub kyi snying por mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ de ni tshul
48a3(mdo): lo// tshul gyi tshig 'di dag bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgyad stong ni byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// bcom ldan/
48a4(mdo): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po de dag dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dI zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te
48a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// 2/ phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// / rdzogs s+ho/
48a6(mdo): rgya kar gi mkhan po prad nye bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde las mtshogs pas bsgyur da cing zhus te gtan la phab
48a7(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ ar+ya lo ka nu pa rta nA nA ma ma hA
48a8(mdo): na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag kri
48a9(mdo): thos pa dus cig na// thub pa'i rgyal po yi la bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' sems cad dang // nyan thos rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de nas mkhas pa 'jam dbyangs kyis// btud de rgyal
48b1(mdo): la 'di skad gsol// slad mo'i skye bo rnams slad du// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'byung // zab cing rgya che phun sum tshogs// mdo'i sde dam pa blo rab kyis// sma hA/
48b2(mdo): mchog gis bshad du gsol// 'jig rten 'gon po thugs skyes sras// gces 'dzin mchog la bka' maHla dpa// che gcig sems su yid byos la// nyon cig da ni bshad par bya// glo dang ldan pas yon
48b3(mdo): tan zhus// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' sachald pa// chos smra sems can mchog rnams kyi// chos nyid de ni mnyan par gyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams dpag myed las// rang sangs rgyas ni thams cad dang //
48b4(mdo): nyan thos dag gi rnam kun tu// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsngag/ sa pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa spros myed la// byis pa spros la spyod pa yi// sems can kun gyis rgyal ba rnams// rig par
48b5(mdo): myi nus smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang // rang 'byung sku thugs ci'o// tra dang // shes rab ni 'dra rab tu mkhyend// 'jig rten du ni
48b6(mdo): 'dzin rten smon// rnam par 'dren pa rnams 'byung yang // 'jig rten dang ni 'dres myed la// 'jig rten du yang snang ba ston// sku dang sku'i 'phrin las dang // gsung kis gang dag brjod pa dang /
48b7(mdo): yid dang yid kyi rnam rtog rnams// rgyal ba thams cad 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten na ni thugs 'chems// 'jig rten 'gon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin// sems cad nam/ la chos
48b8(mdo): stond to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod rnams kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags// de dag 'phrin las 'jig rten 'das// rnam par sbyin pa bla na myed// gal te 'jig rten rnam 'dren rnams//
48b9(mdo): 'jig rten mthun par myi 'jug na// sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang // sangs rgyas sus kyang shes myi 'gyur// 'jig rten kun la phan bzhed pa// skyob pa rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'o// rang 'byung sdig pa myi ma
49a1(mdo): pa// de dag g.yol ba bsam gyi khyab// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku// 'khrig pa las ni byung myin la// yab dang yum yang stodang mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin//
49a2(mdo): bskal pa bye ba grangs myed nas// shes rab pha rol phyi nad las byung // 'on kyang byis pa nyid ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas 'od ni dpag myed de// phyogs bcu dag tu sdang mdzad kyang
49a3(mdo): 'dom gang 'od du ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// myi'i das pa nang du yang // zhabs gnyis sa la myi reg ste// 'on kyang lam srad de ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'dod
49a4(mdo): pa de dag rnam smad de// 'dod pa'i rdzab las yang dag 'phags// 'on kyang sras las stsogs stond pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yI// mar mye mdzad nas gzung nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod/
49a5(mdo): chags bral// sgra gcan zin la sras shes gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la// // nga ni mchog ces bka' maHla da la// phyi nas chos ni tshol mdza/
49a6(mdo): pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// thub chen 'dzam shing grib ma la// bzhugs te bsam gtan mdzad bstan dang // lo drug bar du dka' s+yad pa// 'di ni 'jig rted 'thun 'jug yin//
49a7(mdo): gnyis su myed par zhing 'di ni// byang chub snying por bzhugs nas ni// bdud 'dus rnam par ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// byang chub mtshungs myed sangs rgyas te// lhar bcas
49a8(mdo): 'jig rten ston yin yang // thugs las chu ngu nyid stond pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// dpa' bo thugs rje che ldan pa// bstan pa'i phyir na 'dir gshegs ya// gsol ba 'debs la badre
49a9(mdo): mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rang byung rnams kyi mkhyend pa ni// phyir zhing 'jug pa myi mnga' yang // de dag dran pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rdzon/
49b1(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni// byon dang bzhud pa myi mnga' yang // 'on kyang bzhud par rnam sdang ba// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// rgyal ba rnams ni mkha' 'dra ste// chos rnams kun la myi gnas
49b2(mdo): kyang // ldang ba ltar yang snang ba na// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// zhabs ni pad mo'i 'dab 'dra ste// de dag rdul gyis myi gos la// zhabs kyang 'khru bar mdzad pa na// 'di ni 'jig rten
49b3(mdo): 'thun 'jug yin// de dag dri ma myi mnga' ste// sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhus mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// zhal gyi pad ma'i dri ldan zhing
49b4(mdo): tshems ni dA myed mu tig 'dra// 'on kyang tshems shing gsol mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// de dag sgribs pa myi mnga' yang // de dag zhal zas gsol mdzad/
49b5(mdo): cing // sbyin pa po la 'bras bu che// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun la/ drug yin// sku 'khregs rdo rje 'dra ba'i phyir// zag pa dgani myi mnga' yang // bshang ba'i sar ni gshegs mdzad pa//
49b6(mdo): 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// de dag snyan ni myi mnga' yang // dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad pa'i phyir// sman kyang ston pa mdzad pa ni// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas yon
49b7(mdo): tan kun ldan te// sku la 'gyur ba myi mnga' yang // de dag dgal ba ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'dun 'dug yin// 'jig rten khams ni dpag myed pa// zhabs kyi 'the bos g.yol ma
49b8(mdo): la// 'on kyang nyams chung ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// yid kyi sku dang ldan pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku dang // nag can sku ni stond mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig
49b9(mdo): rten 'thun 'jug yin// sangs rgyas rnam rtog myi mngal yang // sems can khyod yul ji bzhin du// de dag spyod pa rnam par rtog/ 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yini// de dag rtag tu mnyam bzhag
50a1(mdo): la// 'greng dang bzhugs dang bzhud pa dang // de bzhin mnal bar sdang ba yang // 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub dka' la// grang dang tsha dang grib ma dang /
50a2(mdo): de bzhin nyi ma stond mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// tshangs pa'i khyim ni tshangs pa ltar// rgyal ba rtag par na bza' gsol// 'on kyang na bza' legs mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'dug
50a3(mdo): yin// myi gtsug bstan myi mthong zhing // spu kris bcad du yang myed kyang // dbu 'dreg par ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'dug yin// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rab sgoms te// de dag rdzu 'phrul rnam ston
50a4(mdo): la// bsam gtan mdzad par snang ba yang // 'di ni 'jig rten thun 'jug yin// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa kun// ro bro mchog rnams rnyes gyur da kyang // ngan song dag ni sten mdzad pa//
50a5(mdo): 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// bsod nams myi bza/ de thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags 'od kyang ma brnyes ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun
50a6(mdo): 'jug yin// dka' ba'i zas ni mngon bsgrubs te// badz+ra/ lad pa bye bar bzhugs mdzad kyang // rtag tu zhal zas gsol ma dzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// bso
50a7(mdo): rnams pha rol phyi dad pas 'phags// lha'i na bza' brnyes 'gyur kyang // phyag darang khrod pa gsol mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'og myin gzhas myed 'ang pa rnams// rnam 'dren
50a8(mdo): rnams kyis yongs spangs te// cha khyim rnams ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'dren pa rnams ni zhal dbugs kyis// rgya mtsho chen po skams mdzad kyang // char pa'i skyas
50a9(mdo): kyang rab 'dzin pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// bdud rnams bye ba dpag myed pa// thugs bskyed tsam gyis 'dus mdzad kyang // bdud kyi bgegs rnams ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten thum
50b1(mdo): 'jug yin// nga dpanga'i zhes lta gang // de ni rang byung rnams la myed// 'on kyang nga dang nga'i zhes gsung ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// skyob pa sangs rgyas chos kun la// myi mkhyend pa ni myi mtha
50b2(mdo): yang // gzhan la yongs su 'dri mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnam par 'dren pa 'byung mdzad kyang // rab tu dben par snang ba ste// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun
50b3(mdo): 'jug yin// de dag sdang tshogs sku myed kyang // sems can mos pa ji bzhin du// sku lus srul pa mdzad pa ni// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'jig rten gyi ni sgra skad kyis// de bzhin gshegs
50b4(mdo): pa myi g.yo la// 'on kyang sgra chung bsten mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros myi mnga'// chos rnams kun la gsal gyur da kyang // spros dang bcas par gsung mtha
50b5(mdo): pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mying myed pa'i tshe// sa kyi rnams// bsam du myed pa'i mying dag gis// sems can// rnaMs la yongs brjod pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin//
50b6(mdo): chos rnams sems can myed pa dang // shi nad tu dngos po myed mkhye na la// sems can mang po 'dul mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// gang gis las byas 'odi nyid kyis
50b7(mdo): myong bar 'gyur ba ma yin yang // gang gis byas pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// skyes bu mchog rnams mchog gsum yang // 'chi 'pho skye ba ston
50b8(mdo): mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'jig rten 'di nas srid gzhan du// su yang 'khor ba yod myin la// 'khor ba yang ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// phung po dag
50b9(mdo): dang khams rnams dang // skye mched rang bzhin gcig bzhed la// khams gsum po dag ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// dus gsum dag tu sems can gyi// rang bzhin dmyigs pa ma yin/
51a1(mdo): la// sems can khams kyang ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// kun sa phyi mkhyen nam bral te// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// 'on kyang sngon mtha' myi gsung ba//
51a2(mdo): 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// yang dag ji bzhin gzhan byin par// chos rnams rtogs par thugs chud la// 'on kyang gzhag pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// dam pa'i don tu chos rnaMs/
51a3(mdo): kun// zab par rab tu mkhyend gyur da la// sna tshogs su ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// 'phags pa'i bden pa ston mdzad cing // brdzun par yang ni ston mdzad
51a4(mdo): pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// bdun ni bye ba phrag brgya yis// dge 'dun dbye bar myi nus kyang // dge 'dun dbyen ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos gang yang ni ma bslabs la//
51a5(mdo): ma bslabs pa yang gang yang myed// slob dang myi slob ston mdzad pa 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'dus byas rnams ni ngo bo nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis grol bcings myed// 'on kyang rnam par grol
51a6(mdo): ba ston// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mya ngan 'ad// sa la 'gro myed kyang // dgra bcom de ni 'gro 'ong zhes// sems can rnams la de bstan pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin//
51a7(mdo): don dang don byin gyi gzigs pa// 'gog pa dang ni dam pa'i don// spro ba rnams kyi mchog gsung ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// dngos po myed pa gsal ba'i dngos// rnyog pa myed par rab skyon kyang /
51a8(mdo): chos rnams chud za myed ces pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos rnams thams cad brjod byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pas rab mkhyend kyang // brjod pa dag ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'dun
51a9(mdo): 'jug yin// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa chags myi mnga'// dus rnams kun tu mnyam bzhag kyang // dbang po rnams ni skyed mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sku//
51b1(mdo): sangs rgyas cung zad myi sgrung yang // dge slong byang chub yan lag spros pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// sdig pa thams cad yongs zad de// bsod nams kun gyis mngon 'phags kyang // las kyi rgyud ni ston
51b2(mdo): mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// skyob pa sangs rgyas dus gsum la// mthar thug 'gyur ba yod myed yang // mtshams gcod pa yang ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin//
51b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku ste// gcig ci 'dra bar de bzhin kur// 'on kyang tha snyad ston pa gang // 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yid// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos so so'i skye bo dang //
51b4(mdo): 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// tshig gi las kyis rab tu phye// sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te// chos kyi dbyings las byu/ nga yin yang // sangs rgyas zhing ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig
51b5(mdo): rten 'thun 'jug yin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsam myi khyab// de bzhin gshegs pa bsam myi khyab// sems can 'dul ba'i don kyi phyir// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin//
51b6(mdo): zag myed yod pa ma yin yang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos la// zag pa myed pa nyid gsung ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// mkhyend pas de dag gnyis myin la// dus gsum dag ni rnam gzigs
51b7(mdo): shing // gnyis kyi 'du shes ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// / sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang // sangs rgyas rig par su 'dod pa// de ni chos dbyings zhugs shig la// 'di ni 'jig rten
51b8(mdo): 'thun 'jug yin// skye ba myed pa bzod rten pa// rtag tu yang dag rab tu mkhyen// mkhyen nas rab tu ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rtag tu chos kyi dbyings mtshungs te// 'jug pa myed
51b9(mdo): cing 'byung myed kyang // 'gro dang gnas pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// myi skye ba la gcig pa 'am// mang po yod pa ma yin yang // sna tshogs rim pa stond mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig
52a1(mdo): des ldan na yin// deg/ sa dang su med kyang // sangs rgyal zhi nas dpag myed na// sra sum dag ni rnas ma dpa// 'di ni 'jig rten yun drug pani// phyongasasu kyis sa hA/ pas rgyas nin/
52a2(mdo): brjod bya ba// der ni skye ba ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// de bzhin gshegs pas dus kun tu// chos ni gnas par rab mkhyen kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'dug yin//
52a3(mdo): sangs rgyas 'od ni dpag myed cing // sku lus dpag tu myed myin yang // dpag tu yod par ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// chos kyi dbyings la mchog myed de// dus gsum dag tu stong nyid kyang //
52a4(mdo): mchog gi chos nas ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// zhigs pa myed cing skyes myed la// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gyur da kyang // bsreg pI skal pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug
52a5(mdo): chos kyi dbyings ni grub myed de// de la ngo bo nyid myed kyang // 'on kyang // nges par 'byung ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// gzigs pa ci yang myi mnga' la// lhag mthong kyis ni gzig gyur ci
52a6(mdo): lta ba thas cad ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin chos rnaMs kun la byed pa po// shind tu yod pa ma yin yang // byas dngam byas ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin
52a7(mdo): mya ngan 'das dang rna ma'ar ni// rgyal ba grangs su ma chud kyang // khas kyi grangs rnams ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// grangs myed snyoms nas brnyes 'gyur la// mthu las nyes la gyi mang
52a8(mdo): yang // zham ring ba dag 'tsho mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'dun 'jug yin// rnam yang byas pa'i sgo ldan dang // sangs rgyas 'dab myi mnga' yang // byis pa de dag 'dul mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thum
52a9(mdo): yin// yon tan ldan pa thos cad kyi// pha rol de bzhin gsheg byon kyang // de la da ni gzhan zhi ba// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// myi skye ba ni rtag tu skyes// de dag rgyu las byung myin yang // ma rig rkyen
52b1(mdo): kyis 'byung zhes pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rgyal ba rnyed dang bkur sti las// sgrib pa myed pa nyid brnyes la// cho ga shes pa ni ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'jig rte drug yin// gang na seMs can 'dul sngo pA//
52b2(mdo): snang ba deng ni 'dren pa rnams// de dag spyod pa ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rig pa gsuM kyi tshogs bstsags te// rig pa bskyed par nges par ston// 'di la mthong ba ci yang myed// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun
52b3(mdo): 'jug yin// 'jig rten sgron ma thas cad du// skye bo dpag tu myed pa 'dul// gling bzhi dag kyang ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// 'jig rten gsu po gang na yang // chos gang phung po gnas pa myed// 'on//
52b4(mdo): kyang chos grub bka' stsa lad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/ mtha' gsuM gyi ni ma par skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs rnaMs ston mdzad pa// sems can nas la rab ston pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin//
52b5(mdo): chos rnas kun gyi rgyud mkhyen nas// 'chi 'pho skye ba ni spangs la/ de dag thams cad ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yI// myi skye ba ni gang mthong ba// ma rika de ni ye shes 'gegs// rig/
52b6(mdo): pa skyed par ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin// rdzog pI sangs rgyas gcig yin yang // sems can yongs su sbyin bya'i phyir// 'byung ba dag ni bsam myi khyab// 'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug I//
52b7(mdo): gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus na thos 'gyur zhing // the tsom myed la shes 'gyur ba// de dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong // 'jig rten 'gon gyis de gsungs na// sras po 'dza bI dbyangs las stsogs// rab tu dag/
52b8(mdo): zhing yid rangs te// ston pa'i bka' la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'/ rdzogs so//
52b9(mdo): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// /
53a1(mdo): rgya gar skad du// a r+ya la li ta bi sta rnams pa ya na su rba// bod skad du// 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
53a2(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dka' ra ba na/ dge slong khri nyis sbyong gi dge slong
53a3(mdo): ki dge 'dun chen po la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u ri n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa brlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa myong chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan
53a4(mdo): ba grags sbyin dang / tshe dang ldan pa dri myed dang / tshe dang lnga na ba lag bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan par sang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan
53a5(mdo): ba chu klung 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gi bu che/ na po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
53a6(mdo): ba ka ta'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka byin chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma 'i bu kang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma
53a7(mdo): 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dka' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'ug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldengad nags dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod
53a8(mdo): rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro ba chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs dang / tshe dang
53a9(mdo): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag las stsogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
53b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par brtse ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad
53b2(mdo): thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams
53b3(mdo): cad rtogs par khong du chud pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la
53b4(mdo): zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzo gas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs
53b5(mdo): dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don grub blo gros
53b6(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang /
53b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po sems pa dang / de dag las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
53b8(mdo): sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig ko// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i sras dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang / chags
53b9(mdo): 'og gi rgyal phran dang / rgyal po'i zham 'bring ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi myi dang / grong khyer pa dang / yul gyi myi dang /
54a1(mdo): mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bla mar byas sti stang du byas mchod par byas so bcom ldan
54a2(mdo): 'das ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba gsod cing mang ba dang / na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gso sman dang / yo byad rung ba brnyes shing / bcom ldan 'das ni brnyes
54a3(mdo): ba dam pa dang / grags pa dam pa brnyes kyang / pad ma la chus myi gos pa ltar/ thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / snyan pa ni 'di skad du
54a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu
54a5(mdo): 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla na myed pa/ lha dang myi nam/ sa kye ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to// de ni spyan
54a6(mdo): lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pa ro la lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dku lha dang
54a7(mdo): phyir bcas pa dag/ rang gis mngon par mkhyend pas mngon du mdzad nas/ nye bar bsgrubs te/ rab tu stond to// de thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba za mar dge ba don bzang po
54a8(mdo): tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su dkar ba'i chos stond te/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
54a9(mdo): kyis ras kyi gung thun la sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la mnyam par gzhag par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de
54b1(mdo): sa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gi gseb nas/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la/ chags pa myed po'i ye shes snang
54b2(mdo): ba zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer byung ste/ des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ lha'i dbang phyug chen po las stsogs pa lha'i bu tshad myed pa dag yang dag par bskul to// de bzhin gshes
54b3(mdo): ba'i 'od kuzer gyi chogs de las bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo // / ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa// 'od bzang kazi brjid dam pa dri myed pa/ sku lus rab
54b4(mdo): thugs dge zhi ba po// shag kya seng ge thub dang 'phrad par gyi sa// ye shes rgya mtsho thub chen dag pa ste// chos kyi mnga' ba dag kun mkhyend thub pa'i dbang // myi dang lngas mchod lha'i
54b5(mdo): ltar gyur pa// chos la rang 'byung mnga' bdag mdzad pa/ rton// gang zhig gdul dka'i sems la mnga' mdzad de// gang // zhig bdud kyi snyi las grol ba'i thugs// de 'dir mthong thos
54b6(mdo): don myed ma yin gyis/ rnam grol mthar phyin da zhi ba'i drung du deng // mtshungs myed chos la sdang bar gyur pa ste// mun sel da tshul bzang stond par rab mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod bzhi
54b7(mdo): mkhyend pa dpag myed pa// de'i drung du dad pa mchog gis deng // de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong // de ni smra ba'i dpa' bo tshogs dran 'jom// de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas// de ni 'dren pa bla myed
54b8(mdo): lam stond pa'o// gnas gtsang ma'i ros kyi lho'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la/ chags pa myed po'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od gzer des phog cing tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa de lta bu
54b9(mdo): de dag gis kyang bskul ma thag tu/ rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bskal pa grangs myed/ tshad myed bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag las 'das pa'i sangs
55a1(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang
55a2(mdo): ba dag dang / chos bstand pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran par gyur da to// de nas de'i nub mo myi nyal tsam na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang
55a3(mdo): dka' bo dang / shind tu dka' bo dang / tsan dan dang / mchod byas dang / rab zhi dang / dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug las sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang mo'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po// kha dog 'pha/
55a4(mdo): shing shind tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa dag gis/ lho'i snang ba sa rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyi nad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/
55a5(mdo): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / gnas ka/ tsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
55a6(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shinang tu rgyas pa chen po bsdus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par
55a7(mdo): bstand pa/ dka' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'bab pa dang / ched du dgongs te lhums su 'jug pa'i rnam par rol pa dang / mngal gyi gnas kyi khyad par kun tu bstand pa/ rigs bzang por skye ba'i sa'i
55a8(mdo): mthu kun tu bstand pa/ byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las yon tan gyi khyad par gyis shinang tu 'da' ba bstand pa 'jig rten pa'i bzo' gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / yi ge dang / grangs dang /
55a9(mdo): lag rtsis rang rtsis dang / ral gyi'i thabs dang / 'phong dang / stabs dang / kyad kyi 'dzind stangs rnams/ sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa kun tu bstand pa btsun mo
55b1(mdo): 'khor dang / yul gyi long spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa kun tu bstand pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pas yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu bsnyes pa/ yongs su brjod pa byang chub seMs/
55b2(mdo): dpa' rnam par rold pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig pa bstand pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ nges par bstand pa
55b3(mdo): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sdom chad gsungs pa mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i bla ma dang / chos kyi tog dang / mar me mdzad dang / som tan gyi tog dang / yon tan gyi 'byungasas
55b4(mdo): dang / 'od gzer chen po dang / drang srong sa dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / bden pa'i tog dang / rdo rjes khregs dang / thams dkris kyis mnan dang / gser mdog dang / gni lham po
55b5(mdo): gshegs dang / byi ru rgya mtsho dang / me tog gi tog dang / gzu/ gas bzang dang / spyan bzang dang / drang srong sbed dang / dmag gi tshe/ gas las rgyal dang / mtho' ba dang / mye tog rgyal po dang
55b6(mdo): mdzod spu gzi brjid dang / shind tu rgyas dang / 'od gzer bzang po dang / bkra shis ldan dang / blta na bzang dang / seng ge'i gzi da chen po dang / blo brtan pas byin dang / sos ka'i spos dI dang
55b7(mdo): bden pa'i chos grags rgya chen dang / 'od ldan dang / skar rgyal dang / 'jig rten mdzes dang / 'od rgya chen dang / rin chen grags dang / drag zhul gzi'i brjid dang / rin cen gzi brjid dang / tshangs pa'i gzi'
55b8(mdo): brjid dang / sgra snyan dang / me tog bzang po dang / ri rab mye tog dang / rab tu yid 'ong dbyangs dang / dge tshul bzangs dang / rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang / yon tan phung po dang / 'phyag swa dang
55b9(mdo): dog mdzes dang / che'i gzi brjid dang / ngom bag glang po'i 'gros dang / 'jig rten mngon par smon dang / dgra las rgyal dang / yang dag mchod dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams
56a1(mdo): cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang / sngon chad gsungs pa lags na/ de
56a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / myi rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur
56a3(mdo): ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yang brjod pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang / bdud thams cad zi lad kyis mnan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstand pa dang / byang chub sems
56a4(mdo): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa skyed pa dang / dam po 'chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myi gcad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzos
56a5(mdo): pa yang kun tu bstand pa'i slad du/ bstan tu gsol zhes ka/ so lad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag dang / lha' dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang myi
56a6(mdo): gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag kyang / btso ma ldan 'das kyis cang myi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dka' ste/ dga' ba dang yid
56a7(mdo): bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / me tog man dA ra ba dag
56a8(mdo): gis kyang mngon par gtor te/ de nyid du myi snang bar gyur da to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'i nam dngas pa dang / smyig mo'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ka la ba der gshegs te byor nas/ bcom
56a9(mdo): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor dacing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun kyis bsdus te/ bdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
56b1(mdo): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsa la da pa/ dge slong dag ma dpa 'dir nga'i drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dka' bo dang / shin tu dka' bo dang / tsam
56b2(mdo): ngan dang / mchod byas dang / rab zhi dang / dul ba rab zhi dang / dbang phyug las sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shi nad tu mang po zhes bya ba nas/ de nyid du myi sdang bar gyur da ces
56b3(mdo): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das
56b4(mdo): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya cherarol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bstan tu gsol// de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
56b5(mdo): 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba mdzad pa dang / skye bo phal po chu/ dang / lha dang / myi rnams dang / da sngar dang / ma 'ongs pa na byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang
56b6(mdo): bde bar 'gyur ro zhes gsos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / rtswa dang / kyi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
56b7(mdo): la zugs brtse ba'i phyir/ cang myi gsung bas gnang ngo // des 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge slong dag pa ni ma dang gsum 'dir// gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs myed par
56b8(mdo): rab tu gnas gyur nga la// rtse gcig sems su mnyam par gzhag drung du// rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog bzang ldan la// ni myed dpal 'bar lho'i bu lpags nas// dpal kyis rgyal byed tshal 'di sdang byas te/
56b9(mdo): dga' bas nga'i gan du mngon par lhags// dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsan dan dang // dka' bo rab tu sems zhi mchod byas dang / shin tu dga'o zhi ba lha'i bu// bye ba lha mang de dag de dag rnams
57a1(mdo): nga'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal bskor byas te// nga'i mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par gyur // sor mo de dag thal sbyar dkus bcas par// de dag 'dir ni pal gsol btab// 'jig rten
57a2(mdo): kun la sman pa'i don slar du// rgyal ba kun kyis sngon chad kang gsungs pa// shind tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di// thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sku gzung
57a3(mdo): bzhed pas// phas kyi rgol dang bdud rnams 'dul mdzad la// theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsungs shing // thub pa deng slad legs par bshad du gsol// lha'i tshogs kyis gsol da pa de gnang phyir/ myi
57a4(mdo): gsung gyur da pas gnang ba mdzad pas na// thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas// dka' ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor// de phyir dge slong dag la rgyas pa'i mdo// 'jig
57a5(mdo): rten kun la phan pa'i don kyi phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ kyis sngon bshad pa// gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//
57a6(mdo): dge slong dag de la chos kyi rnam grangs shind tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ rgya tshor rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa/ mchod par bya bas mchod
57a7(mdo): pa dbang bskur ba thob pa/ lnga brgya stong kyim bstod cing bkur te/ brjod cing bsngags pa/ bams pa thob pa/ smon las kyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo
57a8(mdo): dang ldan pa ye shes kyi myig shi nang tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khros
57a9(mdo): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ tshangs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dka'
57b1(mdo): ba dang / btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa mngod par shes pa dang / rig pa chen pos sgrib pa myed cing / chags pa myed pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon tu gyur pa da/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu
57b2(mdo): 'grus kyi rkang ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi san sag dang / sas dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shind du yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar byin pa bsod rnams dang seshes kyi tshogs dpa
57b3(mdo): tu myed pa'i mtshan dang / dpe' byang 'bang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/ ji skad spras pa de ltar byed pas log pa myed pa'i tshig gi las yang dag par smrab/ drang zhing ma yos
57b4(mdo): sa mya myed pa'i yid thogs pa byed pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / zhum pa thams cad myed pa/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/
57b5(mdo): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu myed pa la bsnyen kur byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / mang pos dor blta zhing blta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa/ brgya byin
57b6(mdo): dang tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dIn dang / lha ma yin dang / namamakha' lding dang / srin po rnams kyis mngon par dka' bar bya bar/
57b7(mdo): grags pa dang ldan pa tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste bstand pa la/ thogs pa myed pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ gzung ba la dran
57b8(mdo): ba'i snod 'khrugs pa myed pa dang / gzungs mtha' yas su myed pa rab tu thob pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
57b9(mdo): yan lag dang / lam dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i chos rin po me dang / bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi gru chen po'i ded dpon chen po chu bo bzhi'i pha rol
58a1(mdo): 8/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shi nang tu tshar bcad pa/ g.yul ngo'i thog ma la rab tu 'dug pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'jom pa/
58a2(mdo): ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu bo 'jug pa'i bsam pas skyes pa zab cing brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa/ thabs
58a3(mdo): mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi ze ba can/ ting nge 'dzind kyi ze 'bru dang ldan pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa/ nga rgyal dang / dregs pa'i gzung
58a4(mdo): ba myed pa'i zla bas dI ma myed pa'i mdab ma rgyas pa/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa'i gsung gyi ngag phyogs bcur thogs pa myed par ldang ba/ 'jig rten na shes pa thu bor gyur da pa 'jig
58a5(mdo): rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa skyes bu chen po'i pad ma pa/ sod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis/ myig shin tu
58a6(mdo): rnam par dag pa'i pad ma brgya pa rgyas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sder mo dang / mche ba shin tu rnob/ tshangs pa'i
58a7(mdo): ga nas bzhi'i so drang por bsnyer ba/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shi nad tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa khong du chud pas/ rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa
58a8(mdo): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas shipa/ rig pa dang ye shes kyi the ba can/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum gyi kha gdangs pa zhi gnas dang lhag mtho
58a9(mdo): shind tu rnam par dag pa'i myig dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha dad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi phug na gnas pa/ spyod lam bzhi dang / 'dul ba'i nags tshal
58b1(mdo): dang / nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / nye ba'i stobs dang ldan pa/ skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang / spu g.yol ba myed pa/ tshal la zhum pa myed pa
58b2(mdo): segs can kyi zung bu da / ri dgas mang po'i tshigs rab tu 'jom pa/ byad myed par zla brjod pa'i seng ge'i ma chen po sgrogs / skyes nu ze genas pa grol pa dang / tham sa gtan gyi gyis 'khor la
58b3(mdo): shes rab kyi 'od dang / 'od gzer gyis mu stegs byed/ srin bu rtse khyer gyi tshogs 'od myed par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi sIb tog dang / rab rib myed par byed pa/ stobs dpa' rtson 'grus 'bar ba
58b4(mdo): lha dang myi'i nang du bsod nams kyi gzi'i brjid kyi gzi dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i nyi ma nag po'i phyogs myed pas/ dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong ba
58b5(mdo): myig gi dbang po la thogs pa myed pa/ lha brgya stong gis skar/ ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyand pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/ byang
58b6(mdo): chub kyi yan lag gi bde bas zla ba'i 'od gzer du gyur da pa myi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mu ta kha 'byed pa/ skyes zhun na po zla ba 'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'du
58b7(mdo): kyi rin po che dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/ blo thogs pa myed pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs shi nad tu phun sum tshogs shing rab tu rdzogs pas
58b8(mdo): khyad par du bogs 'byung bar bya ba'i bsam pa can/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa myed par bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyun 'byung ba/ chos kyi 'khor los
58b9(mdo): sbyar ba chen po rten cing 'breld par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba/ thos pas myi ngoms pas yangs shing rgya chel mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang / tshul
59a1(mdo): khrims kyi tshod las myi 'da' ba/ zo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur da pa/ sa dang / chu dang / mye dang / rlung dang / mnyam pa'i sems su gyur da pa ri rab ltar brtan zhing myi
59a2(mdo): g.yo' la/ bskyod par myi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa/ nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma myed cing yangs la 'dra ba myed par rgya che ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa can
59a3(mdo): tu yongs su dag pa/ sbyin pa legs par byin pa/ sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa/ lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/ bden pa'i rgyan kyis legs par rgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bstsal pa
59a4(mdo): gos par bya ba bgos pa dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par byas pa/ bskal pa grangs myed pa mdun du dge ba'i rang pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sbyin pa rnam pa bdun byin pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga la
59a5(mdo): shind tu bstend pa legs par spyad pa/ lus kyi rnam pa/ gsum/ ngag kri rnam pa bzhi yid kyis rnam pa gsuM spyad pa/ gyu da pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bstend pa dang ldan pa
59a6(mdo): yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa bsten par gyur da pa yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang lnga na ba'i smon lam btab pa lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi
59a7(mdo): bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa/ yang dag pa'i rnam par thard pa/ yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang / yang dag pa'i mos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa/ drang por byas pa/ sangs
59a8(mdo): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa yul bar gyur da pa rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa
59a9(mdo): sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa dag mtho' ris dang tha rad pa'i lam du btsud par gyur da pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa tshe gcig gis thogs pa 'di
59b1(mdo): nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa/ lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba/ lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ ring po myi thogs par bla na myed/
59b2(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ de shi nad tu mchod pa/ gzhal myed khang gnas su khri nyid rab tu gnas pa/ stegs bu dang bgam dang / rta babs dang skar khung
59b3(mdo): dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgre ba/ rin po che'i dril bu ga yer ka'i dra ba si bla res bres pa/ me tog man dar
59b4(mdo): dang / man dar ba chen po chal par bkram pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba wa ka khrig brgya stong klu dbyangs lend pa/ me tog a ti mug ta tsam pa ka dang / skya sngar dang / sa brtos dang / btang lung dag ta zung chen
59b5(mdo): po dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / n+ya kro dang / tin tu ka dang / a/ sa na dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / shing ke sa ra dang / ta ma nyepa dang / sa la dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan
59b6(mdo): ba gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog sdang 'od dang / ma li ka dang snga ma'i me tog dang / rab shi sha dang / ta ra ni dang / bo le dang
59b7(mdo): go ta ra ni dang / mchog tu dri zhim dang / da nus ka ri dang / lha'i snga ma'i me tog dang / ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / dA ra ba tu zhim pa'i bla res chen po phyogs phyogs su zes
59b8(mdo): pa/ bya 'dab sbyin dang / ne mo dang / ri skyegs dang / khu byuka dang / ngang pa dang / ma bya dang / ngur pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bying ka dang / shang shang de'u las 'tshogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byind pa/
59b9(mdo): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis myig mngon tu phyogs ste/ blta zhing ltad mor bya ba/ chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag par rdzogs pas 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod
60a1(mdo): pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / khro ba ra pa/ 'thab pa dang / khong khro ba myed par 'gyur ba/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dAn pa rgya che zhing gsal ba skye
60a2(mdo): ba'i gzhal myed khang chen po de na bde bar gnas shing / chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam 'byung ba dang / sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs
60a3(mdo): kyis yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 'byung ngo // bsod nams rgya chen tshogs mnga' dran rtogs dang // blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa// mtshungs myed stobs mnga' sku yal rgya
60a4(mdo): ba// mar mye mdzad kyis lung bstand dgongs par mdzod// rgya che na dri ma myed pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhi ba// dge ba rI myed rnam par dag pa'i thugs// sngon chad
60a5(mdo): ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod// zhi gnas tshul khrims rtul zhugs bzod pa dang // dul dang brtson 'grus bsam ga tan shes rab stobs// skald pa bye ba khrag khrig rnam spyad pa/
60a6(mdo): gyod rigs cher 'byung dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod// sem sa can rnams la thugs brtse mdzad gyur da cing // sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyod kyis mchod// dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig
60a7(mdo): grags mtha' yas// de dus lags kyis btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ rga shi nyon mongs 'jigs mdzad rdul bral ba// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha myin mang po dag kyang sdod lags kyis// 'chi
60a8(mdo): 'pho tshul mkhyend 'pho ba bstand par mdzod// skal pa stong du dka' ba spyad gyur kyang // rgya mtsho'i chu yis ji bzhin myi ngoms kyis// ngoms pa khyod kyi thugs dam dge ba ste// yun ring skom nyen skye bo che
60a9(mdo): bar mdzod// sman pa myed pa'i grags pa mnga' ba khyod// chos la dgos pas khyod dges 'dod myi dges// 'o nad kyang dri ma myed pa'i s+yad mnga' ba// sngar bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs brtse mdzod/
60b1(mdo): sna rnams bye ba khyod la chos thos pas// ngoms par 'gyur ba ma lags 'odan kyis kyang // ral dang gyi das gyu rad pa'i ngan song du// gnas par gyur da pa bdag la gzigs su gsol// dri ma myed pa'i dargyan mnga'
60b2(mdo): phyogs bcu'o// 'jig rten dag gis sangs rgyas gzigs gyur da cing // de dag rnams las chas gsan chos mchog ste// 'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod// dpal ldan khyod kyi bsod nams dpal gyis ni
60b3(mdo): dka' ldan pho brang shind tu mdzes mod kyi// 'on kyang thugs rje thugs dang ldan pas na/ 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob// brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub reg ces te// 'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa
60b4(mdo): gzugs kyi khams lha rnams gang 'khod pa// du ma thams cad mngon par rab tu dka'// mgon po khyod kyis bdud kyi las na mas 'jom// khyod gzhan mu stegs can rnams 'pham mdzad de//
60b5(mdo): khyod ni byang chub phyag mthil bzhag dang 'dra// de dus lags kyi/ sa btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ nyon mongs rab tu 'bar ba/ 'i 'jig rten la// dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltar khyab mdzad de/
60b6(mdo): bdud ci char pa mngon par rab tu phob// lha myi rnams kyi nyon mo ngas zhi bar mdzod// khyod ni sman pa sman la mkhas pa ste/ yun ring nad pa sman pas bor ba yi// sems can rnam thard gsum/
60b7(mdo): kyi sbyar sman gyisamya ngan 'das pa'i bde la myur du khod// seng ge'i ngaro thos par ma gyu rad pas// wa rnams 'jigs pa myed par sgra sgrogs kyis// sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra ni rab sgrogs te// mu stegs
60b8(mdo): can gzhan wa rnams skrag par mdzod// sa'i dkyil na stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi// stobs ldan phyag na shes rab sgron ma bsdams// phyag mthil dam pas sa la brdab mdzod de// 'di rnams khyod kyis rab
60b9(mdo): tu 'pham par mdzod// gang dag khyod la lhung bzed 'bul ba'i// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po sdod cing mchis// khyod bltam gang dag len par 'gyur ba'i// brgya byin tshangs pa khrag khrig sdod cing mchis// blo gros
61a1(mdo): bzang po rigs chen rigs ldan pa// kapa la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa'i// spyod pa ston 'gyur dam pa rigs skyes pa// rigs kyi nang na btsun pa'i rigs la gzigs// sdod gyur dka
61a2(mdo): du nor bu rin po che// bzhag na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin// nor bu rin chen lta bur dI myed zugs// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob// glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'di lta'i// tshigs su bcad pa
61a3(mdo): mang po 'byung 'gyur nas/ 'di ni dus lags btang snyoms ma mdzad ces/ snying rje'i yid dang ldan la bskul bar byed// yang dag par spro bar bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
61a4(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dus de lta bus yang dag par skul pa dang / gzhal myed khang chen po de nas byung ste/ chos kyis mtho' ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po gang du/ byang
61a5(mdo): chub sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston/ da pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' zhugs so// zhugs/ nas kyang seng ge'i khri chos bzang po zhes bya ba la 'dug go//
61a6(mdo): de nas lha'i bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' dang / skal pa ma nyam pa theg pa mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang khang bzangs de nyid du zhugs so// gang yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs
61a7(mdo): bcu nas 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang spyod pa 'dra ba dag dang / lha'i bu de dag kyang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams bstsal cing / lha'i bu 'phel rnams kyang bstsal nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa 'thun pa'i
61a8(mdo): 'khor can du byas te/ 'khor bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang / khang bzangs der zhugs nas/ so so ci rigs par rang rang gi seng ge'i khri la 'khod par gyur da to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub seMs
61a9(mdo): dpa' lo bcu gnyis na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ gnas katsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'dzam bu kling du lpags nas lha'i kha rog myi sdang bar byas te/ bram ze'i cha byad du bsgrus
61b1(mdo): nas bram ze rnams rig byed slob du 'dzud de/ gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bur mngal du zhugs par gyur da na/ de ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de dag dang ldan na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur
61b2(mdo): kyi/ gsum du 'gyur ba byed de/ de gal te khyim la gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur da te/ de'i rin po che
61b3(mdo): sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo ring po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bud myed rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun no// 'khor los
61b4(mdo): ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyu ra zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bgaso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la/ mgo bkrus byas te dbu'
61b5(mdo): gzungs su gnas shing / steng gi khyams na bud myed kyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/ shar nga phyogs nas lha'i 'a/ khor lo rin po che chibs stong yod pa/ mu khyud dang ldan pa lte ba dang
61b6(mdo): bcas pa thams cad gser las grub pa/ 'akar bas ma byas pa 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam nas 'byung ste/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ kwa'i 'kho mo rin po che de mthong nas/
61b7(mdo): snyam du sems te bdag gis zos pa rgyal po rgyal rig+sa kyi bo nas dbang skur pa/ gso sbyong kyi nyis ches bamos mgo 'akrus byas te/ dbu gzungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na/ bud myed kyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor
61b8(mdo): cing 'dug pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'byung bar 'gyur na/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos nas/ bdag gi rlung du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'ongs pa las na/ bdag kyang /
61b9(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin du nges so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi bo nas dbang bskurd pa de/ pra gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ lag pa gas
62a1(mdo): pas lha'i 'khom lo rin po che de bskor zhing 'di skad du/ btsun pa lha'i 'khor lo rin po che chos kyis skor cig/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang / den sa lha'i 'khong sa di
62a2(mdo): po che de rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi lo nas dbang bskur bas bskor pas// rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' yas shar phyogs su legs par 'gro ste/ rgyal po 'khor los sbyar ba yang dpung kyi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig
62a3(mdo): tu rjes su 'gro'o// sa'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che gnas par gyur pa der rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa de yang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
62a4(mdo): de nas shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de rdul gyi sdod ni gser gyi phyems/ nga ste thogs/ gser gyi snod ni rdul sil mas bka/ pa ste thogs nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsu zhing 'di skad
62a5(mdo): du lha 'dir legs par gshegs so// lha tshur gshegs su// gsol// lha'i chab srid ni shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde ste/ lo legs shing nyams dges la skye bo mang po dang / myis bltam
62a6(mdo): ga lags na/ lha nyid kyi yul du byon na bzhugs su gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bsku rang pas/ khams kyi rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du khyed rang rang
62a7(mdo): kyi rgyal srid dag chos kyis dab kyis shig/ chos ma yin pas ma yin no// khyod srog chags ma gsod cig/ ma byin par ma len cig/ 'dod pas log par gsem pa ma byed cig/ brdzun du ma swA zhig/ sku
62a8(mdo): mthar cig/ drag grub po ma smra zhig/ cig byul bas smra zhig/ brlab sems can du ma gyur daci/ nod sems cad du ma gyur dacin/ log par lta bar ma gyur da cig/ srog gcod pal byams par ma gyur dacig
62a9(mdo): par lta ba can gyi khams byams par ma gyur da cig/ nga'i yul du chos ma yin pa byung ba re/ chos ma yin pa pyod pa la byams par ma byed cig ces bsgo nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi kho nas dbang bskur bas// de ltar
62b1(mdo): shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// shar phyogs su rgyal bar byas nas/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtshor 'gro mo// shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las song nas/ shar gyi rgya mtshol las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang lho phyogs
62b2(mdo): su nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis legs par 'gro ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung kyi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o// snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// lce phyogs su ji lta
62b3(mdo): ba de bzhin du/ nub phyogs dang byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshol la 'gro'o// byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las
62b4(mdo): rgal lo// rgal nas kyang nam mkhal las rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po pho brang du legs par 'ongs nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo'i steng du nyams pa myed par gnas te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
62b5(mdo): pa m+bi 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor/ gos sbyar ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po chernam par mi lta bu dang ldan pa yin// zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i glang
62b6(mdo): po rin po che snga ma bzhin du/ byung ste thams cad thal kar du gyur da pa yan lag bdun shi nang tu gnas pa/ gtsug gser gyis brgyan pa ser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi rgyand kyis brgya nad pa
62b7(mdo): gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' las 'gro ba/ rnam par spruld pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar glang po'i rgyal po byang chub ces bya'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
62b8(mdo): pa/ glang po rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyi ma shar kar glang po rin po che de la zhon te/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa/ kun tu bskor da te rgyal po
62b9(mdo): 'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/ khye'u sus kyi dka' ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni// glang po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan
63a1(mdo): ba yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi lo nas dbang bskur po'i rta rin po che snga ma bzhin du byung ste/ thams cad sngon por gyurd pa/ mgo gnag pa rngog ma lcang lor 'dug pa/ bzhon na gus par byed/
63a2(mdo): pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa/ gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' las 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin kyi
63a3(mdo): shugs can zhes bya'o// gang ki tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs phyi bo nas dbang bskur pa/ rta rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyurd pa de'i tshe/ nyi ma shar kar rta rin po che de la zhon nas/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa
63a4(mdo): rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa/ kun tu bskor te phyir rgyal po'i pho brang bu 'khor nas/ khye'u sus kyi bde ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rta rin po chen pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//
63a5(mdo): 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang / ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bsku ra pa'i nor bu rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad du sngo
63a6(mdo): ba/ bye dur+ya'i rang bzhin zur brkyang du 'dug pa shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis/ btsun mo la 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe rgyal po
63a7(mdo): rgyal rigs kyi bo nas dbang bskur dpa' nor bu rin po che de brtag par 'dod par gyur pa'i tshe/ mtshan mo nas kyi kung la mun pa mun nag kyi nang du/ nor bu rin po de rgyal mtshan gyi che mo la btags te/ bskyed mos tshal
63a8(mdo): kyis bzang po blta ba'i phyir song na/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang bas gsal bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che de'i
63a9(mdo): 'khor na gnas pa'i myi de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong / gcig gis gcig shes nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad smras te/ bzhin bzangs dag longs las kyi

63b2(mdo): xxx
63b3(mdo): yar myi ring ba bcang yang kyi khung ba/ ha cang yang kyi sgom pa/ bcang yang myi skyes pa/ nyathams pagyi dkar ba/ gtsang yang kyi gnag pa// gzugs mdzes pa/ tshul zhugs pa ga/ 'amug pa 'jig pa 'o
63b4(mdo): rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ de'i lha'i khrung bu thams ca nasatsan da kyi dri 'byung ba/ 'anas mum la pa'i ngad snga / na dri'i gos sna reg bdes/ de grang ba'i nus na ni sum la regs
63b5(mdo): rlob/ sngo ba'i dus na lus la reg na/ bsil ba ste/ de 'a'or/ los sbyar ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan la yid kyis kyang 'do// dachags su myi byed na/ lus kyis ga/ ci spos te/ 'khor lo sa
63b6(mdo): sbyar ba'i rgyal po ni bud byed rin po/ chenas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyim bdag rin po chepa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs kyi
63b7(mdo): ba nas dbang bskur pa'i khyim bdag rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/ lha'i myig dang ldan pa 'byung ngo // de lha'i myig des dpag tshad 'khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas pa'i
63b8(mdo): gter dag kyang mthong / bdag po myed pa'i gter dag kyang mthong ste/ de bdag po myed pa'i gter gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni khyim bad
63b9(mdo): rin po chen po rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los skur ba'i rgyal po blon po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/
64a1(mdo): mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des bsams pa tsam gyis skor bar bya ba'i dpung rnams bsko'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po na blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang /
64a2(mdo): ldan pa yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun de dag dang ldan pa yin no// de la bu stong 'byung ste dpa' ba brtul phod pa/ yan lag gi mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa sha stag
64a3(mdo): ste/ des rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba myed cing / 'tshe ba myed pa 'di nyid chad pa myed cing mtshon gyis gdab pa myed la/ chos kyis legs par phab ste gnas so// gal te khyim nas khyim
64a4(mdo): myed par rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi drin myi 'jog pa/ lha dang / myi rnams kyi ston par 'gyur ro// zhes rig byed 'don tu 'dzud do//
64a5(mdo): de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'dzam bu gling du lhags shing / rang sangs rgyas dag la skul ma 'debs te/ 'phags pa dag da ste lo bcu gnyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug
64a6(mdo): gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'or cig ces zer ro// dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ mjug ma sgyur ba zhe sa bya ba'i ri la rang sangs rgyas glang po zhes bya ba 'dug pas sgra de thos
64a7(mdo): nas rdzo ba'i steng du 'jig la bya ba bzhin du 'jug ste/ nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags so// rkyen du 'phags nas kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgron ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so//
64a8(mdo): de'i 'khris pa dang bad kan dang chu rgyus dang rus pa dang / sha dang khrag tu gyurd pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni myes yongs su zad par gyur da te/ ring srel 'ba'i sheg sa la lhags nas/ rkang rjes de dag ni da dung du yang drang srong kyi
64a9(mdo): rjes shes grags te yod do// dge slong dag de'i tshe yul ba ra na se'i ri dgas kyi nags drang srong ltung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sma de thos nas nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam du srid du gyen du 'phakra
64b1(mdo): nas/ mye'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgron ma bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de dag gi khrim pa dang ban kad dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang khrag tu gyur da pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni myes yongs su
64b2(mdo): zad par gyur da te/ ring bsrel 'bru'o gag sa la lpags so// de ltar 'dir drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes de phyin cang drang srong ltung ba zhes bya ba yang / drang srong lhung ba drang srong ltung ba zhes mying du gyur da to// myi 'jigs pa byin pa'i
64b3(mdo): dgam dag kyang de na gnas pas de phyin chad ri dgas kyi nags zhes bya ba yang ri dgas ri dgas kyi nags shes mying du gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'dug pa ni rnam par lta ba
64b4(mdo): chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste dus rnam par lta ba dang / gli la rnam par lta ba dang / yul la rnam par lta ba dang / rigs la rnam par lta ba'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub
