128b7(mdo): tshe byang chub sems dpa'i bzhon par glang po dkar po bong shi nad tu che ba zhig grong khyer du khrid pa/ gzhon nu lhas byin gyis mthong nas/ phrag dog dang shag kya'i nga rgyal dang / stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dregs nas/
128b8(mdo): des glang po de la ka pa g.yon pas snga nas bzung ste/ lag pa g.yas pas thal mo lan cig bsnun pas bsad par gyur da to// de'i 'og tu gzhon du mdzes dka' bo byung ba dang / des glang po che cheran po de grong khyer
128b9(mdo): kyi sgor bsad pa mthong nas/ sus bsad ces dris pa dang / spras pa/ lhas byid kyis bsad do// smras pa/ lhas sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes/ des glang po de'i mjug ma nas bzung
129a1(mdo): ste/ grong khyer gyi sgo nas gud du bor ro// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la zhon te byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa mthong ngo // mthon nas kyang sus bsad rjes dris/
129a2(mdo): pa dang / lhas sbyin gyis bsad do// smras pa/ lhas sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so// grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas sus bor// zhes dris pa dang / smras pa/ mdzes dga' bos bor ro// smras pa/ mdzes dgra
129a3(mdo): bos de ltar byas pa'ang legs na/ sems can 'di ni lus chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rul na grong khyer thams cad dri mya zhim pas gang bar 'gyur ro zhes// de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta la 'dug bzhin du/ rkang pa ya tsig
129a4(mdo): sa la brkyang ste/ rkang pa'i mthe' zos glang po de blangs te/ ra ba bdun rim dang / 'obs bdun rim bzlas nas/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grags gcig tsam du 'phangs so// glang po de phyogs
129a5(mdo): kang du ltung ba'i phyogs de gshongs chen po zhig tu gyur da na sa/ de ltar glang po gshongs zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe lha dang myi ba/ rgya stong mang po/ e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / maco dang gzha'i
129a6(mdo): sgra brgya stong 'byin la/ gos kyi g.yab mo 'byind par gyur da to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// glang po'i dbang po mdo ba bzhin bzhud pa//
129a7(mdo): zhabs kyi mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs// ra ba bdun dang 'obs bdun yongs bzlas nas// grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs// mkhyend pa'i mchog mnga' 'dis ni gdon myi zar// nga rgyal stobs
129a8(mdo): kyi mtho' ba'i lus can rnams// 'khor ba'i grong nas phyi rol da rgyang ring du// shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'phen par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas shag kya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam grong khyer nas 'thon nas/ so'i
129a9(mdo): phyogs gang du shag kya gzhon nu dag sgyu mal stond pa der dong ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shag kya rgan rabs rgan rabs dag dang / skye bo phal po che dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' dang shag kya gzhon nu
129b1(mdo): gzhan dag gi sbru phal gyi khyad par mthong bar 'dod de/ sa'i phyogs der dong ngo // de nas thog mar gag kya gzhon nu yi ge mkhas shing yi ge'i cho ga shes pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpar yi ger 'gran to//
129b2(mdo): de'i tshe shag kya de dag gi slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen dbang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas yi ge 'bru 'am/ yi ge snga grangs kyi mthar phyi nad pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyod kyis bye bras
129b3(mdo): bye shig/ de nas slob dpon kun kyi bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' yi ke la mkhas par mngon tu mthong bas// bzhin 'dzum pa bstand te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smos so// myi'i 'jig rten lha'i 'jig
129b4(mdo): rten rnam lha myin 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam// 'di ga rten kun gyi yi ge ji snyed gang // de la sems can dag pa 'dis mthar phyind// myi'i zla ba 'di yis gang mkhyen pa'o// yi ge dag dang la
129b5(mdo): ke sA grangs kyi/ mying yang khyed dbangs ni yod myi shes/ 'di la mngon gsum ngas zhes 'di rgyal 'gyur// shag kya rnam/ sa kyis smras pa// gzhon nu 'di yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du
129b6(mdo): 'phags pa lnga 'anga' phags par chug ste/ gzhon nu 'di grangasakyi zhes pa la khyad par ci yod sman par bya'o// de nas zhag tu srid sgrub ces bya ba/ rtsis pa chen po byed pa/ bgrang ba dang rtsis kyi
129b7(mdo): pha rol tu phyi nad pa zhig yod pa de dbang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi nang nas grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par du gang 'phags/ khyod kyis ltos shig ces byas te/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas ni chis 'gro
129b8(mdo): phogagag kya gzhon nu gcig gis rtsis pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la slebs par ma nus so// de nas shag kya gzhon nu gnyis dang // sum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu
129b9(mdo): dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas shag kya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu chis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la ma slebs so// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis ni ches
130a1(mdo): 'go po ga shig/ kho khos ni 'chi'o// de'i tshe shag kya gzhon nu gcig gis cis 'go phog na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa chis kyis chod pa la ma slebs so// de nas shag kya gzhon nu gnyis dang /
130a2(mdo): gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas shag kya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis/ dus gcig tu cis 'gro phog kyang / byang chub sems dpas cis
130a3(mdo): kyis chod pa la ma slebs so// byang chub sems dpa' sa smras pa/ 'di la bcad de 'ang ci rung gyis/ khyed thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ tshis 'go phog shig dang / kho bos bachi'o// de nas shag kya gzhon nu lnga
130a4(mdo): brgyas tshigs gcig tu brjod pas snga phyi myed par chis mgo phog/ na/ byang chub sems dpa'as rmongs pa myed par bgyis te/ de ltar shag kya gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni phug thug par gyur da// byang
130a5(mdo): chub sems dpa' la ni thug pa'i mtha' myed par gyur to// de nas chis pa chen po srid grub ngo mtshar du gyur da te/ tshigs su 'aH/ da pa 'di dag smras so// legs pa'i blo mngal 'di dris na//
130a6(mdo): mkhyend pa shi nad tu myur ba ste// shag kya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam// kun kyang kyis kyi lam la thug/ de'i shes rab 'di 'dra ste// me shes blo gros dran ldan yang // cis kyi mkhye nad pa rgya mtsho de/
130a7(mdo): da dung sbyong zhing slob pa mdzad// de nas shag kyi'i tshogs thams cad po mtshar du gyurd te/ shind tu rmad du byung bar sems shipe/ de'i tshe thams cad mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kye don grub gan
130a8(mdo): ru khyod ni rgyal lo rgyal lo// zhes thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod la sras
130a9(mdo): de ltar dris pa la spobs pa myur zhing mgyog la yab ni shugs dang ldan rna ma da ba ni brnyes pa lags par brnyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// bu chis pa chen
130b1(mdo): chen po srid sgrub grangs kyi zhes pa la mkhas pa dang / chis kyi lugs 'gran nus sam/ smras pa lha rdo thog go// smras pa 'on chis shig/ de nas chis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la
130b2(mdo): 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu khyod bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa zhes bgyi ba'i mis kyi lugs mkhyend tam/ smras pa zhes so// smras pa/ 'o na bye ba las brgyar gong du bsgres pa'i chos kyi lugs la
130b3(mdo): ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa// bye ba phrag brgya ther 'bum zhes bya'o// zer 'bum phrag brgya na khrag khrig zhes bya'o// khrag khrig phrag brgyan gtams pa zhes bya'o//
130b4(mdo): gtams pa phrag brgyan dkrigs pa zhes bya'o// dkrigs pa phrag brgyan myi 'khrugs zhes bya'o// myi 'khrugs phrag brgyan khyan phyin ces bya'o// khyad phyin phrag brgyan bang steng zhes bya'o/
130b5(mdo): pang steng phrag brgyan mang 'dzin ces bya'o// mang 'dzin phrag brgyan glang po'i stobs zhes bya'o// glang po'i stobs phrag 'phyan ngogs thob ces bya'o// ngogs thob phrag brgyan rnam par
130b6(mdo): gzhag pa gdags pa zhes bya'o// rnam par gzhag pa phrag ban chu rig ces bya'o// rgyu rig phrag brgyan lag sbyin zhes bya'o// laka sbyin phrag brgyan rgyu dbang zhes bya'o// rgyu dbang phrag brgyar
130b7(mdo): rdzogs thob zhes bya'o// rdzogs thob phrag brgyan bgrang rtogs zhes bya'o// brlang rtogs phrag brgyar sgrib pa zhes bya'o// sgrib pa phrag brgyan stobs zhes bya'o// stobs phrag brgyan kun stobs zhes bya'o//
130b8(mdo): kun stobs phrag brgyan rnam par brda shes ldan zhes bya'o// rnam par brda shes ldan phrag brgyan brda shes kun ces bya'o// brda shes kun phrag brgyan rnam 'byung zhes bya'o// rnam 'byung phrag brgyan de'i mtshan
130b9(mdo): nyid ces bya ste/ 'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i chos kyis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'chi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo // // de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi che mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de
131a1(mdo): grangs des ni gang ka'i klud kyi bye ma snyed pachi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo // de'i gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang kong na ded 'dren gdags
131a2(mdo): pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang gong na gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i yang kong na gcod rtog ces bya ba'i grangs yod do// de'i A gon gcod gtogs ldan zhes bya ba'i grangs yod
131a3(mdo): de'i yang go na thams cad rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i grangs yod de/ grangs des ni kang ka'i klung bcu' bzhi'i bye ma snyed bachis pa'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo // de'i yang kong na snying po mchog ces bya
131a4(mdo): grangs yod de/ grangs des ni gang ka'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma dar mnyam pa bachi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chud par rung ngo // de'i ya dgong na rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya bo'i grang
131a5(mdo): yod de/ grangs de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / chos pa mas cad la dbang bskur pa mngon tu gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
131a6(mdo): ma gtogs par sems cad kyi ris na grangs de shes pa ni nga dang / gzhan yang nga dang 'dra bar srid pa tha ma par gyur da pa/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par ma byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par
131a7(mdo): gang yang myed do// srid sgrub kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rdul phra rab la 'dug pa'i rjes su song ba'i grangs la ji ltar rjes su 'jug par bgyi// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul bdun pa ni/ rdus phra/
131a8(mdo): mo gcig go// rdul phra mo bdun la ni chu klung gcig go// chu klung bdun la ni nyi zer rdul gcig go// nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong kyi rdul gcig go// ri bong kyi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go// lug rdul
131a9(mdo): bdun la ni kleng rdul gcig ko// glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma ga tsa ke kau// sro ma bdun la ni yongs 'bru gcig go// yongs 'bru bdun la ni nas gcig go// nas bdun la ni sor gcig go// sor bcu gnyis la
131b1(mdo): mtho' gang ngo // mtho'i ro la ni khru gang po// khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo // ga'u stong la ni yul ma ka da'i rgyang grags gcig ko// rgya bgrags bzhi la ni dpag tshad gcig go// de la khyod kyi nang nas dpag tshad la rdul phra ram
131b2(mdo): de lta bu du yod sus shes/ srid sbub kyis spras pa/ gzhon nu bdag nyid kyang de la mgo mongs na/ gzhan blo chung ngu dang ldan la lta spos kyang mi 'tshal// de bas na gzho nus dpag tshad la rdul phra rab de lta bu du mchis bshad
131b3(mdo): du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' sa smras pa/ re la dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab myi 'khrugs khrag khrig gcig dang / bye ba khraka khrig 'bum phrag sum bcu dang / bye ba drug bcu phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sum bcu
131b4(mdo): gnyis dang / 'bum phrag lnga dang khri nyis stong yod de/ dpag tshad la ni rdul phra rab de snyed cig yod do// de ltar 'jug pa des 'jam bu'i gling 'di la ni dpag tshad bdun stong yod do// nub kyi ban
131b5(mdo): lang khyod la ni dpag tshad brgyad stong yod do// shar gyi lus 'apaklas po la ni dpag tshad dgu stong yod do// byang gi sgra myi na la ni dpag tshad khri yod de/ de ltar 'jug pa des gling bzhi pa
131b6(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las mtshogs pa/ gling bzhi pa chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po ba phrag brgya dang / 'khor yug dpa'akhor yug chen po bye ba phrag
131b7(mdo): brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rib bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum bcu ma gsum bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / dka' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang
131b8(mdo): 'phrul dka' bye ba phrag brgya dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs ris bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs cher bye ba phrag brgya dang
131b9(mdo): 'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad myed 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad myed dge bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sprin myed bye ba
132a1(mdo): phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can 'du shes myed pa byed phrag brgya dang / myi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / myi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /
132a2(mdo): nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shind tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'og myin gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig ces bya ste/ yangs shing rgya che ba'o// de la dpag tshad
132a3(mdo): du yod pa dang / dpag tshad brgya phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad stong phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad bye ba phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad zer 'bum phrag du yod pa dang / dpag tshad khrig khrig du yod pa dang / de
132a4(mdo): bzhin du sbyar da te/ dpag tshad snying po dam pa'i chos kyi bar du thug pa la rdul phra rab de lta bu du yod ces bya ba'i mis de ni sra/ ngas dang / bgrang ba las 'das pa ste/ de ni grangs myed pa
132a5(mdo): zhes bya'o// de bas kyang shin tu grangs myed pa de snyed kyi rdul phra rab ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na yo/ do// byang chub seme dpas chis kyi le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/
132a6(mdo): rtsis pa chen po srad sgrub dang / shag kya'i tshogs thams cad kyangatshim zhing maku la yid rangs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/ de dag thams cad kyang gos re re zhig bzhag ste/ gos dang rgyan
132a7(mdo): lhag ma gzhan byang chub sems dpa' la yon du phul lo// de nas rmis pa chen po srid sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// bye ba brgyan ther 'bum zer 'bum de bzhin du/ khrag khrig dang ni bstams
132a8(mdo): pa'i rgyud dang de bzhin du// dkrigs pa myi 'azhugs bdag ki shes thub de gong myin// mtshungs pa myed kyi mkhyend pa chis la de bas lhag/ yang kye shag kya dag/ stong gsum dag gi rdul dang hA dang nags tshal
132a9(mdo): dang // sman dang chu'i thigs pa ci snyed yod pa yang // phang zhes bya ba gcig gis bya ba gcig la 'di yis ci nus na// lnga brgya tsam dag gi lha ngo mtshar ci zhig che// de nas lha dang myi brgya stong dag e ma a
132b1(mdo): la la zhes zer zhing maco dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod do// dus gsum sems can ma lus ji snyed gang yod pa'i// sems dang
132b2(mdo): sems byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa dang // mchog dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag/ thams cad sems kyi 'gyur ba gcig gis rab tu mkhyend// dge slong dag de ltar shag kya gzhon nu de dag thams cad zil
132b3(mdo): kyis no non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig khyad par 'phags par myurd to// de'i rjes la mchongs pa dang / rgyal dang bang las btogs pa thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par du 'phags par
132b4(mdo): gyurd nas nam mkha'i dkyil nas/ lha'i bu dag gis tshigs su baHda pa 'di dag smras so// brtul shugs dka' thub sdom pa'i yon tan dang // bskal dpa bye ba bzod dul byams stobs kyis// lus dang /
132b5(mdo): sems ni ci nas yang mdzad pas// de'i shugs kyi khyad par mnya/ bar gyis// sems can mchog 'di grong khyer 'di na bzhugs par khyed kyis mthong // 'on kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig
132b6(mdo): rten khams rnams thams cad du// skad cig gcig la rin chen gser dang mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// rgyal ba dpag tu myed pa dag la mchod pa mdzad du gzhung// 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba sa
132b7(mdo): pa de// byon tam bzhud par khyed kyis yod myi shes// ci tsam zhugs shes de la ci zhig bskyed// 'di ni mtshungs pa myed kyis rim gro skyed// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur da to//
132b8(mdo): de nas shag kya de dag gis smras te/ gzhon nu 'phel stobs kyi khyad par mi yod pa'ang sad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ shag kya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig
132b9(mdo): tu so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur da te/ shag kya gzhon sum bcu ra gnyis shig 'tshigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la brgal pa ltar chas te 'khod do// de'i nang nas dga' bo dang kun dga' bo gnyis kyis
133a1(mdo): kyis byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal pa'i phyir drung du phyind pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag gis reg ma thag tu de gnyis kas kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / gzi brjid ma bzod de sa la 'gyes/
133a2(mdo): to// de'i/ 'og tu shag kya gzhon nu lha sbyin pa rgyal can mthu snyems pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang / shaka kya'i nga rgyal gyis snyems la/ byang chub sems dpa' la sngo zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i ltad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor
133a3(mdo): la bskor da te/ bsgyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brga lad to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'as ma brtabs shing myi rings par stangs bzang por gzhon nu lha sbyin lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste/ bsad
133a4(mdo): pa'i blos ma yin gyi nga rgyal gcag pa'i phyir/ byams pa'i sems kyis nam mkha' la bskor ba bskor te/ sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa myed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa
133a5(mdo): de lta bur gnod par 'gyur bas chog gis/ thams cad gcigatu bdus te rgald par gyis shig/ de nas de dag thams cad pa/ rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur da to//
133a6(mdo): de nas de dag byang chub sems dpa' la reg ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang / gzi' brjid dang lus kyi mthu ma bzod de/ byang chub sems dpa'as reg pa tsam gyis sa la
133a7(mdo): 'gye lad par gyur da to// de nas lha dang myi brgya stong de dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / maco dang ka zha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo // nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod po'i lho'i bu dag gis kyang me tog gi char chen po
133a8(mdo): mngon par phab ste// dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// / phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag khyad chen stobs po che 'dra la// cig char skyes bu'i mchodag
133a9(mdo): la rub gyur kyang // reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyeld par 'gyur// lhun po ra rab rdo rje 'khor yus dang // phyogs bcu'i ngag tu ri gzhan gang yod pa// lag pas mnyes shing dmyigs mye dbyer klog na
133b1(mdo): myi lus snying po myed pa mtsharang ci che// 'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdang ba'i khyang // dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mtshan sder bcas pa// nag po'i pha lag byams pa'i stobs kyis 'jom// bla myed byang chub
133b2(mdo): zhi bar 'chang yang rmya// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur da to// de nas shag kya lag na be con gyis/ shag kya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di dag ni sad kyi
133b3(mdo): zin/ mthong yang zin gyis/ da ni 'phong zhig bstan du par gyis shig/ de'i tshe kun dka' bos rgyang grags gnyis kyi pha rol tu ljags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhin
133b4(mdo): pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga cig 'byin du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu mdzes dka' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol da tu lcags kyi rnga cig2byin du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu shag kya lag na be con gyis dpag
133b5(mdo): tshad gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga cig 'ben du btsugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa rkyang grags bcu'i pha ros tu lcag/ sa kyi rnga cig 'byen du btsugs te/ de'i drung du shing ta la bdun dang /
133b6(mdo): nas de'i pha rol du sngags kyi phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'kho ru du byas pa gcig btsugs so// de nas kun dga' bos rgyang grag sa gnyis kyi pha rol na/ rnga'i 'byen 'dug pa la 'phangs na yang
133b7(mdo): phog par gyurd te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so// lhas sbyin kyis kyang rkyang grags bzhi'i pha rol da na/ dza'i 'byen 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyur da te/ de phan chad la phog par ma nus so//
133b8(mdo): mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol da na/ rnga'i 'byen 'dug pa la 'phangs na 'phog par gyurd to// de phan chad kyi la log par ma nus so// la ka na be con can gyis dpag tshad gnyis kyi pha rol na dza'i 'ben
133b9(mdo): 'dug pa la 'phangs na phog par gyurd to// thal byung du phyinang nas de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so// de nas byang chub sems/ dpa la ga'u gang dang gang byin pa de dag la sa ni gzhu rgyud chad/ la la ni chag nas
134a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grong khyer 'dir kazhu gzhan la la bdag gis gdung bzod pa 'am/ lus kyi stobs dang mthu bzod pa mchis sam/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ bu yod do// gzhu nus
134a2(mdo): spras pa/ wA de lta bu gapa da mchis/ rgyal pos sbas pa/ bu khyod kyi mes seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i snam nung ltar lha gang da spos dang / 'phreng bas mchod de/ de ni sus kyang bcung bar kyang myi nus na
134a3(mdo): dgang par lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ lha de thung du gsol/ sad par bgyi'o// de nas ga'u de blangs te 'ongs pa dang / shag kya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi
134a4(mdo): mchog gis sgrims kyang ka'u gdung bar yang ma nus na/ dkar masta spos kyang mi dgos te ma nus so// de nas kazhu de shag kya la ka na be con gyis lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyung ste/ gzhu de 'dung
134a5(mdo): bar brgal nas/ ma bdungs so// de nas gzhu de byang chub se sems dpa' la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'as ka zhu de blangs te/ stan las ma langs par skyil mo khrung phyed bcas te/
134a6(mdo): lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis brdungs so// gzhu de ltar bdungs pa'i tshe/ ser skya 'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad sgra mngon par grag par
134a7(mdo): gyurd to// grong khyer gyi myi thams cad kyang sreg sreg por gyur da te/ gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di lta ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro// de la la na re gzho nu don grub kyis/ myes kyi snam ru btungs nas de'i sgra byung ba de
134a8(mdo): yin zhes zer ro// de nas sku dang myi brgya stong dag/ e ma a ya la zhes zer zhing mtsho dang ga zha'i sgra brgya stongab 'byind par gyurd to// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang / rgyal po zas gtsang
134a9(mdo): ma dang skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la tshogs su bcad de smras pa// ka dan las ma bzhengs bsal ba ma mchis su// / thub pas sngam ru 'di 'dra brdungs pa las// gdon myi 'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzog
134b1(mdo): gyurd te// bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub par byon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'as mda' blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyard te bkang nas 'phangs pa'i mthu stobs kyis kun dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsug
134b2(mdo): pa dang / sgra sbyin gyis 'byen du rnga btsugs pa dang / mdzes dka' bo'i 'byen du rnga btsugs pa dang / lag na be con can gyi 'ben du rnga btsugs pa de dag thams cad las thal nas/ rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol du bdag
134b3(mdo): gi 'ben lugs kyi rnga btsugs pa dang / shing ta la bdun dang rad pa dang / phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te/ mda' de sa la zug nas myi snang bar nub par gyur to// sa phyogs ga
134b4(mdo): tu mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas/ da ltar kyang mda' khron pa zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe sa/ dang myi brgya stong dag/ e ma a la la zhes zer zhing mtsho dang gzha'u/
134b5(mdo): sgra brgya stong 'byind par gyur to// shag kya'i tshogs thams ca/ dkyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste kye ngo mtsharang to// 'dis ni bsrabs kyang ma slabs par chal gyi shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o ni
134b6(mdo): zer ro// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kya pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// de ltar ngo mtshar kya ni che ste/ de tsi'i
134b7(mdo): phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sa'i snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas 'dan la bzhugs// zhi gnas sngam du thogs shing stong pa bdag myed mda' rnams kyis// nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba dral nas su// byang chub
134b8(mdo): dam pa zhi ba rdul myed mya ngan myed pa 'thob// de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog gis mngon par gtor da te dong ngo // de bzhin du mchongs pa dang / yi ge dang /
134b9(mdo): lag rtsis dang / chis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / chung nas phog pa dang / bang dang / tshar dang / rgyal dang / 'pho dpyad dang / glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang / rta tshal dang / shing rta'i thabs/
135a1(mdo): dang / mda' kazhu'i thabs dang / brtan pa dang / mthu dang / dpa' ba dang / 'byed stobs dang / lcags kyus bsgyur thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / mdun du brtsu ba dang / phyir bcu ba dang /
135a2(mdo): bzung ba dang / 'dzin sbyangs dang / ko stangs dang / thor tshugs dang / gcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbug pa dang / bzhig pa dang / gsheg pa dang / myi tshor bar phog pa dang / ka nad du phog pa dang / sgra grag par
135a3(mdo): phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dang / tshe lo'i ched mo dang / snyan sngags sbyar ba dang / lam dang / ri mo dang / gzugs dang / gzugs kyi las dang / thabs kyi dpyad dang / mye'i las dang / rol mo'i dbyangs spa dang /
135a4(mdo): kar dang / klu dang / yi ge klaka pI dmyig 'ord dang / gtam dang gzhad dkad dang / ched mo dang / pro dang / sgeg pa dang / 'phreng ba rgyu ba dang / rlung yab g.yab pa dang / nor bu tshod kyis bsgyur
135a5(mdo): pa dang / gos tshon gyis bsgyur pa dang / myig 'phrul gyi cho ka dang / rmyi lam gyi dpyad dang / bya'i skad dang / shud myed kyi tshan dang / skyes pa'i mtshan dang / glang po che'i mtshan dang / rta
135a6(mdo): mtshan dang / ba lang ki mtshan dang / ra'i mtshan dang / lug ki mtshan dang / khyi'i mtshan dang / shes gsal dang / sgra nges pa ra sbyor ba dang / nga ro bsgyur ba dang / sngon gyi rabs dang / sngon byung
135a7(mdo): ba dang / rig byed dang / lung bstand pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ke lci yang dang / tshig bsdeb pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi cho ka dang / skar ma 'i lugs dang / grangs can kyi lugs dang / rnal 'byord kyi
135a8(mdo): lugs dang / las kyi tshogs dang / bye brag pa'i lugs dang / nor gi rig pa dang / phur bu'i lugs dang / chu'i sugs dang / lha ma yin kyi lugs dang / bya dang / ri dgas kyi skad dang / gtan tshigs kyi
135a9(mdo): rig pa dang / rgya skyugs kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / spra tshil gyi las dang / 'drub shur dang / brko shog dang / lo ma dra ba dang / spos sbyar ba las stsogs pa sgyu chal 'jig rten pa dang / lha'i dang / myi'i las
135b1(mdo): 'das pa thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' shig khyad par du 'phags par gyu rad to// de'i tshe shaka lag na be cod kyis/ rang gi bu mo sa mchom/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas/
135b2(mdo): kyang de'i rim gyis bkra mar blangs te/ byang chub sems dpal la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'as 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/ bud myed brgyad khri bzhi stong kyi dpan 'dug ste/ dga' zhing
135b3(mdo): la yongs su spyod pa stond to// bud myed brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi rang na/ shag kya'i bu mo sa 'tshom btsun mo mchog tu dbang bskur par gyurd to// de nas shag kya'i bu mo sa mchom gyo smyug gam
135b4(mdo): nang myi gang mthong yang rung ste/ gdong myi skyed do// de dag kyang de la bag sar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tu ma g.yos so// bya smod cing myi snyan par zer ro// de'i tshe
135b5(mdo): shag kya'i bu mo sa 'tshoms gtam de thos nas nang myi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dug dang 'greng dnga'achag pa dang // 'phags pa dag ni ma
135b6(mdo): g.yos mdzeg/ nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba// rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes// 'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste// 'ong na 'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin// 'greng ba 'am de
135b7(mdo): bzhin 'dug pa dang / thams cad du'ang 'phags pa mdzes/ 'phags pa sma na'ang mdzes pa ste// myi smrar 'dug kyang de bzhin mdzes// dper na ka la bing ka ni// mthong dang sgra thos ji bzhin no//
135b8(mdo): ku sha'i gos ni gyon pa dang // gos ngan gyon dang lus rid pa// de ni rang gi gzi'i yis mdzes// yon tan ldan pa yon tan brgya dang // gang la sdig pa myed gyur da pa// 'phags pa kun tu dge ba yin/
135b9(mdo): byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni// ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// gang dag snyib sa sdig pa yod ci cig 'jam la// de dag dug gi bum par bdud khri thugs pa bzhin// zug gi ser ka su ba pa lta bur na /
136a1(mdo): yang chub// de 'dra de dag sbrul gyi kha la nyug pa bzhin// nges pa de dag kan du kun 'od kun phyag 'tshal// 'bab stegs thams cad lta bur 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// 'phags pa dag ni rtag tu'o//
136a2(mdo): zhes bkang bum 'dra// bdag nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na bkra shis dge// gang dag sdig po'i grogs po yun ring yongs spong zhing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin po ches ni yongs bzung la// sdig pa rnams spong sangs rgyas
136a3(mdo): chos la mngon chags pa// de lta bu dag mthong na bkra shis 'bras bu yod// gang dag lus bsdams lus kyi skyon rnams rab bsdams dang // ngag dang tshig bsdams rtag tu tshig 'tshal myed 'gyur la// dbang po sbas
136a4(mdo): shing shin tu bsdams la yid dang ba// de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs de ni ji zhig bya// gal te lus la kos ni stong gis g.yogs gyurd kya pa// gang dag sems bshus ngo tsha myed cing khrel myed dang // gang
136a5(mdo): dag 'dri 'dra'i yon tan myed cing bden tshig myed// de dag sgren mo bas// kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu// gang zhig sems sbas rtag tu dbang po/ bsdams gyurd cing // bdag gi khyos chog sems gzhan la myi seMs
136a6(mdo): pa// de 'dra ba dag nyi zla bzhin du ma g.yos snang // de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yogs de ni ci zhig bya// gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid ched nga gzhan sems blo mkhas dang // de bzhin lha tshogs dag gis lo /
136a7(mdo): mo'i bsam pa dang // kho bo'i tshul khrims yon tan sdom dang bag yod ma khyend// de lta bas na lo mos gdong bkab ci zhig dgos// dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas shag kya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i spobs pa bstan pa
136a8(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thos so// thos nas kyang sim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid bde ba skyes nas/ ras bcos bu bzang po rin po che du mas smras pa/ zung cig dang /
136a9(mdo): mu tig gi do shal srang bye ba brgya stong mib dang / mu tig dmar po bzang pos sbas pa'i/ gser gyi 'phreng bas shag kya'i bu mo sa 'tshom la bka' nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kho bo'i bu ni yon tan ji 'dras brgya dang /
136b1(mdo): pa dang // mna' ma rang gi yon tan ji ltar rab sbal// sems can dag pa de gnyis spang bar gyur da ba ni// mar dpa lar gyi snyis wa'i ltar 'drab bzhin// gyu lal bstad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
136b2(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa na/ gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las byed par spro bsu da pa/ lha dang / klu
136b3(mdo): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba du ma de dag rang rang gi dga' ba'i sgra 'byind cing lpags par gyur da to//
136b4(mdo): de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhig na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am/ ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyo
136b5(mdo): ba mang po dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ ma la skyes bu dam/ pa 'di btsun mo'i 'khor kyi nang du gcas sun dridu 'og par gyur na/ sem sa can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po
136b6(mdo): sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pas/ yongs su smyin par byas pa dang / gang dag 'dis byang chub sems da pa'athob nas/ chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba/ chos kyi snod/
136b7(mdo): du gyur da pa'i sems can de dag myed par gyur nas/ phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ gcig tu myi 'gyur grang snyam mo
136b8(mdo): de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar da te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas/ nam zhig na bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' dam pa mchog rab dam pa 'di mngon par byung ba
136b9(mdo): dang / mngon par byung nas kyang / shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ste/ de bzhin gshegs
137a1(mdo): pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgya brgyad dang ldan pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor
137a2(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo bla na myed pa bskor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rold pa chen pos lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam na
137a3(mdo): bsam pa de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs myed pa'i yang grangs myed pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring por rtag par rgyun tu 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
137a4(mdo): 'das pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog par gyur da cing dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad la bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur pa yi na la yun ring nas dus shes pa dang / chod shes pa dang / ran pa shes par
137a5(mdo): gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa la ma nyams pa dang / mngon pa/ ra shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par/ che ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang / dbang po la mkhas
137a6(mdo): pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang dus la lta zhing / rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus rad pa las mya yol bar gyur da pa'o// de ma don par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas 'di ni rab tu bzung
137a7(mdo): ba'i dus so// 'di ni tsher bcad pa'i dus so// 'di ni bsdu ba'i dus so// 'di ni phan gdags pa'i dus so// 'di ni btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i dus so// 'di ni smra ba'i dus so// 'di ni myi smra bar bya ba'i dus so//
137a8(mdo): 'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni kha ton bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshul bzhin yid la bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor
137a9(mdo): kyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi bar ki 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / myi'aM
137b1(mdo): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rter skyong ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge bsnyen pa'i 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni chos bstand pa'i nus so//
137b2(mdo): 'di ni nang du yang dag gzhag pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par 'du shes par gyur da cing dus la lta ba yin yang / dge slong dag 'di ni chos nyid thos
137b3(mdo): pa yin te/ srid pa tha ma' po'i byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor kyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams klu dbyangs dang / sil snyan
137b4(mdo): kyi sgra las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par bskul mdzad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sems can mchog gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs// de dag mthu' yis sil snyan
137b5(mdo): sgra dag las// tshigs bcad sla snyan 'di dag byung ba yis// myi mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag 'askul // sdug bsngal rgyas pa/ sems can mthong nas ni// 'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dpa gaH
137b6(mdo): 'gyur zhing // phan byed mchog dang dpu nyen gyur da cig ces/ khyod kyis sngon ni smon lam de skad btab// dge ba'i dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang // 'gro phan bya zhes smon btab dran par byos/
137b7(mdo): 'di ni khyod kyi dus nam chod yin gyis// drang srong mchog rab mngon par 'byung bar 'os// sangs rgyas swa myi'i 'dul byed 'jig rten mchog/ yon tan brgyas gang bar ni gyur da cig ces// de phyir khyod sngon mgo dang
137b8(mdo): rkang lag dang // nor kyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang // khyod ni khrims kyis brtul shugs dka' thub spyad// khyod mi bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed// khyod ni brtson pas yon tan brgya yis gang // bsam gtan
137b9(mdo): shes rab srid gsum mnyam pabyed// khro bas non cing tha ba'i dri mang ba// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyi byams pas// dge ba'i yon tan bral ba log nges pa// gyi mkhas rnam mang dag la khyod snying rje// bsod/
138a1(mdo): nams ye shes dge bas lus khyab cing // rdul bral bsam gtan mngon shes la mer 'dug/ phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gsal// spri myed zla ba dri ma myed pa 'dra// 'di dag gzhan yang snyan pa
138a2(mdo): nam yang kyis// sil snyan dag las rgyal bas sra bsgrags te// mngon par khyod byung dus ni 'di yi bzhes// lha myis mchod par 'os la skul ma 'debs// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim dam pa mchog
138a3(mdo): yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang mthun pa/ lha'i khang khyim lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo zhang dang / rta babs dang / skar zhur dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtseg/
138a4(mdo): pa dang / khang bzangs mchog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan nam pa tha dad pa dbye ba shi nad tu rnam par phye ba/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu er kha'i dra ba du mas leg+sas
138a5(mdo): par brgya nad pa/ dar gyi lnga lnga brgya stong du ma mngon par sbyangs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu tika gi rgyan 'phreng rab tu sbyangs/ pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb can gyi zam pas mdzes par
138a6(mdo): byas pa/ mye tog gi 'phreng ba dang / tshun po mang po sbyangs pa/ phosnod nas spos kyis bdugs pa/ dar gyi bla res bres pa/ dus tham sa cad pa'i me tog dri mchog tu zhim zhing shin tu mdzes pa dag
138a7(mdo): bkram pa rdzing me tog pad ma dkar po dang / pad ma dang ldan pa'i chu'i gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba yang ba/ bya ma dab spyob dang / ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / ma bya dang / dung pa dang / kun la
138a8(mdo): dang / ka la bying ka dang / shang shang de'u las stsogs pa// bya rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs sla snyan pa 'byind pa/ bye dUr+ya sngon po'i sa gzhi'i gnas yongs su spyod par bya ba/ gzugs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyad kun tu ston/
138a9(mdo): pa/ blta bas myi ngoms par nyams dga' ba mchog tu dka' ba dam pa skyed pa'i khyim dam pa'i mchog de na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khang pa yangs pa mchog gnas pa/ dri ma myed pa/ dri ma dang bral ba yan
138b1(mdo): lag dri ma myed pa/ 'phreng ba dang / rgyan ma bor ba/ dri mchog du zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bskus pa/ dkar zhing ka dpal dri ma myed cing rnam par dag la/ dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ mal cha
138b2(mdo): lha'i ras bcos bu bzang po du ma bting ba 'jam pa/ ka ca yin de'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ yan lag das pas spras pa'i mal bzang po'i steng na 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dam pa/ lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba/ thams
138b3(mdo): dul na ma tho ba myed pa/ blta ba dang 'thun pa/ spyod pa bzang pos mdzes par byas pa/ gzugs 'brang ba'i dngan 'dug pa// dung dang / rnga dang / rdza dza dang / pi bang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / Shar ba'i sil khrol dang / reg ro//
138b4(mdo): pa dang / kim pa la dang / na ku la dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bu snyan pa 'i sgra byung ba'i sgra dbyangs dang / sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs snga gas dang ldan pas bslang ba la/ bud myed kyi tshogs kyis sgra mnyen
138b5(mdo): zhing snyan la/ yid du 'ong ba dang / gling bu 'bud pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spong ngo // phyogs btsun bzhug sa pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byin kyi rlabs kyis/
138b6(mdo): sil snyan smra byung ba'i sgra skad de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bskul po'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // bud myed gang ka rab tu yid dga' sems dang bas// sil snyan yid du 'ong /
138b7(mdo): zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam pa dag gi mthu' yis na// tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung // rtag tu mgon myed gyur da pa'i 'gro ba 'di mthong nas// go 'phang mya
138b8(mdo): ngan myed mchog rdul myed sangs rgyas te// skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las grol lo zhes// dpa' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur da// de phyir dge myur grong khyer mchog de nas// byung la sngon gyi
138b9(mdo): drang srong zhabs bcags pa// sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nas su// rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshungs myed 'chang rgyar gyis// khyod kyis sngon chad sna tshogs rin nor// rga lag phangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur
139a1(mdo): drang srong chen po de ring khyod dus 'di// chos kyi chu bo mthal yas 'gros phye// khyod kyi tshul khrims ma nyams dri myed dge// sngon chad rtag tu khyod ni mchog gis brgya nad// drang srong chen po khyod
139a2(mdo): khrims 'dra ba myed// 'gro la nyon mongs rnam pa yangs sa gros// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni 'thod pa kyang // khyod ni 'gro bas dran brjod nam yang bzod// bzod pas bzod cing dul bas nges pa'i bdag/ rkang
139a3(mdo): gnyis bdag po mngon par 'byung blo gyis// khyod brtson brtan zhing myi g.yo'i g.yol ba myed// bde bar gshegs pa sngon ma thar rgya cher gyur // g.yon can bdud ni sde dang bcas btul te// ngan song gsum po man
139a4(mdo): dag skams par gyis// gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub myad// dus ngan nyon mongs bsnyigs ma bsregs kyis la// khyod kyis bdud che'i chu bo 'cher phob ste// mgon myed ring nas skom pa
139a5(mdo): tshim par gyis// 'chi byed mya ngan myed gnas sangs rgyas te// skom pas nyams thag bdud rtsirtsis tshim byas zhes// khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te// sgo khyer dam pa 'di nas rgyur
139a6(mdo): du byung // khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas// da ni ye shes mtha' yas dri myed che// mongs pa yid gnyis ma la gnas rnams la// shes rab 'od 'gyed dam pa mdze
139a7(mdo): bgyis// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni byams pa kyang // snying rje dang ni dga' mchog btang snyoms dang // khyod kyis myod pa dam pa gang khyad pa// spyod pa de nyid 'gro la rnam par phye// phyogs bcu'i rgyal
139a8(mdo): bdag gi gzi'i brjid kyis// yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs bcad 'di// sil snyan dag las rnam mang yid 'od grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la skul// kang gi tshe na dga' byed bud myed rab tu
139a9(mdo): dga' ba rnams// shi nad tu mdzes shing rab tu snyan pa'i sil snyan sgrogs pa'i tshe// phyogs bcul dag gi rgyal ba s+tha myi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang // sil snyan dag las gsung mchog ha cang myi che rjes su smon/
139b1(mdo): 'grol bar byed yon tan mang po ldan khyod 'gro rnams su// rnam par rgyu ba'i chen rgyal ba'i yon tan mnyug mar byas// sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka' thub gyud pa dran gyis te// shing mchog drung du myur song 'chi byed//
139b2(mdo): go 'phang thob par gyis// lha myi dag ni shin tu skom zhing rgyal ba'i yon tan bral// khyod ni shi nad tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ro bro rtag tu sbyin// stobs bcu'i ro bro dam pa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa/
139b3(mdo): bdud rtsi de ni myi bdag khyod kyis myur du rnam par phye// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'gro la phan pa byed la dga' ba po// khyod kyis sngon gyi srid par nor bu gser nams btang // chung ma bu sdug dag dang grong khyer 'ardal bcas
139b4(mdo): sa dag dang // rang gi mgo dang myig dang lag pa dag dang rkang pa ra btang // myi mchog khyod ni gna' sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur po'i tshe// myi zhig khyod la mngon sum phyogs nas 'di skad tshig smas/
139b5(mdo): te// grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho bo byin zhes byas de'i tshe na rab tu dka' zhing 'khrugs par gyurd pa myed// kana'/ sngon khyod ni rgyal po'i bram ze dge bar gyurd pa'i tshe// skye'o
139b6(mdo): bla ma bsnyen bkur byed pa gzhan la 'khu myi byed// bram ze dam pa dag dang skye bo mang po dge la bkod// de nas 'chi 'phos srid pa'i 'gro ba lnga'i gnas su skyes// sngon khyod rgyal po'i bu
139b7(mdo): las drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// rgyal po ngan pa khros pas khyod kyi yan lag bcad pa na// khyod ni yid 'khrugs kyur pa myed par 'chi ba'i dus byas te// de'i tshe na khyod kyi rka lag dag las 'o ma zag/
139b8(mdo): khyod sngon drang srong sngo bas ngas zhes bya gang tshe gyu rad pa rA// ri mchog gnas na brtul zhugs dka' zhing bla ma la yang dga'// myi'i bdag pos dug mda' dag gis khyod la bstun pad// khyod ni rgyal po de la ying
139b9(mdo): 'khrugs myed cing snying ba cer gyur // khyod sngon ri dgas bdag po yon tan can du gyurd pa'i tshe// ri gzar 'bab chu chen pos myi zhig khyer bar gyur da pa na// phan dang ldan pa khyod kyis myi de phyung ste zang la gan
140a1(mdo): khyod kyi dgra bo khrid de 'ongs pa na yang yid ma 'khrugs// myi mchog khyod sngon bram ze'i bur ni gang che gyur pa na// khyod kyi nor bu rgya mtsho chen por yangs par ltung po'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po
140a2(mdo): zad par bya ba brtsams pa dang // stobs brtag khyu mchog khyod kyi nor bu de tshe phyir yang rnyed// skyes bu mchog khyod gna' sngon drang srong dam par gyur da pa'i tshe// bram ze gcig gis bdag gi skyabs gyur da shog ces khyod
140a3(mdo): gan 'ongs// smras pa bram ze dam pa kho bo dgra las phyung zhes byas// khyod kyi rang sus btang gi bram ze de ni ma btang ngo // gna' ston shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo bsangs drung 'ongs te// 'dod pos smras pa ni
140a4(mdo): ki lo ma du yod grongs shes byas// shing de lo ma ji snyed yod pab bgrangs rab mkhas pas// khyod kyis de bzhin nor pa myed cing ma thun par tshig tu brjod// khyod sngon ne co yon tan sngan gyur nga zhing la
140a5(mdo): gnas pa'i tshe// zad par gyur da kyang sngon gyi drim la bsams te de ma spangs// lha'i dbang pos khyod kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dka' snga mkho' bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas/
140a6(mdo): khyod kyi brtul shugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag mtshungs myed de/ yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pas yon tan mang // dkyi dus la dbab grong khyer bcas pa'i sa yang tho // 'gro ba
140a7(mdo): dag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan myod la myur du khyod// gang gi tshe na bud myed rin cen bzang po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te// sil snyan dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab sgrogs pa// de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal po'i
140a8(mdo): gzi' yis tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa// sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sil snyan dag gi sgra las rab tu byung // rga pa shi bris zin pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs kyurd ces// 'jig rten sgron ma khyon
140a9(mdo): kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab// myi'i seng ge khyod kyis sngon gyi smon lam dag ni dran byas te// rkang gnyis dbang po khyod da mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni da yin no// khyod 'dir srid pa khrag khrig dag tu
140b1(mdo): sbyin pa mang mo du ma byin// nor dang rin po che dang gser dang kos bzang rin chen spras pa dang // rka la ka dag dang myig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor da pa dag/ khyod kyis btang ya khyod ni slong ba rnams la tha ba
140b2(mdo): zhe sdang myed// khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyur da// snying bache snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyur da// rgyal po dpa' bo brtan dang myig bzangs dang ni de las stsog
140b3(mdo): pa byas// rgyal po khrag khrig mang po spyan dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis bskal pa mang por tshul khrims gyod pa s+yang// nor bu rin cen dri ma myed pa lta bur tshul khrims rnam da /
140b4(mdo): 'gyur// khyod kyis 'bri'i rim ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims srungs zhing spyad// tshul khrims dga' bas khyod kyis 'dir ni 'gro la rgya chen do/ na sang byas// 'dir khyod glang po mchog tu gyurd te rngon pa dgra
140b5(mdo): yis mda' bsdud tshe// gtum po dgra la snying rje bskyed nas/ de ni khyod kyis skyabs// bzang zhing mdzes pa'i mche ba yongs su btang ste tshul khrims yod ma btang // khyod kyis de las gatshogs
140b6(mdo): pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// bzod la da ka' ba khyod kyis 'gro ba gyi lan sdug pardas sdong mang dang // tshig chu dag dang gsad pa dang ni bcings pa mang po bzod par byas// khyod
140b7(mdo): kyis gna' sngon gyi gang dag la bde ba kun gyis rim gro byas// de dag phyin nas khyod kyis gshed mar gyur kyang khyod kyi de dag bsod// mgon po khyod na ri mchog gnas na gang tshe dred mor gyurd pa'i tshe// kha ba bab cing chu chu
140b8(mdo): pas ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i myi bzung ste// yab 'bras bu rnam pa yang dang 'de ba kun gyis rim grong byas// de yis myur du khyod la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzod// byang chub btsal phyir brtul zhus/
140b9(mdo): dka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la// khyod kyis brtson 'grus shind tu brtan par gnas shing myi g.yo'i g.yo ba myed// dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyis batshon 'grus stobs kyis stobs ni myed par byas// myi'i
141a1(mdo): seng me khyod 'dir mngon par byung ba'i dus yang 'ab bo// khyod 'dir gna' sngon la ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i ska mchog gyur pa'i tshe// snying rje bskyed nas nam mkhal sas ni srin po'i gling du myur du song/
141a2(mdo): de che 'phongs zhing 'dug pa'i myi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di las stsogs pa 'tshon 'grus rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// myur du 'gyur zhing g.yo la yul sa dka' zhing dgod pa'i sems btul te/
141a3(mdo): bsam gtad par gyur da dul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom// khyod 'dir bsam gtan dka' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas// da 'dir sems can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bya
141a4(mdo): ba'i dus la bab// gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bsam gtan dka' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur da// rgyal po myed pa'i myi dag gi se ni khyo da khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur // khyod kyi skye bo dag ni dge ba
141a5(mdo): bcu'i dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod// de'i tshe na myi las shi 'pho sa thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dong // phyogs dang phyogs/ mtshams 'gro ba rnam yang shes pa'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas/
141a6(mdo): gzhan gyi spyod dpa'agro ba'i skad shes pa dang dbang po shes pa dang / tshul dang dul dang glo gros rnam mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod phyi nad gyur rgyal po'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par byung ba'i dus la dbab bo//
141a7(mdo): khyod kyis gna' sngon skye bo lta ba log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyam thag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas// srid pa rnam par gzhig pa'i drang la nyid kyis khong du chud byas te//
141a8(mdo): mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don cher rab tu byas// tshigs bcad rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis// sil snyan smra bsgrags de las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dbang po bskul
141a9(mdo): par gyur // blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mad+mo nga byung ba'i dus ni da bab kyis// sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mthong nas btang snyoms ma byed cig/ bud myed gos dang rin po che dang do shal spos 'phreng sna tshogs
141b1(mdo): kyis// brgyan pa dag kyang sems dpa'aphangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams// sems can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrog cing spong bar byed pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu' yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su rarbA
141b2(mdo): pa 'di 'dra byung // gang gi don tu khyod kyis 'gro la phan phyir bskal pa du mar ni// btang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shi nad tu gyad// bsam gtan shes rab shind tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi
141b3(mdo): dus la dbab kyis// 'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur soms phyi shol ma khyed cig/ sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab tu btang // skye ba de dang de dag du ni mchod sbyin nam
141b4(mdo): pa mang po byas// khyod kyis chungam bu pho bu mo lus dang rgyal gri nga srog btang ste// byang chub don tu btang bar dka' ba dpag tu myed pa khyod kyis btang // khyod ni rgyal po myi dman bsod nams
141b5(mdo): dpal gyis rnam par grags par gyur // mu khyud 'dzin dang mu/ khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dang ras pa can// mchod sbyin s+ho// nga ldan dang ni chos sems 'od 'phro can dang nor brtan dang /
141b6(mdo): shind tu don bsams kyurd te sems can dam nas dgal 'ar 'atang zla ba'i bu dang 'tshon 'grus 'bar dang bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur // gtong ba tshe dang ldan zhing mthu ldan khyod ni byas pa
141b7(mdo): bzol bar gyur // rgyal po dra srong zla ba gzugs ldan dpa' bo bden dpa'aphel ba dang // rgyal po legs par smra ba chol dang blo gros bzang dang nges par gyur pa// zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro dang rdul dang
141b8(mdo): phyogs kyi bdag por gyur da// rab sbyin dpa' bo ke zhi rgyal po rin chen gtsug phud zhi ba stod// myi dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan du gyur pa te gtang bar dka' ba bta // khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char par
141b9(mdo): de bzhin chos kyi cheb pho ba// khyod kyis sngon chad sems can snying po gang ka'i bye ma snyed cig mthong // sems can tha rad par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyis mchod pa dpag myed pas
142a1(mdo): myi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod// dpa' bo grong khyer dam pa 'di nas 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// thog mar khyod kyis don yod mthong la sa la'i me tog gis ni mchod// rnam par sdang mdzad
142a2(mdo): la ni dang ba'i sems kyis skad cig rab tu bltas// rnga dbyangs ldan pa la ni khyod kyis a ru ra'i 'bru gcig phul// tsan dan mthong nas khyod kyis rA'i me smon blangs te khyim du bzung // rdul po grong khyer 'jug pa mthong /
142a3(mdo): nas phye ma spar gang rab tu gtor // chos kyi dbang phyug chos 'chad pa na legs shes bya bar rab tu byin// kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod// 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis
142a4(mdo): dga' bas gser 'phreng 'thor// 'od gzer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal la yal sran gtor da// ye shes tog la mya ngan byed pa'i me tog kha lo sgyur la 'jams// rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me
142a5(mdo): pad ma ldan la sman yang phul// thams cad zil gnon mu ti/ ka do shal rgya mtsho la ni pad ma phul// pad mo'i snying po la ni bla re/ seng ge la ni cher gting yul// sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal la mar
142a6(mdo): phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul// sgrags sbyin ku ta'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul// ye shes lhun la yus btud klu sbyin la ni na bza' phul ba byas// rab 'thor gshegs
142a7(mdo): dang tsan dan mchog dang 'od ldan la ni tshe s+phar re// bkod pa che la pad ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen phul// shag kya thub la spar kang gser phul dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas// nyi me'i zhal la me tog
142a8(mdo): na rgyan blo gros bzang la gser cod par// klu zil non la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos bting ba phul// sman gyi rgyal la rin chen gdugs phul seng ge'i tog la khri gdan phul// yon tan mchog ldan rin chen
142a9(mdo): dra ba 'od srungs ni klu dbyangs su na// spos mchog me tog phul zhing 'od 'phro 'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul// myi 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten mchod la 'phreng ba phul// rgya spos chug
142b1(mdo): la rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar dka' la spos kun phul// smon ma chel bdag phul pad ma'i mchog la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas// chos kyi tog la me tog snga tshogs sgron ma mdzad la ud pa la// mchod pa rnam pa
142b2(mdo): sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa na// khyod kyis sems can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mchod// 'das po'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag khyod mchod dran par gyis// sems can
142b3(mdo): mgor myed mya ngan gang ba yal bar ma dor mngon par byung // mar kye mdzad pa mthong btsam gyis bzod pa mchog thob ste// rjes su mthun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa myed pa thob// sems can/ de nas rab
142b4(mdo): tu dka' bas bskal pa grangs myed 'jig rten khams kun tu// sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam gyis myi khyab// bskal pa dpag myed de dag zad gyur nga sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das
142b5(mdo): khyod kyi lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag mying yang gang du so// dngos po thams cad tha mar zad par chos te 'dus byas rtag pa myed/ 'dod pas rgyal srid longs spyod rtag pa myed kyis grong khyer mchog
142b6(mdo): gnas byung // bskal pas zad par 'gyur tshe gzi'i brjid drag po'i 'jigs pa'i me 'od ltar// rga dang na dpa'achi ba myi bzad 'a jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur// dngos po thams cad tha mar
142b7(mdo): zad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa myed// shi nad tu sdug bsngal sems can ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par byung // rgyal po bde ba'i ma la na nyal gyur cing // gang tshe mo tshogs gling bu rgyud cig dang // sil
142b8(mdo): snyan sna tshogs sgra yis slong byed pa// de tshe sil snyan sgra yas 'di dag byung // srid gsum gdang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar// 'chi mye rab 'bar 'di ni mgon myed pa// srid las byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs//
142b9(mdo): bum par chud pa'i bung ba 'khor ba bzhin// srid gsum myi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra// 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs// 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i klog 'dra ste// rig zar 'baba' chu lta bur
143a1(mdo): myur ma gyogs 'gro// srid sred ma rig dbang gis skye bo rnams// gyi dang lha gnas ngam song lam gsum po// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu myi mkhas 'khor// dper na rdza mkham 'phang lo 'khor ba bzhin/
143a2(mdo): rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang // dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa// dus ngad snyil 'gro ba 'di dag thogs// dper na rngon pa'i snyil gre'u thogs pa bzhin// 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa yang /
143a3(mdo): 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra khyed nyon mongs bcas// ral gyi so/ 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs// ngan skyugs snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bo spangs// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas// rtag
143a4(mdo): tu brjed par byed pa mun pa 'dra'o// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu bye da sdug bsngal ra// srid pa'i sred po'i khri shing 'phel bar byed// ji ltar mye 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs bcas pa// de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags
143a5(mdo): pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gyi gsheg gnas 'dra ral kyi so la sbrang cis bskus dang mtshungs// ji ltar sbrul gyi ma ko dang ngan spyugs sdod// de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis
143a6(mdo): rig/ bya sha 'am bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra// rol khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra// gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag cha 'dra ba dang // myig yor 'dra/
143a7(mdo): zhing gams ste 'dra dang // rmyi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya mamra// sgyu ma smyig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can// chu bur dbu pa lta bu yang dag myir// yongs su
143a8(mdo): brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs/ na chod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzind pa'i tshe// phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i myong // rgan sdug bsngal bzi'i brjid lus bcom nas// rnam par
143a9(mdo): spong ste ri dgas klung skam bzhin// nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe// 'phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis po'i spyod// nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe// rnam par spong ste myi 'is 'drog
143b1(mdo): stong bzhin// ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing // de ltar sbyin 'dod myi la dga' bar byed// nor nyams rga bas nyen cing spong ba na// de tshe dka' bar myi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin// rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe
143b2(mdo): mgon po bzhin// phrad na sdug cing dbang po dka' bar byed// rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na// de tshe 'dod par myi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin// rga bas rga byas na tshod yal gyur da na// sdong po gnam lcags kyis ni
143b3(mdo): bcom pa bzhin// rga bas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rus 'dra// rga las byung ba thub pas myur du smos// bud myed skyes pa tshogs rnams rgabs skyems// ma lu 'khri shing sa la'i nags stug bzhin//
143b4(mdo): rga bas brtson 'grus bcal dang shugs 'phrog ste// dper na skyes bu 'dam du byi ba bzhin// rgabs gzugs sdug gzugs ni myi stu ka byed// rgabs gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu' stobs 'phrog/
143b5(mdo): rgabs bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed// rga bas 'chi byed rga ba// sa mdangs kyang 'phrog/ nad brgya mang dang nad thigs sdug bsnga/ la gyis// 'gro ba gtses te myi'i sa ri dgas bzhin// rga nad
143b6(mdo): na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la// sdug bsngal yas ni byung bar myur kod cig/ dper na dkun spad drung dpa' ba che// cha shing ke la ba nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog/ de ltar nad 'di 'gro po'i
143b7(mdo): mdangs 'phrog cing // dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed// nor bu nor chen tha mar zad par byed// nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed// gnod par byed cing sdug la sdang bar byed// yongs su gdung byed
143b8(mdo): mkha'as nyi ma bzhin// 'chi dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa// phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu bral// phyir myi 'ong zhing phrad par 'gyur ma yin// shing las lo 'brul 'dra zhing klung gi rgyud dang mtshungs//
143b9(mdo): shi ba dbang yod pa dag dbang byed myin// 'chi ba 'phrog byed chu bos shing ded bzhin// myi ni gnyis myin phrogs myed gcig pu 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang myed// 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag
144a1(mdo): mang 'dzind te// 'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin// klu la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra// rAt+na i 'byung po'i tshogs la mye dang mtshungs// skyon brgya mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las//
144a2(mdo): 'gro ba 'grol zhes khyod kyi smon lam btab// sngon gyi smon lam spyod pa de ma myos// khyod ni mngon par 'thung ba'i dus la bar// gang che bud myed tshogs ni rab dga' zhing // sol snyan dag gis mub chen spong byed
144a3(mdo): de che bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mthus// tshigs bcad sna tshogs sis snyan sgra las byung // 'dus byas thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste// mkha' la klog rgyun ring du myi gnas bzhid// khyod kyi dus 'di
144a4(mdo): bar gnas kyur kyis// brtul zhugs bzang po mngon byung dus la bab// 'du byed myi rtag brtan pa ma yin te// rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag/ gzhan gyi rdzas ni brnyan po byas dang mtshungs
144a5(mdo): bye ma'i grong khyer lta bur ring myi thogs// 'du byed 'di de// ka 'dzag po'i chos can te// dbyar gyi zhal zhal ji ltar 'gro/ gas pa bzhin// chu ngogs bye ma yod pa 'dra ba ste// rkyen
144a6(mdo): la rag las rang bzhin nyams chung ba// 'du byed mar mo'i 'od 'phro 'dra ba ste// myur du 'byung zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin// rlung dang mtshungs par ring du myi gnas la// dbu ba lta bur nyam
144a7(mdo): chung snying po byed// 'du byed g.yo ba myed cing stong pa ste// brtags nas chu shing dag gi phung po 'dra// sgyu ma lta bu'i sems ni rmongs par byed// lag bcangs stong pas byi labring dang mtshungs// 'dus
144a8(mdo): byas gyu ra pa thams cad rgyu dag dang // rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu byung ba ste// gcig gis gcig tu byas te brten nas byung // byis pa'i skye bos 'di 'bru 'di ma rtogs// dper na gres ma mun rdza brtem byas
144a9(mdo): 5/ brtsal pa'i stobs kyis zag par gyurd pa dang // zo chun khyud mor 'khor lor bcas pa sa pa// de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba myed// de ster srid pa'i yam lag kun grub pa// gzhan dang
144b1(mdo): gzhan tshogs pa la brten nas ni// de dag so so re rer grub par gyur// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs// sa bon yod na Tu ku ji bzhin te// sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid myin// de las gzhan myin de/
144b2(mdo): yang ma yin te// de ltar rtag myin chad myin chos nyid do// ma rig pa ni 'du byed rkyen yin te// 'du byed de yang yang dag nyid du myed// ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang // rang bzhin stong ste g.yol ba myed pa yin
144b3(mdo): rgya las rgya'i 'bur ni sdang mod kyi// rgya de 'phos par dmyigs pa'ang yod ma yin// de las de myed gzhan las ma yin te// de ltar 'dus byas rtag myed chad pa myed// myig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su/
144b4(mdo): myig gi rnam par shes pa 'di byung yang // myig ni gzugs la ba rten pa ma yin la/ gzugs kyang myig la 'pho ba yod ma yin/ 'di dag bdag myed myi sdug chos can yang // de dag bdag dang sdug
144b5(mdo): par brtags pa ste// nor pa yang dag ma yin brtags yin pa/ pa// de las myig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung // rnam par shes pa/ 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te// mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam
144b6(mdo): par mthong // gang du ma song gang nas 'ongs pa myed// rnal 'byo da pas ni stong pa spu ltar mthong // dper na gtsub shing dang nig/ nubs stan dang // lag pas bcal ba byas pa gsum tshogs pa
144b7(mdo): de las brten nas kye ri byung gyur te// byung nas ring por myi thogs 'gag par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu
144b8(mdo): brtags byas nas// 'di 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba myi dmyigs so// phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi// rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las// de dag tshogs pa sems cad zhes brjod kyang // de ni dam pa'i don tu
144b9(mdo): dmyigs su myed// mchu dang lkog ma dkan la brten nas ni// skye bsgyurd pa las yi ge sma byung yang // lkog mar brten nas ma yin dkan las myin// re re la ni yi ge dmyigs su myed// tshogs pa de la brten nas
145a1(mdo): ngag de ni// yid kyis glo 'dang kyi byung mod kyi// yid dang ngag ni myi sdang gzugs myed de// nang dang phyi rol na yang dmyigs su myed// mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi// skye dang 'jig pa
145a2(mdo): rnam par brtags byas nas// de tshe ngag kun brag cha lta bu dang // skad cig pa dang snying po myed par mthong // dper na shing dang rgyud la brten byas la// lag pas bstsal pa byas pa gsum tshogs na// sgra skad snyan pa'i
145a3(mdo): gling bu las batshogs pa// de dag las ni sgra yang byung bar 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtag byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la kar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas nas
145a4(mdo): sgra'i 'ong ba'am 'gro ba myi dmyigs so// de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen rnams las// 'du byed byung ba thams cad gyurd pa ste// ya padag mthong ba'i rnal 'byor da pa yis ni// 'du byed stong pa g.yo//
145a5(mdo): ba myed par mthong // phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni// nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste// thams cad bdag gi dben zhi da gnas myed la// chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/
145a6(mdo): chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni// mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis gtogs// ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa sngar de bzhin lha myir bcas pa rtogs par gyis// gnod pa yang
145a7(mdo): dag ma yin brtags pa'i// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs// snying rje'i sprin las zhi ba 'chis pa'i rgyu// 'dred pa 'dud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu thob// byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas ni// 'phags
145a8(mdo): pa'i nod kyis srog chags bsku'o zhes// mkhas pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// bskald pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran byas te// 'phags pa'i nod kyis dpan dbus sdug bsngal la
145a9(mdo): sems can kha lo sgyur ba ma g.yel bar// 'phags pa'i nor gyis de dag bsdu ba kyis// ngan song sa'i lam ni gcad pa dang // mtho' ros bdud chi'i sgo mo mchog de ni// sems can bye ba mang la bstan zhes te//
145b1(mdo): khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims shind tu bsrungs// tshul khrims ldan pa'i bsam pa grub 'gyur gyis// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// ngad song gsum po'i sa'i sgo chod de// mtho' ris bdud chi'i sgo na dbye ba gyis// srog
145b2(mdo): chags rnams kyi khong khro khro gzhis dang // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can bsgral byas te// zhi ba de rims nad myed myed la dkod do zhes// khyod kyis rtag tu bzod la shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi khyod de rjes su dran gyis te// dgra dang
145b3(mdo): gnod sems 'tshe bas dkrugs pa'i// 'che ba pyod pa yal bar ma dor bar// 'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la 'od// chos kyi klu ni legs pa sbyar byas lnga// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams bsla lad te// zhi ba de rims
145b4(mdo): nad myed la dgod do zhes// gang gi don tu khyod kyis bcon 'grus bskyed// sngon gyi pyod de rje su dAn gyis la// 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis khyer gyu rad pa// sems can mgon myed pa dag brtsotshan stobs dang // brtul ba'i shugs
145b5(mdo): kyis myur du 'di dag thon// dbang po 'khrul da dang phal pa'i dbang / po dang // spre'u 'dra ba'i sems las zhi gnas ngas dgod ces// 2dren pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// nyon mongs gzhil ba'i bsam
145b6(mdo): gtan bsgoms gyur da pa// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// nyon mongs dra bas dkrugs par gyur pa'i// 'gro la ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las// bsam gtan mchog la skye dgu 'di dag
145b7(mdo): khod// gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi// 'gro la chos rgya mang po mthong byed pa// yang dag mthong ba'i myig ni sbyin no zhes// khyod kyis sngon chad shes rab shi nad tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis
145b8(mdo): la// gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa'o// 'gro la shes rab dam pa 'od bzung ba// chos myig dri myed nyon mongs myed pa byin// bud myed rnams kyi sil snyan klu dbyangs las// tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'di
145b9(mdo): byung ste// de thos nas ni rgyags pa rnams spangs nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe'ang / chos mnyan pa dang bral ba
146a1(mdo): ma gyur to// chos yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas chos dang chos sba ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur da cing / zam
146a2(mdo): bzag pa nas chos don tu gnyer ba/ chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi kun dka' la dka' zhing mos par gyur da pa/ chos tshol bas ngoms myi shes pa/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par stond pa/ bla na myed pa yi chos chen po'i sbyin
146a3(mdo): bdag tu gyur da pa/ zang zing myed par chos stond pa/ chos sbyin pa las ser sna myed pa/ slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba// chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa/ chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba/ chos la
146a4(mdo): gnas su 'dzind pa/ chos la skyabs su 'dzidad pa/ chos la dpung gnyen du 'dzind pa/ chos la rton pa/ chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la khyad pa ste/
146a5(mdo): thabs la mkhas pa rtogs par kho du yin no// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa chen pos rnam par ba che ni ba btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam
146a6(mdo): ni bstan// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yum mas cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang 'thu na bar bya ba'i chos nyid dang / mthun par ni byas/ yun ring po nas
146a7(mdo): 'dod pa'i skyor shin tu rtogs pa yin yang / sems cad yongs su smyind par bya ba'i dbang kyis/ 'dod pa'i long pyod ni kun tu bstan/ dge ba'i cha ba dpag tu myed pa bstsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi khyad
146a8(mdo): bar gyis/ 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa myed pa ni kun tu bstan/ sku'i dang mya'i lam shin tu 'das pa/ snying po dang ldan zhing rgya che la rnam pa tha dad pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang dri
146a9(mdo): dang po dang / reg mchog tu dga' ba/ nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dka' ba'i bde ba ni bstan/ 'dod pa'i dga' bo'i yul thams cad la 'dzin pa myed par rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba ni bstand// sngon gyi
146b1(mdo): kyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs su gyur pa/ dge ba'i ma kha bstsags pa'i sems can rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pas yongs su smyin par byas nas/ 'jig rten kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni/
146b2(mdo): sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas te/ ji ltar mgron gnyer po'i sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shind tu rgya cher
146b3(mdo): sngon gyi dam bcas pa rjes su dran no// sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon tu byed do// smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par sgrub bo// sems cad rnams la yang snying rje chen po gtong ngo // sems cad rab tu tha dad par
146b4(mdo): bya ba yang sems so// 'byor da pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgu pa yin par yang so sor rtog go// 'khor ba la gnod pa dang / jigs pa mang po du mar yang rtog go// bdud dang nyes pa zhags
146b5(mdo): pa yang yang dag par gcod do// 'khor ba'i rgyud las kyang bad ka nyid 'da' bar byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang sems yang dag par gtong ngo // dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa
146b6(mdo): ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang 'khor ba'i skyon shi nad tu rig pa yaM na// 'dus byas la bsam pa zag pa nas don tu myi gnyer ba yin// nye bar len pa'i yongs su 'dzind pa thams cad don tu myi gnyer
146b7(mdo): ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos drod tu gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon tu phyogs pa yin/ 'khor ba la rgyab kyis lta ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpyod yul la mngon tu dga' ba yin/ bdud
146b8(mdo): kyi spyod yul dang ma 'dres pa yin/ srid pa la 'bar bar spyon tu mthong la yin/ khams gsum las byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ 'khor ba'i spyod dang nyes dmyigs dang / byung ba la mkhas pa yin/ rab
146b9(mdo): tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin/ mngon par byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ dben pa la gzhol ba yin/ dben pa la bab pa yin/ dben pa 'bab pa in/ dkon pa dngabs mthar mngon par dka' ba yin/ rab tu
147a1(mdo): dben pas rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin/ bla na myed pa'i nan tan la dpa' ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi don tu 'dod pa yin/ phan par 'dod pa yin/
147a2(mdo): bde bar 'dod pa yin/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying bache ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa yin/ byams pa la gnas pa can yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po
147a3(mdo): la mkhas pa yin/ rtag tu yid yongs su myi skyo ba yin/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can thams cad la bu cig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems dpa' yid
147a4(mdo): la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la myi lta ba ra yongs su btang ba yin/ sbyin pa 'ged pa la dga' ba yin/ lkug par gtong ba yin/ lag brkyang ba yin/ gtong ba la
147a5(mdo): dpa' ba yin/ mchod sbyin byas pa yin/ bsod nams she na/ tu phun sum tshogs pa yin/ bsod nams kyi yo byad shind tu bzung ba yin/ dri ma dang ser sna dang bral ba yin/ sems can
147a6(mdo): du ma bzung ba yin/ bla na myed pa yi sbyin bdag chen po yin/ byin nas kyang rnam par sbyin pa la myi re ba yin/ sbyin pa la dpa'ab yin/ 'dod pa dang 'dod pa che ba dang / chags pa dang /
147a7(mdo): sdang dang / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug dang / ser sna la mtshogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir mngon par byung ba yin/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems
147a8(mdo): bskyed pa'i rgyun las myi g.yo ba yin/ gtong ba chen po'i sems kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying ba che ba can yin/ phan pa 'dod pa can yin/ ya lang 'gro ba can yin/ sems can rab tu
147a9(mdo): tha rad par bya ba la dmyigs pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnod pa dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir phyi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ gtong
147b1(mdo): ba'i lag cha can yin/ sems can kyi bsam pa dang re ba ci lta ba bzhin du/ tshim par byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur da pa yin/ dus dang phrad par chos rtogs pa yin/ smon lam byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin
147b2(mdo): rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal ba yin/ 'khor sum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes mchog ka rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol bshi nad tu tshar gcod
147b3(mdo): pa yin/ tshul khrims dang yon tan dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin
147b4(mdo): tshul khrims yongs su dag par yin/ dri ma myed cing dri ma dang bral la rI ma spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du ba rjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / brgyad pa dang / spyo ba dang / smad pa dang /
147b5(mdo): bshung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / bzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis sems ma brnyogs pa yin/ sems ma dkrugs pa yin/ bzod pa dang /
147b6(mdo): nges pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gnod par myi sems pa yin/ gnod pa myi byed pa yin/ gnod sems myed pa'i sems dang ldan payin/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus
147b7(mdo): 'bar bar 'tshams pa yin/ yid dam la brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i pha pa thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa la phyir myi ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ shes bzhin can yin/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin/
147b8(mdo): sems ma g.yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la gtse gcig tu yid la byed pa yin/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ sdang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun dag dang bral ba yin/ myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngam
147b9(mdo): ba dang / bdag myed pa dang / myi sdug pa'i rnam par sems yongs su bsgoms pa yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yin/
148a1(mdo): lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shind tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yid la byed pa yin/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong kyis shind tu dkar ba byas pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin/ rten
148a2(mdo): cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba yin/ bden pa rjes su rtogs pas gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa yin/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam par che ba yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyu ma dang / smyig rgyu dang / chu zla dang
148a3(mdo): brag ma dang / myig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas pa yin// de ltar ye shes la gnas pa yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa
148a4(mdo): yin/ de ltar sems can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad
148a5(mdo): pa de dag gis rgya cher bskul pa dang / de'i tshe sngon gyi byang nga chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par gyur pa rnams kyi btsun// mo'i 'khor yongs su smyin par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo bzhi mngon
148a6(mdo): tu byed do// bzhi kang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa dang / snyan bar smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyar ba/ bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba
148a7(mdo): chos kyi sgo mngon tu byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzind pa'i bsam pa chud myi za ba'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i yul
148a8(mdo): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon tu byed pa dang / byang chub kyi
148a9(mdo): phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / don la rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang dag par bsgrub pa/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon tu byed pa'o//
148b1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sa chos kyi sgo bzhi po de dag mngon tu byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe rnam pa ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas
148b2(mdo): pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sal snyan dang / klu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byed do// mos pa rgya chen dang ni bsam
148b3(mdo): ba dang // lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snyi'i rje bas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skye zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dag sil snyan rnams las byung // dang zhing dang dang mos dang gus pa dang // brgyal myed cing zla la
148b4(mdo): 'dud pa dang // 'dri dang dge ba ci zhes chol la dang // rjes su dran pa sgom pa'i sgra byung ngo po// sbyin dang dul dang sgom dang tshul khrims sgra// bzod pa'i sgra dang de bzhin 'tshon 'grus sba// bsam
148b5(mdo): gtan mngon par bsgrub dang ting 'dzind skra// shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang byung // byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin snying / sba// dka' dang btang snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra// 'a
148b6(mdo): ba'i dngos po bzhi po rnam nges pa// sems can yongs su na bya'i sgra yang byung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rab dbyi sba// dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang // dbang po lnga dang stobs lngaras/
148b7(mdo): dbye dang / byang chub yan lag sma ni sam snyan 'byung // yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbe dang // zhi ga nas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong sla// myi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag myed sla// myi stug sra
148b8(mdo): yang sil ldan rnams las byung // 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i sgra// zang pa zhes pa'i sgra rang kyi lce smra// 'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhidi gnas myed smra// mya ngan 'das pa'i sku ya mal snyan kyang // rdzog
148b9(mdo): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthul yis na// sim snyan dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste// sgra de thos nas bud myed thams cad kyis// sems can mchog rab rjes bslabs byang chub smon// dge slong dag de ltar/
149a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas/ bud myed brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha'i bu brgya stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
149a2(mdo): chub tu yongs su smyind par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khrel yod pa'i lha zhes bya ba/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
