149a3(mdo): byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa des mtshan mo mya nyel tsam na/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du ba dar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i khang bzangs ka la ba der song ste phyin nas
149a4(mdo): nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// // shi 'pho ba ni shin tu bstan// skyes bu seng ke tshe yang bstand// btsun mo'i 'khor yang bstand pa mdzad// khyod kyis
149a5(mdo): 'jig rten las mthun mdzad// 'jig rten chos ni rjes thob pa/ sa// lha myi mang po yongs sbyin mdzad// mngon par byung ba'i blo / dgongs pa'i// de'i lus la deng bab bo// ma grol bas ni
149a6(mdo): dgrol myi nus/ long bas lam yang ston gyi nus// grol bas dgrol bar byed par nus// myig ldan long ba lam ston nus// se mas can kang dag 'dod pas 'a'al // khyim nor bu dang chungs
149a7(mdo): chags// de dag khyod ni rjes slob cing // mngon par 'byung bar bzhed par mdzod// dbang phyug 'dod pas 'che ba dang // gling bzhi 'i rin chen bdun spangs te// khyod ni mngon par byung rig nas// lha myir bcas pa ma/
149a8(mdo): 'jig rten mos// khyod ni 'dod la myi dges te// bsam gtan de bas gnas mdzad kyang // lha myi brgya phrag mang po dag/ gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad// dpal bab 'di shi nad tu 'da'// rig zar
149a9(mdo): 'bab chu ma kyogs 'gro bzhin// dpal bab pa yal gyur nas// mngon par byung ba mdzes ma lags// de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dar bab dam par mngon byung ste// thugs dpa nyams 'og chud mdzod
149b1(mdo): 2/ lha mye'i don ni mdzad pa'i rigs// 'dod pa'i yon tan myi ngoms te// dper na lan tsha'i chu dang mtshungs// 'phags pa'i rdul myed 'jig rten 'das// shes rab kang ldan de dag ngoms// khyod 'dir rgyal po
149b2(mdo): zas gtsang dang // yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'ong stug// mda' ma brgya'i zhal 'dra ba// mngon par byung bar dgongs su gsol// nyon mongs gdungs pas rab gdungs shing // 'byung byed bcings pas dam bcings/
149b3(mdo): rnams// dpa' bos myur du mtshungs myed pa// tharapa lam zhil dgongs su gsol// khyod ni sman pa thabs la ma'am// sems can sun ringan rnams la// chos kyi sman ni sbyar mdzad de// mya ngan 'das 'de
149b4(mdo): myur du 'od// myig myed mun pa gti mug grags// lta ba'i dra dos dkris pa'i// lha rnams dang ni myi'i myig// shes rab sgron ma myur du skyongs// byang chub thob pa blta bya zhing // bla na myed/
149b5(mdo): pa'i chos mnyan ces// lha dang lha myin klu dag dang // gnod sbyi na dri za mang po sdod// klu'i rgyal po rang gi gnas// khyod kyi / pal gyis sdang bar mthong // mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas bgyi
149b6(mdo): de'i brtul zhugs bsam bskongs// byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs sa// lhung bzed bzhi ni dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten skyong bzhi sde ra bcas pa// de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis// tshangs pa
149b7(mdo): rab tu zhe myong la// byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang // zla myed 'khor lo rab bskor ba// myi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis// byang chub bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha// byang chub snying por gnas rnams
149b8(mdo): kyang // byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgyab// blta'o zhes te sdod cing mchis// byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'inipa// bya ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis// de dag thog mar khyod gyur da mdzod// de dag 'og tu lus sa re
149b9(mdo): dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa// mar mye mdzad kyi lung bstand dgongs// yang dag de bzhin ma nor ba// rgyal pA dbyangs smra bsgrag tu gsol// bskul pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
150a1(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpal bskul ma thag tu/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmyil ma 'di bstan to// rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis log pa'i rmyi lam du byis pa/ byang chub sems
150a2(mdo): dpa' mtshan mo mya nyel tsam na// lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te mngon par byung zhing mngon par byung nas kyang rab tu byung ste/ gos ngur smyig gyod pa rmyis so// de nas de sad pa dang / rings pa rings par nyung rum la dris pa
150a3(mdo): gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor kyi nang na 'dug gam// des smras pa/ lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du/ gzhon nu ni kadon myi za bar mngon par 'byung bar gyur da te/ snga ltas su sdang ba ni 'odi
150a4(mdo): dag yin snyam nas/ khod pa'i snying la mya ngan kyi zug rngus zug par gyur da to// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro bar myi 'gyur te/ bud
150a5(mdo): myed kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bas 'di nyid du chags pa ra gyur da te/ mngon par 'byung ba ni myi 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu'i long spyod kyi phyir/ dpyid dang
150a6(mdo): dbyar dang ston gyi dus ji lta ba bzhin du khang bzangs gsum byed du bcug ko// de la dpyid sa gang yin pa de ni shi nad tu bsil ba'o// dbyangs gang yin pa de ni grang dro rad pa'o// dkun sa gang yin pa de
150a7(mdo): ni rang bzhin gyis dro ba'o// khang bzangs re re'i chu slas rnams kyang myi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'dzugs shing 'bebs so// de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing 'bebs pa na/ gzhon nu sus kyang ma tshor bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur
150a8(mdo): du 'ong ngo zhes sgra dpag tshad phyed du zag pa byung ngo // ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan kun kyis kyang / gzhon nu chab sgo bkra shis pa na mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstand to// de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo 'phar
150a9(mdo): chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo 'phar re re yang myi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed cing gcod do// de dag kisma yang dpag tshad phyed du grag go// de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa myed pa yang sbyor ro// klu dang rol mo'i sgra
150b1(mdo): dbyangs lend pa dang / kar byed pa'i ma chung dag kyang rtag tu gzhag par gyur to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa kha lo sbyar ba la smras pa/ deng skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gros zhing rta myur du sbyor cig/ de nas
150b2(mdo): kha lo sgyur ba rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu bskyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo zhes gsung ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gzhon nu
150b3(mdo): skyed mos tshal gyi sar nam yang ma phyung bas/ sa bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung na/ 'od dang gzhon nu bud myed kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dga' ba myong bar 'gyur bas ma
150b4(mdo): bar myi 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpal sa byams pa dang / rim gro byed pas da ste zhag bdun na gzhon nu sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung gis
150b5(mdo): der khyed kyis gzhon nu myig du myi 'ong ba mthong bar myi 'gyur bar/ yid du myi 'ong ba thams cad ni srol cig/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yul nyams dka' ba thams cad ni sbyor cig ces grong khyer du dril
150b6(mdo): bsgrags so// de nas zhag bdun gyi nyid par grong khyer thams da brgya dang to// bskyed mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcos bu kha dog tha dad pa'i bla re ni bres/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
150b7(mdo): dang / ba dan gyis ni legs par brgya nang to// byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste/ phyags nas spros chu'i chag chag btab ste/ mye tog sil ma ni chal par bkram pon
150b8(mdo): bor nas ni bdugs/ bum pa gang bas ni mdzes par byas/ chu shing sngon pas ni bsgreng / dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyis bla re bres/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rgyun 'phreng dang / chun po ni dpyangs
150b9(mdo): dpung bzhi'i bkod pa ni byas so// g.yog 'khor dang gzhon nul btsun mo'i 'khor brgyand pa'i phyir brtson par gyur da to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer kyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos
151a1(mdo): tshal gyi sar byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ myi rgan po gtugs pa 'khogs pa/ lus la sa rgyus 'thond pa/ so rga lad pa/ lus
151a2(mdo): gnyer mas gang ba/ skra byi ba skur ba/ gdung rten ltar dku ba zhom pa/ khar ba la rten pa mthu zad pa/ dar yal ba/ myid pa nas skra dang po 'byung ba/ lus dgu bas zhar ba la rtend nas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad
151a3(mdo): 'dar ba zhig lam khar bstand par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa zhes bzhin du/ kha lo bsgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'alo bsgyur ba myi ring nyams chung zhing // sha khrag skams la rgyas lpags nyi
151a4(mdo): kris// mgo rkang so rgald lus ni rab skye ma la// khar brten cing myi bde khyor 'gro su// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig myi 'di rga bas zi yid kyis nond// dbang po nyams shing sdug bsngal batshon stobs nyams
151a5(mdo): gnyen gyi skye bos brnyas shing mgon myed gyur da// don bgyid myi nus nags khrod shing ltar bor// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ 'di'i chos 'di rigs kyi yin nam 'on tam ni// 'gro ba
151a6(mdo): 'di kun la yang 'di srid da smos shig/ tshig 'di yang dag ji ba zhin myur du spros shig dang // thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam// kha lo sgyur bas spras pa/ lha 'di rigs chos
151a7(mdo): ma lags yul 'khor chos ma lags// skye bo kun gyi dpal bab pa rga bas 'joms// khyod kyi yab dang yum dang nye du gnyen chogs kyang // rgalas ma thard 'gro ba'i thabs ni gzhan ma mchis// byang chub sems
151a8(mdo): dpa'as smras pa kha lo sbyar ba byis pa'i skye bos myi mkhas pa'i// blo ngan gzhon pas rgyags shing myos pas rgam mthong // nga ni slar 'gro nga'i shing rta myur du sbyar// pa yang rga la gnas pa che dga'as ci zhig bya//
151a9(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na/ bkod pa chen pos grong kyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas/ bskyed mos
151b1(mdo): tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka na myi nad kyis nyen pa dmu rdzing can/ lus nyam chung ba/ rang gi gcin rgyag du bying ba/ mgon myed pa/ skyabs myed pa/ shi nad tu sha thar par dbugs 'byung zhing rngub dgos pa zhig
151b2(mdo): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpa'as shes bzhin du/ kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'alo sgyur ba myi nub lus kyi mdog ngan la// dbang po thams cad nyams shing dbugs dbyung rab tu
151b3(mdo): dka'// yan lag kun skams lto bas dkrugs shing nyam thag gyur // rang gi ka tsin rtug smad pa'i gnas na 'dug 'di su// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig myi 'di shi nad tu nad kyis btab pa ste// nad kyi 'jigs
151b4(mdo): pa nye bar mchis pas 'akum la thug/ nad myed gza'i brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnam par nyams// mgon dang skyabs dang klang dang dpu pa nyen ma mchis lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa
151b5(mdo): nad myed pa yang rmyi lam na ni me dang mtshungs// nad kyi 'jig/ sa pa 'di ltar shind tu myi bzad pa// skyes bu mkhas pas gnas// 'di mthong nas ji lta bur// che la dka' dang sdug pa'i 'du shes
151b6(mdo): skyed par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur da te/ phyir yang krong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig
151b7(mdo): na bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka nas myi zhi bar gyur da pa/ khyogs la bzhag pa/ ras kyi bla res phub pa/ nye du tshogs kyis bskor/
151b8(mdo): te kun kyang ngu zhing skad phyung ste/ du ya smre sngags 'don cing / sma gshig la/ mgo las 'thor zhing brang rdung la chod nge 'don pa phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems
151b9(mdo): dpa'as shes bzhin du/ kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// wa lo sgyur ba myi 'di khyogs la bzhag nas ni// myi dag sgra bshig mgo la sa 'is 'thor byed cing // sna tshogs dag gis tshig ni brjod la
152a1(mdo): brang chung bas// kun nas skor ba byas te khyer ba su zhig yin// kha lo sbyar bas smras pa/ sta cig myi 'di 'dzam bu gling du kum pa ste// slan chad pha ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong myi 'gyur// yod/
152a2(mdo): spyod khyim dang mdza' gnyen tshogs rnams spangs nas ni// 'jig rten pha rol mchis te slan chad gnyen myi mthong // byang chub sems dpas smras pa// rga bas gnod par gyurd pa'i gzhon pa cir myi rung // sna tshogs/
152a3(mdo): nad kyis gnod gyur da nad myed cing gyi rung // ring du myi gnas gson pa mkhas la cir myi rung // dgal la chags pa skyes bu mkhas la cir gyi rung // kald te na myed nad myed 'chi ba myed gyur kyang // 'on kyang phung
152a4(mdo): po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal che yin na/ rgan 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos// legs par zag bzlog rab tu tha dad par bya ba bsam// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta mchog
152a5(mdo): de slar bzlog ste phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong / dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi bya nga phyogs kyi sgo nas/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang /
152a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i mthus/ lha'i bu de dag gis lam ka de ra dge slong zhig mngon par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa dge slong zhi ba dul ba yang dag par bsdams pa/ tshangs pa
152a7(mdo): spyod pa myig phab pa/ gnya' zhing gang tsam du ltu ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa/ 'gro ba dang / sdog pa mdzes pa/ phun sum tshogs pa/ mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yos su lta ba mdzes pa/ chos gos sngam sbyar
152a8(mdo): dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs pa/ mdzes pa zhig lam ka na 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sa shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces so// la lo sgyur ba skyes bu
152a9(mdo): sems zhi bar zhi zhing // myig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang tsam lta byed cing // dur smyig kos gyon shind tu rab tu zhi bar spyod// lhung bzed thogs nas myi rgod ma khengs su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/
152b1(mdo): lha cig kyi 'di dge slong zhes ni bgyi ga lags// 'dod pa'i dka' ba spangs shing shind tu dul bar spyod// bdag nyid zhi ba chos zhing rab tu byung bar gyur // 'dod chags zhe sdang bral bar bsod snyoms pyod cing rgyu/
152b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sa smras pa// 'di ni dge bar legs smras pa yang 'dod pa ste// rab tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags// de ni bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la 'ang phan// 'tsho ba
152b3(mdo): bde zhing nyams mthun 'chi myed 'bras bur gyur // dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa'as shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur da te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la bskul
152b4(mdo): pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ rab rgya chen po skye da du bcug ste/ 'obs kyang skor du bcug/ sgo brtan po yang 'dzugs
152b5(mdo): su bcug/ srungs ma yang bkod/ dpa' bo rnams kyang spadang / gzhon pa yang sta kon byas/ go cha yang gyon du bcug ko// byang / chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi'i
152b6(mdo): lam gyi mdun sum rnams su/ dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhi ga ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung b.re zhes de dag de bsrung du bcug go// btsun mo'i 'khor la yang res 'ga'
152b7(mdo): tsam yang klu dbyangs kyis rgyun chad dang/ dga' ba dang che ba thams cad kyang sbyor cig/ ci nas kyang gzhon nu chags nas rab tu byung bar myi 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar gyu rad par bud myed kyi rgyu yang ston cig ces bsgom
152b8(mdo): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// thab mo mos pa'i skyes yu la ka na ras gi mtshon thogs na par bkod// so lags kyi klung po gas kyi bskyed glang po'i 'phreng ba 'ang bkod// 'obs dang shing sa
152b9(mdo): dag dang rta babs phyir mthon po 'ang byed du bcug/ sgo mo rgyang grags grag pa'i sgra byung ba yang gtan pa dam po bcug/ shaka kya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yid myi dga' zhing nyid mtshan srung bar byed// dpung
153a1(mdo): chen de dag rnams kyang sgra skad chen po shind tu grag par byed// nges pa 'di nas byung du 'ong zhes grong khyer 'khrugs shing yid sngangs smag/ shag kya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par myi 'gyur grang
153a2(mdo): snyam byed// skye bo bud myed dag la bsgo ba rtag tu klu dbyangs rgyun ma chad// che bas dka' ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyis shig yid kyang mgu bar gyis// bud myed sgyu thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang po stong//
153a3(mdo): nges pa 'gror myi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byos shing bkyegs kyang rab du byos// kha lo sgyur bas mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag ste// ngang pa zhung zhung dag dang rma bya ri skyegs dag dang ne tso rnams// khang bzangs skar
153a4(mdo): khung rta babs mchog dang yang thog khri la 'khod nas ni// dman zhing dman la myi dga' myi bde mgo smad sems shing sgra myi 'byin/ rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gi pad ma dag kyang rnyis shing rnyis par gyurd/
153a5(mdo): shing ljon skams shing yal ka mye tog lhags la mye tog slar myiHkas// pi bang gling bu rgyud gsum rgyud kyis brgya nad pa de tshe gling du/ ra chad// rnga dang rdza rnga dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing sgra
153a6(mdo): myi 'byinang // grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shind tu gnyid kyis non // gang gi yid kyang klu len pa dang kar byed pa la dka' ba myed// rgyal po'ang mchog tu rab tu yid dman
153a7(mdo): gyurd te sems khongs chud cing 'dug/ e ma ma rung shag rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen myi tshig gang snyam byed// sa mtsho ma dang rgyal bu mal cig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe// nam phyed tsam na sa 'tsho mo'i skye
153a8(mdo): lam du ni 'di dag rmyis// sa 'di thams cad se mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te g.yos par gyur// shing sngon rnams kyang rlung kyis bskyon nas ma nas 'thon te sa la 'gelang// nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang
153a9(mdo): bcas te mkha' las sa la ltung // lag pa g.yon pas skra yang rab tu 'bal zhing cod pan ltung ba mthong // lag pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong // bdag gi mu tig do shas
153b1(mdo): nor bu gser gyi 'od bag chad pa mthong // nyal khri de'i rkang pa bzhi chag pa'i steng mnyal ba mthong // rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yu ba spras pa dpal ldan ma / rgyand rnams kun kyang rnam
153b2(mdo): par 'thor da cing chu'i sa khyer bar gyurd pa dang // khyim thab rgyan dang gos dang con pan bcas te mal steng 'thor bar mthong // grong khyer dag nas me sgron phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang // rin po che
153b3(mdo): las byas pa rlabs mdzes pa'ang chad par gyur ba gyis// mu tig do zhal 'phyang ba snyung nas rgya mtsho chen pos dkrugs pa dang // de'i tshen ri'i rgyas po ri rab gnas nas g.yos pa rmyis// shag kya ba'i rgyu
153b4(mdo): lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di dag rgyas gyur nas// de sang myig sa mchi ma zag cing rang gi khyol 'di skad smras// lha cig rmyi lam 'dri 'dra mis pa cir 'gyur ba ni bka' b.rol cig/ bdag ni dran pa
153b5(mdo): 'khruld cing myig kyang 'khrul la yid ni mya ngan nond// de'i/ sa de thos ka la bying ka'i rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas/ sa 'tsho ma la smras pa khyod ni rab tu dka' gyur sdig pa myed/
153b6(mdo): sems can gang dag bsod nams sngon spyad de dag rmyi lam 'di 'dra mi// sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa rmi lam 'di 'dra mib kang la yod// khyod kyis sa ni kab tu g.yos pa dang // ri cher
153b7(mdo): bcas te sa la ltung rmis pa// lha dang klu dang srin po 'byung ba'i tshogs// kun kyis khyod mchod gtso bor byed par 'gyur// khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa nas bton mis shing // lag pa g.yon pas skra 'bal mirmis
153b8(mdo): pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra ba bcad// 'dus byas dag las smra ba'i dra ba 'byind// khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lcang gyis shing // skar ma rnams kyang ltung ba skyes pa ni// sa 'tsho myu rang du nyon mongs pa/
153b9(mdo): bcom ste// khyod na 'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par gyur da// khyed kyis mu tig do shal 'thor mis shing // lus kun chad dang sgren mo rmos pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du bud byed lus spangs te// ring por myi
154a1(mdo): thogs skyes pa'i lus su gyur // khyod kyis khri rkang chag par mis pa dang // gdugs yu rin chen spras pa chag rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du chu bo bzhi rga lang zhing // nga ni 'jig rten gdugs
154a2(mdo): gcig 'gyur ba mthong // khyod kyis rgyan rnams chus khyer rmis pa dang // nga'i kos dang cod pan khri stengs mis// sa 'tsho myur tu mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni// 'jig rten kun gyis ngal ston par mtho ba//
154a3(mdo): khyod kyis mar me brgya phrag bye ba dag/ grong khyer byung nas mun kanag gyur darmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i mun// 'jig rten kun la shes rab sdang byed 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig do zhal chang
154a4(mdo): pa dang // gser gyi tshong cong spras pa chad mis pa// sa 'tsho rgyu ra du nyon mongs dwa bcad de// 'dus byas dag las 'du shes bsgyur pa 'byind// sa 'tsho gang phyir bal gus par ni// rtag tu rim
154a5(mdo): gro mchog gis mchod byed na// khyod la ngan 'gro myed cing mya ngan// myed// myur du dka' zhing mchog tu dka' ba thob// ngas ni sngon cha/ da sbyin pa gya nos byin// tshul khrims srung zhing rtag tu bzod pa
154a6(mdo): bsgoms// de bas dad pa pal gang rnyed pa// de dag thams cad dga' zhing rab dga' rnyed// 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mthal sas su// ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs/
154a7(mdo): de bas pa la dad par kang byed pa// de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po chad// dka' ba thob kyis myi dka' ma skyed cig/ tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu skyed cig/ dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba myur thob ste/
154a8(mdo): khyod kyi mo stes bzang gis sa 'tsho nyol// sngon chad dge ba'i las ni yang dag bsngags gyu rad pa// myi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab tshe// mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nams gzi'i brjid bsugs
154a9(mdo): pa dang // dpal gyi gzi'i brjid snying po can des mi ber 'gyur// de ni rkang pa dag dang lag pa chen po yis// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gi chu dkrugs dang // sa 'di thams cad sna tshogs mal char gyur
154b1(mdo): pa dang // ri bo lhun po mchog kyang sngas su gyur da pa mi// myol na ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na// mun pa yun gnag chen po rnam par bsal ba dang // sa las gdugs cig byung bas 'jig rten gsum khyab dang //
154b2(mdo): 'od kyis reg pas log ldung sdug bsngal rab zhi mi// dag pa nag srog chags bzhi zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang // kha dog bzhi pa'i bya 'ongs kha dog gcig kyu rang dang // mchod du ngan pa spad pa ngang skyugs ri la yang /
154b3(mdo): 'dzegs nas 'gre yang dgos pa myed pa myi// rmyil ma na ni chu bo'i chu yis rab kang nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba la// de ni gur byas bskal te gzhan dag bsgral nas ni// de yis
154b4(mdo): 'jigs myed mya ngan myed mchog thang bkod myi// rmyi lam na nin da pa mang po dang btab pa// nad myed gzi' brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la// de ni sman par gyur nas ci sman ma
154b5(mdo): byin pas// nad btab sems can khrag khrig mang po thar byed cing // ri rab ngos la seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas mi// slob ma/ thal mo sbyard cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal la// bdag ni
154b6(mdo): g.yul las rgyal zhing lha rnams nam mkha' las// kun tu dka' ba'i sgra sgrogs par ni rmyi lam myi// bkra shis rtul shugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs par yang // byang chub sems
154b7(mdo): dpa' rmyi lam de dag myi// de thos nas ni 'di ni ring po myi thogs par// myi'i lha'i lhar 'gyur snyam ste lha myi dga'// mi lam kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//
154b8(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la yang ma byas shing // phas gnanga' myed par mngon par byung ba 'di ni bdag la myi rigs te/ byas pa
154b9(mdo): bzo' ba ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de mtshan mo myi nyal tsam na/ rang gi gnas kyi khang bzangs nas byung ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i zhang bzangs su phyi nad te 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa'
155a1(mdo): 'dug ma mag tu/ gang bgrangs thams ca 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sad pa dang 'od de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang sbyang ba myur bar nyung ngus la smras pa/ kye nyung dum
155a2(mdo): 9/ ci nyi ma shar dwa tama?// gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes// nyung rum kyis sbas pa// lhang dung dkung phyed kyang ma byas so// sku gzhan yang / nyi ma'i 'od mi shing dang mig pa thal gyi phyin// sus
155a3(mdo): gdung bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab tu bgyid// nang par dus na ngang pa dag dang ma bya dang // ne tso khu byug dud pa dag kyang dag rang sgra 'byin // 'od 'di lha myi'i yid du mchi zhing bde ba ste// rab tu sems bgyid dge
155a4(mdo): bgyid gdung bar bgyid ma lags// shing dang tshig pa thal byung sgrib pa yod ma mchis// yon tan ldan pa gcig ka mig de ni 'dir byon ces// rgyal po de ni myi dka' phyogs bcur bltas
155a5(mdo): pa dang // sems can dag pa pad ma'i myig can de mthong nas// de ni ma la nas ldang bar 'dod na ma nus te// rnam dag blo can da / ma pa pha la gus pa bskyed// de ni rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas
155a6(mdo): 'di skad smras// lha cig bdag ni mngon par byung ba'i dus pa ba rigs// bkyegs kyang ma mdzad mya dge pa yang ma mdzad cig/ rgyal po gnyen bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod pa
155a7(mdo): mdzod// rgyal po de ni mchims myig ga 'di skad smras// khyod ni phyir myi ldog pa'i dgos pa ci zhig yod// bdag la dam pa ci slong smos shig thams cad sbyin// bdag dang po brang 'khor
155a8(mdo): 'khom 'di pon/ rtogs// de tshe byang chub sems dpa'as snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// lha cig dam pa bzhi 'tshal de ni bdag la 'acol // gsad te bsaya par spyod na mngal ni khyod la mchis
155a9(mdo): 'on kyang rtag tu khyam na gzigs shing 'byung bar gyur// lha cig bdag ni rga bas tshugs par myi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mdog bzangs dal bab par gnas pa dang // nad ma mchis pa thob ying nad kyis
155b1(mdo): myi btab dang // tshe dpaka ma mchis pa dang rgud par myi 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos tshig zos shin tu sdug bsngal nyam thag ste// gzhon nu gnas myin slong bas bdag la mthu myed do// bskald par gnas pI
155b2(mdo): drang srong rnams kyang nas / ya // rkan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud las ma thard to// rkan 'chi ba la 'jigs dang rgud par myi 'gyur la// lha cig ka lad te mchog bzhi 'di dag myi sA la dA na// gzhan sa mchog
155b3(mdo): gsos kyis rgyal pos gas du gsaso// 'di na gi mo nyi mchis sbyor bar mdzod// myi'i dam pa'i tshig ni de skad thos pa dang // sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su gcod// phan byed 'gro ba thar byed rjes su yi rang ngo //
155b4(mdo): khyod kyi bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur da cig/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' slar song ste// rang kyi khyim du phyi nad nas/ mal na 'dug pa dang de song ba 'am 'ongs par
155b5(mdo): sus kyang ma tshor ro// dge slong dag de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po zas katsang mas shaka kya'i tsho gas thams cad bstsogs te/ de'i lo rgyus rnams smos nas/ gzhon nu mngon par byung
155b6(mdo): na/ da ni ji ltar bya zhes smras so// shag kyang rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shAgakye'i tshogs 'di ni mang la/ de ni ga cig pur gyur pas mthus
155b7(mdo): mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa de la ma mchis so// de nas shag kya de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas shag kya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyur du pa/ 'phod skabs pa/ chen po che chen po'i stobs dang
155b8(mdo): ldan pa lnga brgya/ byang chub sems dpa' 'asrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar phyogs skor bkod do// byang chub sems dpa' srung ba'i phyir/ shAka kya gzhon nu re re la 'anga'akhor zhing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shi rta re tshe
155b9(mdo): la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin du grong khyer kyi lho dang nub dang byang gi sgor yang / shag kya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyur da pa
156a1(mdo): 'phong bslabs pa/ chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shaka kya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rta re le la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod
156a2(mdo): do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ shag kya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyang lam gyi mdo' dang / mngon sum dang / lam po che mang po thams cad na 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang shag kya gzhon
156a3(mdo): nu lnga brgyas bskor cing bdun gyis bltas te// rta dang glang po che dag la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgon mel tse byed do// skye dku'i bdag mo chen mo 'go'u ta myis kyang / rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/ mar mye dIm
156a4(mdo): myed pa gus la nor bu rgyal mtshan che mor thogs// mu tig rgyan 'phreng rnams kyang skyongs la khyim 'di kun tu 'od kyis snang bar byos// klu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mod g.yel ba myed par me la tse dam du gyis
156a5(mdo): gzho nu ci nas mchor bar mi 'gro bar myi 'gyur tshul du srung ba kyis// go bkos la ka na lag ca ral gi dang // ma dung thung mda' dang ma tshon cha che gnyis thogs// stug pa'i bu ni srung bar bya ba'i phyir
156a6(mdo): kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po kyis// sgo kun chod la katan pa dam du chug/ sgo 'phar sra ba skyed par gtan chug la/ dus la ma bab par ni sgo ma dbye// sems can dam pa 'di ni
156a7(mdo): shor ta ru// nor bu do shas mu tika ro shal thogs// me tog zla kam seng ke shing lo ris// ska rags sngo nub na rgyun chings shing thogs// rkang rtsub dag kyang shind tu legs par thogs// lha myi'i phan pa
156a8(mdo): glang po'i dreg bzhin 'gro// g.yang te glo bur mngon par byung ba re// ci nas myi bde rnyed par ma gyu rad par// de lta de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/ bud myed gang dag mdung zung thogs pa dag/ dri ma myed
156a9(mdo): pa mal na 'dug pa bskor da// ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur da par// phye ma leb bzhin myig gis bsrung ba gyis// rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// khyim 'dir rin po che'i dri bas ris// gleng
156b1(mdo): bu dag kyang rab tu bud cing long // ro so nus dang bral ba bsrung kyi kyis// phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sman gyis te// de mod ma nyal shi nad tu bsrung ba khyis// rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su/
156b2(mdo): khyim nas mngon du byung bar gyurar ta me// 'dra ni mngon par byung bar gyur da na ko// rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams kyi dgal// rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang // rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud ni ched par
156b3(mdo): gyur da// dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lnga chen las so tshogs pa/ gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon nyi shu ra brgyad dang / 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces smras te// grogs
156b4(mdo): po dag do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'thud kyis bye dan+daka de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la sprob kyis shig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lung lo cadan kyi pho brang du zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin
156b5(mdo): gyi 'khor chen po la smras pa/ grogs po dag do mod byang chub/ sems dpa' mngon par 'byung kyis khyed kyis bcibs pa'iH/ lag nas theg la byung bar gyis shig/ gnod sbyin kyi 'khor
156b6(mdo): gyis smras pa// sku ni sred myed bu'i stobs ldan rdo rje lta buramyi byed sral sti// sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni 'artson 'grus s+ho/ bas ldan g.yol ba myi mnga' ste// ri'i dam pa lhun po chen po
156b7(mdo): rmang nas phyung ste nam kar bzung nus kyi// rgyal ba'i yon tan lhun po'i ri lI bsod nams ye shes gnas pa lus kyang gang du bkur myi nus// nam thos kyi bus smras pa/ myi gang pal rgyal 'gying ba de la ston pa su/
156b8(mdo): gang dag dka' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar chod// bsam pa thag pas 'tshon 'grus byos la gus pa yis// bya lin lam bzhin du yang dag shes par gyis// kho bo mdun nas 'gro zhing khyed cag rnams kyis
156b9(mdo): bcibs pa theg/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po stsogs// dge slong dag de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ sum cu cha gsum gyi lha rnams la spras pa// kye grogs
157a1(mdo): po drag do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung kis/ de la khyed thams cad mchod pa'i las la sprob gyis shig/ de nas lda bu'i TI tre gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces spras so// bdag gis/
157a2(mdo): ni ser skya'i grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kanyid kyis log par bgyi'o// lha'i bu che ba bkod pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni rta dang glang
157a3(mdo): po che dang / bung bu dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sgra myi klog par bgyi'o// lha'i bu bkod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//
157a4(mdo): bdag gis ni nam mkha'i dkyil na shing rta chen po bdun rin po che'i stegs bus 'khor bar bskor da pa/ nor bu rin po che mye shel gyi 'od 'bar ba gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ me tog sna tshogs chal
157a5(mdo): par bkram pa pog por nas bdug spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs pa/ dka/ byang chub sems dpa' lam kang na byung ba'i lam der bkod/ pa bgyi'o// klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi shu zhes bya bas 'di skad
157a6(mdo): ces smras so// bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyi sA la khang pa kas pa dpag tshad sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bgyis te/ der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la/ sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs len du stsal
157a7(mdo): cing ku dang / rol mo'i dbyangs lnga chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang / bsnyen bskur bgyid cing mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos ni sgo byem
157a8(mdo): lam mchon bya'o// kwa'i bu chos khyod kyis 'di ces smras so// bdag gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyi sdug par bsta dad par bgyi'o// sgra'i bu yang bdag phul pas smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub
157a9(mdo): sems dpa' gzims mal nas bzhengs su gsol bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang
157b1(mdo): bsnyen dge' bos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dang gi sprin mngon par srul da te/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char
157b2(mdo): dbab 'o// dge slong dag de ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsams shing mngon tu byed do// byang chub sems dpa' chos sems pa la zhugs pa/ klu dbyangs len
157b3(mdo): pa'i khang bzangs na/ ma la bde ba la 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shing sems cad la phan par bya ba rjes su sems la/ sngon gyi spon
157b4(mdo): lam gyi tshig bzhi mngon tu byed do// bzhi gang zhe na sngon par byung gi bdag po 'dod cing thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do tu gnyer ban ko cha 'di lta bu bgos par gyurd te/ sems can sdug bsngal
157b5(mdo): bdag mthong nas/ kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa ba/ cings te/ 'khor ba'i btson ra chen po bcug pa la/ 'khor ba'i btson ra drald te/ bcing ba bkrol ba'i sgra bsgrag ko// sred pa
157b6(mdo): zhags pa dang / sgrog dpos bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyangar ba tu dkrol lo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon tu gyur da to// kye ma'o bdag gis ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnas
157b7(mdo): thibs po chen por zhugs pa/ myi shes pa'i ling tog dang / rab rib kyis myig bsgribs pa shes rab kyi myig dang bral ba ma rig pa dang / gti mug gis ldongs pa la chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi sgron ma yang
157b8(mdo): nye bar bsgrubs la/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i myig sman ri lu dang / sman thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab
157b9(mdo): ri ba dang / ling tika dang / rnyog pa thams cad bsal nas/ shes rab kyi myig rnam par skyong po zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon tu gyur da to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten nga rgyal gyi rgyal
158a1(mdo): mtshan bsgreng ba/ ngar 'dzind pa dang / nga yir 'dzidad pa la mngon par zhen pa/ bdag dpa' dag kir 'dzind pa dang ldan pa'i yid can du 'du shes dang / sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gis/ phyin ci log tu
158a2(mdo): myur da pa/ bzung ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i lam bstand te/ pa'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal bsnyal bar bya'o zhes bya ba/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gsum pa 'di me ngon tu gyur da to// kye ma 'o bdag gis 'jig rten rnam
158a3(mdo): par ma zhi ba/ zags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa/ dru bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur da pa/ 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar gyurd pa dang / 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang / 'jig rten pha rol nas/ 'jig rten 'dir kun rgyug cing
158a4(mdo): 'khor la/ 'khor ba las myi ldog pa/ makal me'i 'khor lo lta bur gyur pa la nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab kyis/ tshig par byed pa'i chos kyang bstand to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po 'di mngon du
158a5(mdo): gyurd te/ sngon gyi smod lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon tu gyur to// skad cig de la lha'i bu chos dpyod dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi/ lha'i bu rnams kyis/ btsun mo'i 'khor myi sdug par 'asgyur te/
158a6(mdo): mya sdug par gnas pa dang / smad pa'i gzugs su bstan nas/ nam mkha' la 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su baHdede smras pa// de nas lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis/ pad ma
158a7(mdo): rgyas pa yangs pa'i spyan la spras// dur khrod dbus 'dir bzhugs par gyur da lags na// khyod ni ji ltar dges par skye bar 'gyur// lha'i dbang phyug rnams kyis de bskul nas// ud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta
158a8(mdo): zhing rtog/ bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong // dur khrod gnas par gyur pa bden snyam byed// byang chub sems dpa' sa thams cad dang ldan pa'i bud myed kyi tshogs la rnam par bsdus pa dang / kha cig
158a9(mdo): ni kos lhung bar gyurd/ kha cig ni sma bshig/ kha cig ni rgyan bru la/ kha cig ni cod pan lUng / wa cika ni phrag pa myi sdug par gyur da/ kha cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs/ kha cig bzhin myi stug par gnas
158b1(mdo): kha cig ni rtsig 'gyur/ kha cig mi 'khru ba ka/ kha cig ni dbus/ kha cig ni sud pa u/ kha cig ni rgod/ kha cig ni 'jos/ kha cig ni so khris/ kha cig ni bzhin mdog 'gyur/ kha cig ni gzugs kyi sdug par gyur
158b2(mdo): te lag pa ring por gyur du/ kha cig ni rkang ba phral/ kha cig ni mgo byung / 'acig ni mgo ga yogs/ kha cig ni bzhin dbyibs gyurd/ kha cig ni lus ma chung bar gyu rang / kha cig ni lus spen mor myur
158b3(mdo): kha cig ni lus bskums shing skur/ kha cig ni rdza rnga la 'khyud nas lus kar rgyal nu 'gyel/ kha cig ni pi bang dang rgyud gsum pa'i steng du lag brkyang / kha cig ni gling bu la sos 'debs/ kha cig ni rol mo'i
158b4(mdo): cha byad kim pa la dang / na lu ka dang / khar ba'i sil grol dang pheg la 'dzind/ kha cig ni myig 'dzums shing 'byed la sbyar kha cig ni kha ga dngas par gyur da te/ de ltar sa la myi sdug par
158b5(mdo): gnas par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing / byang chupa sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyed do// de la 'di sa/ de ces bya ste// // 'jig rtenang mgon des de mthong yid byung
158b6(mdo): ste// snying rje shug byung nas ni 'di skad smras// e ma skye dgur ka ni sdug bsngal 'gyur// srin mo'i tshogs la dka' ba ji ltar snyed// 'dod pa'i yon tan yor myin yon tan 'dzid// ga N+Di
158b7(mdo): mug mur bas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan// dper na bya ni bya rgyar chud pa bzhin// nam yang 'byung bar rnyed par 'gyur ma yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa'as chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis// yang btsun mo'i
158b8(mdo): 'khor du la rtog cing snying rje chen po'i sme bas// sems can kyi phyir smra ste/ 'dir byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/ gsad pa'i gnas su gsad par bya ba'i gsod pa dang / mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa
158b9(mdo): de dag ni chags pa ste/ ngan skyugs kyis gang ba'i sdod ri mo can rnams la myi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste/ glang po che chur 'bying ba dang mtshungs so//
159a1(mdo): 'di na byis pa de dag ni bcwa pa ste/ btsor ra'i nang gi brtson bcas pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni mngon par dga' ba ste/ phag myi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis/
159a2(mdo): pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ khyi khyi nus la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni rab tu lung ba ste/ phye ma leb mar mye'i mye lder srung ba dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa thams cad ni thogs pa
159a3(mdo): ste/ spre'u ni la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su gdung ba ste// nya rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni yongs su gtubs pa ste/ sha'atshong gi gnas
159a4(mdo): kyi lug dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btsugs pa ste sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshung sa so// 'di na byis pa de dag 'bying zhing thogs pa ste
159a5(mdo): glang po che rgang po 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag phongs pa ste/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu ni/ ka pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni rab tu sung
159a6(mdo): ba ste/ dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ste/ sa'i ka ting gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis
159a7(mdo): pa de dag ni du ba 'thul ba ste/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'khor ba ste/ rdza mkhan kyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog rtsol
159a8(mdo): ba ste/ dmus long ril phyi nad pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor ba ste/ khyi stong gis btags pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni rnyis pa ste/ dpyid kyi rtsa
159a9(mdo): dang dgas ral dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i zla ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la za ba ste/ kU la nam mkhas lding dang mtshu
159b1(mdo): so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'cha' ba ste/ gru bo che la chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/ 'dron pa la chom po mang po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams
159b2(mdo): la 'jigs pa ste/ shing sa la la rlung mar chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la gsod pa ste/ skye bo la sprul myig gdug pa dang mtshungs so// byis pa 'di dag ni ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod
159b3(mdo): ba ste/ ral gri'i so spang rtsis bskus pas chod pa bzhin no// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer pa ste shing gi phung po chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la brtsed pa ste/ byis pa chu ngu
159b4(mdo): rang gi gcin rtug la rtse ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la kun tu sbyar ba ste/ glang po che lcags kyu dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la sru ba ste/ g.yon can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin
159b5(mdo): can dag brid pa bzhin no// 'di na byis pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa ste/ brgya nang po la dka' ba'i nor dang ma// tshungs so// 'di dag gis byis pa rnams 'chos ste/
159b6(mdo): srin mo rnams kyis tshong ba 'tsho lA mtshungs so// byang chub se mas dpa' rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gis btsun mo 'i 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas/ lus la myi gtsang
159b7(mdo): ba'i 'du shes rnam par sdom myi 'dun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub// smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/ rang gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar rnam par bsgoms// lus kyi nyes dmyigs yang dag par mthong // lus la lus su
159b8(mdo): mngon par zhend pa las skyod/ srug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ myi srug po'i 'du shes 'dug par byed/ 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas steng gi klang ba man chad myi gtsang ba las byung ba dang / myi gtsang ba
159b9(mdo): las gyur pa dang / rtag tu myi gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo po// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// las kyi zhing las skyes shing srid pa'i chu las byung ba 'jig tshogs mying du btags/
160a1(mdo): mchi ma rtul dang mchims brlan la gcin kis sbyar cing khrag gi thigs pas kang // zhag dang nag dang snang ba dang ri klang rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang // rtag tu ngan skyugs zag
160a2(mdo): cing kun kyang dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa// pakas dang so dang swa dang spu'i bskord cing pags pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan// rgyu ma mchin pa mcher ba chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyam chung ba// rkang
160a3(mdo): dang chu rgyus dag gis spel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha 'is mdzes par byas// sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab la bkres dang skom pas kun da tu nye nang // skye ba po dag lus ni bu ka mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i
160a4(mdo): gnas gyur pa// mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus la dgra dang mtshungs par sems myi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub se mas dpa' lus la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to//
160a5(mdo): nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po don grub 'a/ di btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam par lta zhing 'dzum yang stond
160a6(mdo): sems ni myi dga' myig ni phyir zhing lta na phyi shol byed dam cig/ yang na 'di ni brgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs ste 'di'i tshad gzung bar myi nus so// yang na chags pa myed pa'i yul rnams la yid
160a7(mdo): chags par myi 'gyur grang / lha rnams kyis bskul pa'i yid dam brjed par ma gyur dkrang // lha'i bu chos spyod kyis smras pa/ de skad smra ci dgos/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na yang mngon par byung
160a8(mdo): ba dang gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa myed par gyu ra pa khyed la mngon sum cu gyur pa yin na/ ra srid pa tha ma la gnas pa chags par myi 'gyur ba ste spos kyang ci dgos dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems
160a9(mdo): dpa' nges par byas pa yid byung bar gyur pa blo rdul ba// tshul du shis shing rings thabs myed par skyil mo khrung bshig ste/ klung dbyangs le nad pa'i khang bzangs na shar phyogs su lta zhing 'dug nas
160b1(mdo): lag pa g.yas pas rin po che'i dra ba spang de// 'ang bzangs kyi steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar da te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te
160b2(mdo): nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang / des mthong ba/ nam mkha'i dkyil na lA'i dbang po myig stong dang ldan pa/ lnga brgya bstong gis bskord cing / me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang kos dang
160b3(mdo): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog na rgyan dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ sus btud nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'jig rtend skyong ba bzhi
160b4(mdo): yang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu'i tshogs kyi sa bskord cing / go tsa sra ba bgos ya lar bgos te/ ral gyi drang / mda' zhu dang mdung thung // mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang
160b5(mdo): rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing / tshul du shis par nor bu'i cod pan dang / gtsug pud 'phyang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba
160b6(mdo): gnyis kyang blo g.yas g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo // skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na sha rad pa mthong ngo // mahA nga nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'as 'dun pa la smras pa//
160b7(mdo): nga'i dkra shis 'di ni don sgrub pa// do mod gnod sbyin za bar don grub kyis// 'dun pa phyir shol ma byed la kor ru// ta rkyal rgyan gyis brgya nad pa ngal byin// de nas 'dun pas tshig de thos nas// yid myi dag
160b8(mdo): zhing 'di skad ces smras so// sbyin ma ring zhing pad ma'i mdab ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' myi'o seng ge ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang / me tog ku mu ta dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i pad ma'i rdzing bu sar bar 'jam pa'i par
160b9(mdo): ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal// sbyangs pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri myad gzi dang mar blugs mye'i 'od 'phro nor bu klog 'od 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// glang po rgyags pa 'gying pa'i glang po'i stobs can pa
161a1(mdo): yang khyu mchog ri dgas rgyal dang ngang pa'i stabs can stabs mdzes shi nad tu zhabs legs gang du bzhud// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'dun pa gang gi don tu nga'i sa sngon chad lag pa rkang
161a2(mdo): pa myig dang de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing // chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser gos dang / rin che gang ba'i shing rta glang po klung mgyogs shugs ldan rta po rtsal mchog ldan pa btang // bskal pa
161a3(mdo): bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag/ de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi bshis thob nas rga shi'i rgya mor chung ba'i sems cad pa yi
161a4(mdo): yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab// 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bo khyod bltam ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir bram ze ltas mazhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis khyod rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i spyan sngar
161a5(mdo): lha khyod kyi rgyal po la pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan// ces bdag gis thos so// smras pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ smras pa gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams brgya mtshan ldan// khyod kyi
161a6(mdo): bu btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can/ de ni gling bzhi'i dang nga phyug 'khor los sgyur// nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyurar/ gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas nas ni// btsun
161a7(mdo): mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byung gyu rang nas/ byang chub rga shi myed pa'i gnas thob ste// chos kyi chu'i sa skye dgu 'di tshim byed/ jo co lung bstand pa 'di ni mchis te/ 'di ma mchis pa ma lags mod kyi
161a8(mdo): 'od kyis kyang par bar 'tshal ba/ bdag gi tshig gsan par gsol/ smras pa ci zhig/ smras pa la cig kar kyi don tu 'di na/ kha cig chus shugs dang dka' thub rnam pa du ma rtsos ste/ ri rigs kyi paH
161a9(mdo): pa dang / ral ba'i thor tshugs dang / rtswa dang shing shun gyon dang / sen mo dang skra dang / ag tsom ring por 'jog pa dang / lus la gdung pa dang yongs su gdung pa rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/ bdag
161b1(mdo): cag ji ltar lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes brtul shugs dang dka' thub drag po rtsom mo/ jo bo phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes pa lags te/ rgyal srid 'byor da cing rgyas la
161b2(mdo): bde zhing lo legs te// nyams dga' zhing myi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba 'di dang // bskyed mos tshal dam pa mchog me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgya nad pa// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad
161b3(mdo): yid du 'ong ba 'byi nad pa 'di dag dang rdzing me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu dang / pad ma dkar pos mdzes par gyur pa/ ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / khu byug dang / dur ba dang / khrung khrung dang / dang s+ya sA/
161b4(mdo): smad 'byind pa shing a 'bra ta dang / mya ngan tshang dang / tsam pa ka dang ku ra ba ka dang / ke sa ra las stsogs pa shing me tog chags pa sA tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor ba/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi 'phro
161b5(mdo): gyis legs par brgya nad pa/ myig mangs ris su bkod/ pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs pus bkod pa/ rin po che'i dra bas bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyad pa
161b6(mdo): dgun dang dbyar dang ston dang / dpyid gnas par bde ba rnams dang / 'ang bzangs chen po chos dang / chos bzangs dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan bral las stsogs pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang
161b7(mdo): khang pa sa bu/ ston dka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs ti se lta bu'i stegs bu dang / sgo 'ang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil 'ang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyand pa
161b8(mdo): rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha 'i dra ba spa byung ba 'di dag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rol mo'i che spyad rgyud gcig pa dang / bi bang dang / khA radza dang gling bu dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheka dang / kim pa la dang
161b9(mdo): na ku la dang / sgra bsnyan dang / rdza rnga dang / pa Ta ha dang gru dang / kar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa/ dgod pa dang / 'jo ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / dga' ba
162a1(mdo): dang / tshul du shis pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pa 'di dang ni ldan la/ lnga khyod kyang dar ni ma sol te/ gzhon pa thor bu dar la bab pa/ lus 'jam pa lang tshol bab pa/ dbu skra gnag pa/ 'dod pa ma rol
162a2(mdo): pa lags kyis/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po myig stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig dges par rol da ya// slad kyis bkres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad
162a3(mdo): pa 'di dag yang smras so// / sum bcu rtsa gsum 'jig rtend lha dbang lngar// dges pa'i cho ga mkhyend pa dgyes par rol // srad kyis bkres par gyur da nas rdul shugs dang // dka' thub dag ni yang
162a4(mdo): dag brtsams par mdzod/ byang chub sems dpa'as smra rngas pa/ 'dun pa myi dgos te 'dod pa 'di dag ni/ myi rtag pa myi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can myur du
162a5(mdo): 'gyur du 'gro ba/ g.yo ba ri gzar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba zi lad pa'i thigs pa ltar ring du myi gnas pa lag pa bca ngas pa stong pas byis pa brid pa ltar snying po myed pa chu shing
162a6(mdo): ki snying po ltar mthu byed pa snod so ma btang ba ltar mthar 'ji ga pa ston ka'i sprin ltar skad cig byung nas myed par gyur da pa/ nam mkha'i klog ltar ring du myi gnas pa/ dug dang bcas pa'i
162a7(mdo): snod ltar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal can/ 'khri shing ma lu ta ltar myi bde ba byin pa/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya ba chu'i chu bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can smyig rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci log las byung ba
162a8(mdo): sgyu ma lhur sems phyi nad ci log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmyi lam ltar lta ba phyi nad ci log gis yongs su zi nad pa rgya mtsho dgang dka' ba ltar ngoms myi shes par byed pa/ mchu star skom par byed pa
162a9(mdo): sprul gi mgo ltar reg par bya dka' ba g.yang sa chen po ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa/ shes rab can rnams kyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang / nyes pa
162b1(mdo): dang bcas pa dang / skyon dang bcas par shes nas rnam par spangs pa rig pa rnams kyis smad pa/ 'phags pa rnams kyis bzhungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma bsngags pa myi mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su
162b2(mdo): bzung ba/ byis pa rnams kyis bsnyend pa yin no// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// / mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gi mgo mazhin spangs// ngan spyugs snod bzhin myi gtsang rnam par spangs//
162b3(mdo): 'dun pa dge ba thams cad 'jig byed pa// 'dod pa shes nas nga ni dka' myi skye// de'i tshe 'dun ba zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste/ ngu zhing de nas myi gnas mchi ma zag la sdug bsngal bzhin tshig 'di
162b4(mdo): skad ces smras so// lha cig gang gi don tu 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po rtsom ste ri dgas pags pa 'chang / skra dang sem mo'i ag tsom ring du 'jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyon
162b5(mdo): sa yan lag skams shing rdul shugs gnas// sred dang nis ma sum rag dang ma nus 'bras pa kha cig gi tshugs 'dug dang ba la/ ngardul shugs gnas// ji ltar bdag cas 'gro ba'i gtsotso
162b6(mdo): khyad 'phags 'khor los sgyur ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang / brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab 'bral lga dbang 'bru la bar 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rtend bsam gtan bde ba
162b7(mdo): ba 'dod// myi yi dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shi nang tu 'byor da cing rab tu rgyas pa shi nang tu lo legs la// de bzhin kun dga'i ra ba dag dang / bskyed mos tshal dang khang bzangs mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i/
162b8(mdo): 'ang ba mtshungs// bud myed 'di dag rnams kyang pi bar dang ni/ gling bu dag dang klu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sA lend cing mchis// dka' bar 'gyid dang kar dang klu dbyangs skya rang pa shin du bslabs pa
162b9(mdo): 'di dag spyod cing nges pa ma bzhud cig/ byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ 'dun pa nyon cig/ 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na bcings dang btsas dang brdegs dang bsdigs pa sdug
163a1(mdo): bsngal brgyad dag ngas ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams la nga'i sa yid byung byas ma gyur da/ sngon chad bag myed dbang du song zhing gti muka dkrugs la lta ba'i dra bas dkris shing mun gyur da chos
163a2(mdo): 'di myi shes pa las byung ste bdag tu 'du shes 'dzind dang tshor ba po las 'das// dngos po 'di dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la myi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shing glog dang 'dra ste zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gso/
163a3(mdo): gsog snying po myed la bdag yod ma yin stong par 'gyur ba ste// nga'i yid ni yul la chags pa myed kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan da byin ngas sngon bsams pa'i dkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil
163a4(mdo): gnon chos kun dbang phyug chos rgyal thub par 'gyur// 'dun pas smras pa/ pad ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i myig ldan zhing / do shal nol bu nir bu rin cen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgya nang //
163a5(mdo): la sprin tshogs dag las byung ba'i klog 'dra ba// mal na rnam par mdzes pa 'di la myi gzigs sam// pi sIr dang ni khar rnga dag dang sa stad ja rnga dag dang gling bu klu dbyangs len de
163a6(mdo): pa dang // bya bar rma bya ka la sgra 'byind pa// myi 'am tsi mo khyim 'dra 'di yang dor lags sam// su ma na dang ud pa la dang bar ka sha// tsam pa ka dang dri mchog 'phreng ba me
163a7(mdo): tog brgyus// dus kyi a ka ru mchog bdug pas rab gdugs dang // byug pa dam pa de dag la yadA myi gzigs sam/ shin tu dri gda' dri ldan ro pro gya nom dang // skyu rums dag dang bshos
163a8(mdo): gtsang sha nid tu legs sbyard dang / skyems kyi ro dang kha ra bcas par rab sbyard pa/ 'di la 'ang mya gzigs par ni lha khyod gan du bzhud// grang ba'i dus na byug pa dro ba dam pa dang / tsha ba'i
163a9(mdo): cha ba'i dus na tsan dan sbrul gi snying po dang // ka shi ba yin bza' bzang po mang po dang / de dag la yang myi gzigs lnga khyod gang du bzhud lga yul dag na lga rnams dag ni co 'dra bar// / 'dod
163b1(mdo): pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag rab sbyor ba// dga' zhing bde dang ldan la dges par rol mdzod de// de nas shag kya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhud par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa// 'dun
163b2(mdo): pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu myed par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang myi dang lha'i 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par gyur da pa myed// rgyal po'i sras mchog gyur da te dbang phyug byas/
163b3(mdo): shing gang che grang bzhi ngag tu 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por gyur nas rin cher sna bdun ldan zhing bud myed nang na 'dug pa dang // sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang dang 'thab 'bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas nini
163b4(mdo): 'phos 'dir 'ongs sprul pa'i lha'i nan yid 'ong dpas ldan dam pa ra'is sdon cad spyad// skra'i gnas su dbang sbyar bdud kyi rab dang po byas shing 'dod pa 'byor pa mchog la spyad kyang ngoms ma
163b5(mdo): 'gyur na da ci dman pa 'di la bstend pas dngoms gyur ram de ni gnas myin no// gzhan yang 'dun pa nga na sdig bas la mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs gdugs
163b6(mdo): pas dkrugs shing nyam ngas rtag tu khyer te mgon myed skyabs myed cing gti mug ma rig mun pa dag na rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i 'jig sa pa dag gis nyes la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dgra yis kun tu
163b7(mdo): gnod cing rnam par gnod pa'i 'khor ba 'di bltas nas ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtong dang tshul khrims rtul shugs bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gi shing tshogs bsdogs te sbyard
163b8(mdo): nas lhag pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus brtan por gzungs btab sbyar// gru rer nga nyid zhugs nas bdag nyid rgyal te/ bdag gis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'das bar
163b9(mdo): che ba khro ba'i dpa' rlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzind 'khri klong 'khyil dgra yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal par dka' las bsgral lo snyam ste nga sems de 'dra'o// / de phyir srid mtsho dgrar bcas lta ba'i 'dzin
164a1(mdo): khri dang / nyon mongs srin po yod pa 'di las bdag rgas te/ bdag nyid rgal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa// rga myed shi myed zhi ba'i thang la dgod par bya// de'i tshe 'dun pa de bas
164a2(mdo): kyang rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// lha de ltar nges par mdzad dam/ byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ 'dun pa pa'i sa nges par byas pa nyon// sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir brtson// myi g.yo
164a3(mdo): las kyang myi g.yo gnod pa myed// ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan gyi gso// 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bo'i nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ rdo rje'i gnam ljags dgra sa
164a4(mdo): mthung thung mda' char dang // lugs bskor klog gi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang // ri rtse kun tu 'bar ba mgo steng rab 'bakyang / nga ni khyim la 'dong ba'i phyir yang gyi skyed do// de'i tshe lA'i
164a5(mdo): bu nam mkha' la 'khod pa dag gis caco dang ga zha'i sgra brgya/ stong phyung ste/ me tog gi char yang phab nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yul rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing //
164a6(mdo): sems can dag pa snying rje snying brtser ldan// blo gros mchog ldan rgyal gyur nga rgyal gyur da cig// mgon po 'gro la myi 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa/ mkha'i rdul gnag tu ba mjug rings dag/
164a7(mdo): myi chags bzhin du skyes mchog thugs myi chags// dri myed yul gyi bde bas myi gos te// chu las pad ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin// dge slong dag de nas skra'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / skra'i bu rtse ba
164a8(mdo): bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang bud myed dang khye'u dang bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so// sgra thams cad kyang myi grag par
164a9(mdo): byas so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad gnyid kyis log par rig nas nam gyi gung la bab par rig/ skar ma'i bdag po rgyal dang ldan par rig/ de kho na
164b1(mdo): mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas/ 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa dang skyo bar ma byed par rta ba sngags ldan legs par brgya nad te ma thogs par nga la byin// byang chub sems/
164b2(mdo): dpa'as tshig de skad sbas ma thag tu/ de ras skad cig de nyid la rgyas po chen po bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang ra
164b3(mdo): gi bkod pas rings pa rings par yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so// de nas dri za'i bdag po rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ni/ dri za bye ba khrag zhig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig du sil
164b4(mdo): snyan dang / klu dbyangs sna tshogs lend cing / shar phyogs na sa 'ongs par gyur da te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i shar da phyogs nyid du gar+tha
164b5(mdo): nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal swa tshogs lag na 'phyang ba nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa
164b6(mdo): spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rum dag dang / lhan cig rngu lho phyogs nas 'ongs pa ra gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po
164b7(mdo): la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid gnas nas/ byang chus sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po myig myi bzang ni/ kru mu tig gi do shas sna tshogs lag na 'phyang
164b8(mdo): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos kyi phye ma dang / me tog gi char kyi sprin kun nas slong pa'i rlung ngal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / lhan cig du
164b9(mdo): nub phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur da te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
165a1(mdo): zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po lus ngan ni gnod sbyin nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer thogs pa lag na mar mye thogs pa sgron ma 'bar ba lag na thogs pa mda' zhu dang ral gri dang mdung
165a2(mdo): thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / 'phang mdung las stsogs pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ go cha dang ya sad sra ba bgos pa byed pa
165a3(mdo): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig du byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur da te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas
165a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// dalha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang /
165a5(mdo): gtugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog rna rgya na dang / rgyan thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ongs par gyur da/ te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor
165a6(mdo): ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// dge slo nga dag de ltar 'dun pas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas myig
165a7(mdo): mchi mas gang zhing byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// ji bo khyod ni dus mkhyend pa/ tshod mkhyend pa/ rand pa mkhyend pa lags na/ da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang tshod ma lags na/ ci'i
165a8(mdo): slad du bka' de skad stsalang/ byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ 'dun par ni dus la bab bo// smras pa/ jo bo gang gi dus la bab/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa
165a9(mdo): sems can rnams kyi don ni tshol ba na// byang chub rga shi myed pa'i gnas thob nas// 'gro ba 'grol zhes pa yis yun ring nas// smon lam btab pa de ni dus la bab// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid
165b1(mdo): de/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sa pra ba dang bar sngang de bzhin skyong/ lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas/ 'thab 'bral sga dang dka' ldan 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams bsngon
165b2(mdo): bar gyur pa// klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang // ma dros pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho yang // myi mchog mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab pas// de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir brtson par gyurd/ gang dag
165b3(mdo): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab ni spyad// de dag rnams kyang 'jig rtend gsum mchod pa// myi mchog de la mchod phyir mngon par brtson// sngon chad spyod che
165b4(mdo): grogs por gyur pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu lhags pa yang // rgyal ba mngon par 'byung la lta byed cing / rjes su mthun pas mchod pa byas snyam byed// gsang ba'i bdag po
165b5(mdo): bdag nyid chen po de// rdo rje 'bar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil/ na gnas// lus la go bgos stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan// gsang ba la ka na rdo rje 'bar ba thogs// lta bu nyi ma zla ba de kany+tsa
165b6(mdo): kyang // g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur pa// sor mo bcu 'i thal mo sbyar byas te// mngon par byung la rjes su yi rang rtogs par byed// skar ma rgyal de 'khor dang bcas
165b7(mdo): pa yang // / rang gi lus ni rgya chen sprul byas te// myi'i dam pa de'i mdun 'dug nas// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab 'byor te// skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bab// ngo mo khyod dge dkra shis
165b8(mdo): thams cad grub// bdag kyang khyod dang thabs gcig mchi bar bgyi// 'dod chags sel ba bar chad 'byung ma 'gyur// lta bu yang dag bskul pos bskul byas pa// stobs dang brtson 'grus
165b9(mdo): 'phags pa myur du bzhengs// sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad spros da// da ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab// lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang // yid 'ong me tog cham
166a1(mdo): pa 'bebs shing lhags// de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 'dug/ lha'i sa skord cing mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar// grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud myed khye'u dang bu mo gang yod pa// de dag
166a2(mdo): thams cad yid ngal gyur da nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams// rta dang glang po ba lang ne tso khrung khrung rma bya ri skyegs rnams// de dag kun kyang yid ngal gyur da nas nyal de de dag gzugs myi mthong // shag kya
166a3(mdo): bu gang rdo rje sra ba'i mtshon tsa rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang // glang chen rta dang shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log par gyur pa// bud myed tshogs
166a4(mdo): tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur da kyang yod ma tshor// de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong chag ka la bying ka'i sgra dbye ngas kyis// nam phyed 'das te nam gyi gung la bab nas 'dun
166a5(mdo): pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta po bsngags ldan bzang po leg/ sa brgyan legs par ngal byi nad// gal te nga la byams par/ sems na bkyegs ma byed par myur du byir// 'dun pas tshig/
166a6(mdo): thos mchi mas myig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras// sems can kha lo sbyar mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas khyod la ci zhig bya// dus mkhyend cing ni tshod mkhyenang chos spyod kang du'ang gshegs
166a7(mdo): ba'i dus ma lags// khyod kyi spo bkum gtan pa dam su lang su yang chab sgo 'byed myi 'gyur// brgya byin gyi ni yid kyis sems dpa'i dbang gis sgo yang bye bar gyur pa// 'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga'
166a8(mdo): zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor// kyi hud bdag grogs su sod ji ltar bya zhing phyogs ni kar brgyug snyam// gzi brjid ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' shig thos// yan
166a9(mdo): lag bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'di yang 'di na ci zhig byed// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis 'di ma tshor// bud myed tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags ldan
166b1(mdo): gnyid sog byas// kyi hu ba 'di'i sa sngon chung bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig/ lnga stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis 'dun pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par
166b2(mdo): phul cig 'dren pa skyo ma byed// lga dang lha myin dag gis rnga rdung rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas// 'on kyang lhas bsnyal pa'i grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yong ma gyur// 'dun pa bar sdang dri ma myed la lha'i 'od rab
166b3(mdo): mdzes la ltos// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang lpags ltos// bde srogs khyim thab brgya byir dpung bskor sgon mdzes par 'jug pa dang // lha dang lA myin myi 'am ci tshigs kang
166b4(mdo): rag mchod phyir lpags la ltos// 'dun pa des kyang lha tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta po de la spras// sems can kha lo sbyar mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad spags shing shog/ de'i sa dbyar gyi kha dog
166b5(mdo): de can de myig pa gser gyis brgya dang byas nas/ yid myang/ ka' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i bcibs par dbul ba bya/ sa// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi chi bas 'di
166b6(mdo): rigs bzang dge ba lags// khyod kyis sngon cad kang dgongs smon lam de grub gyur cig gshegs su gsol// gang dag pa gyegs bgyid zhi bar gyurd cig dgongs pa'i rdul shugs grub
166b7(mdo): gyur cig/ 'gro ba grangs bde dang mtho ris pa dang ni 'phyir myur nga cig/ de ri ga sems ras sangs ches 'di thams cad nam drug g.yos// ta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de
166b8(mdo): 'od// spyod ba'i lag pa nam dag pad ma dri myed 'dra bas rta mchog bdeg/ brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de'i mdun ra lam ni 'di zhes stonang // de'i sa gsal ba dri ma myed pa'i 'od bdang sa rnams snang ba
166b9(mdo): gsal// de tshe ngan song kun ni sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa myed/ me tog char bab sil snyan bye ba smra byung sga dang lha myin stong // thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor/
167a1(mdo): ba byas te dong // skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur so lus su ting rjer ngu ba'i yid ldan de yis pad ma 'dra ba bzhin la smras/ khyod bral sgren mor myi mdzes sa 'di grong khyer/
167a2(mdo): thams cad mun pas kun tu dkrugs par gyur // ro mong khyod kyis khab 'di spangs na bdag la dka' bde bgyid pa 'di na 'ga' ma mchis// slan chad bya tshogs rnams kyi sgra dag dang // grags pa mtha' yas khyod ni sar
167a3(mdo): bgyi ba'i// btsun mo'i 'khor kyi gling bu snyan pa dang // bkra shis spra dang glu smra thos myi 'gyur// nyon mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur da na// gdugs mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa'i// lga dang
167a4(mdo): grub tshogs slan chad mthong myi 'gyur// sku'i dri yang slam chad sdom myi 'gyur// 'phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur/ pa ltar// khyod kyis do mong pho brang de bzhin spangs//
167a5(mdo): khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis// gar la lta ba bzhin du bdag la dga'// grong khyer kun kyi byin// dang stobs phrogs te// 'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes
167a6(mdo): ma lags// gang gis sa 'dir 'khor lo stobs can du// lus bstand drang srong tshig ni deng brdzun gyur// bsod nam sa sdong po chen po khyod byung na// sa 'drir shaka kya'i stobs
167a7(mdo): ni stobs ma mchis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir gdung yang chad// shag kya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa rab tu nyams// dri myed dri bral khyod ni gar bzhud par// bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mche bar
167a8(mdo): bgyi// 'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed nas ni// khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs su gsol// blo gros ldan pa khyim la bltas nas ni// snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras te/
167a9(mdo): skye 'chi mthard 'byinang ma thob bar du ni// pa'i sa ser skya'i grong khyer 'jug myi bya// rga shi myed pa'i gnas mchog 'tsho myed pa// byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par// nga ni ser skya'i gnas su/
167b1(mdo): mngon phyogs te// 'greng 'dug nyal dang 'chag pa myi bya'o// gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo pa// byang chub sems dpa' de byung zhing // de ni mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe// lnga'i bu mo rnams kyis bstod// 'di spyod kyi chen padi/
167b2(mdo): yi bsod nams zhing chen yin// 'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing // 'chi myed 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa// sems can rnams la thugs rje bas// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa'i
167b3(mdo): yis// 'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// 'di'i tshul khrims yongs su dag/ brtul zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams// 'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams// don tu myi gnyer tshul khrims
167b4(mdo): srung // sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir// 'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsung // yan lag nyin lag gcad gyurd cing / 'khro ba myi mnga' sdang myi mnga'// 'di ni rtag tu brtson 'grus
167b5(mdo): ldan// bskald pa bye bar skyo myi mnga'// 'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad// 'di rtag bsams gtan bsam gtan pa// thugs ni ni
167b6(mdo): zhing rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni// sems can bye ba dgrol bar 'gyur// 'di ni shes rab chags myi mnga'// rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las// sgrol zhing thug
167b7(mdo): ni nam grol te// rang byung ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan// thugs rje'i ni pha rol byon nga // dga' dang btang snyoms bsam gtan pa// tshangs pa'i lam ni cho ga mkhyend
167b8(mdo): 'di ni shi nang tu lha'i lha// lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os// thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral// yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byo nga // 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs// myig myed rnams kyi spyan
167b9(mdo): ma ste// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags// ring nas na ba'i sman pa la bgyis// rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal// dbang po lta bu'i spyan stong mnga'// tshangs pa lta bur rang byung 'gyur// lus dang /
168a1(mdo): sems ni rab sbyangs pa// brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang // dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral// nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bo ste// ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba lags// seng ge/
168a2(mdo): lta bur bsnyems pa spangs// glang po lta bur rab tus thugs// khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi gtso// bzod de 'khrugs pa rab tu spangs// zla ba lta bur rab tu gsal// nyi ma sta bur snang ba mdzad// sgron ma lta/
168a3(mdo): bur gsal mdzad pa// skar ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa// skar ma lta bur mun pa bral// pad ma lta bur chags myi mnga'// me tog lta bur khrims dri gda'// ston pa lhun po ltar myi g.yo// dogs snga
168a4(mdo): bur gsos su gyur pa// rin cen 'byung gnas ltar myi 'khrug/ sa// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lnga'i bdud kyang bcom// 'di ni deng
168a5(mdo): dpon chen po ste// lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la// yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog/ ring por myi thogs ston par 'gyur// rga shi nyon mongs 'jom pa po// mun pa rab rig
168a6(mdo): rnam par grol// sa dang lha yul grags pa'i// rang byung rgyal par byon pa lags// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba// dpag du myed la stod pas bstod// khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams re
168a7(mdo): snang ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nas// shag kya'i yul dang / kye'u ta'i yul dang / byad 'dul las 'das te/ mye ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes
168a8(mdo): su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas// dpag tshad drug du byang chub sems dpa' phyi nad pa dang // ram dngas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te sa la 'dug nas/
168a9(mdo): lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / snga ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs chen po slar bkye'o// slar bkye nas de 'di snyam du sems te// rgyan 'di
168b1(mdo): rag dang / rta bsngags ldan kyang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de slar btang ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dun dpa la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// 'dun pa khyod song la brgya nang 'di dag dang / rta bsngag
168b2(mdo): ldan khyer te slar log shig/ sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa slar log pa der mchod rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang mchod rten de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rtend zhes grags pa yin no// yang byang chub sos
168b3(mdo): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar na gtsug bud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas// des ral kyis gtsug pud bcad de bar snang la bor ba dang / de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
168b4(mdo): kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te/ deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug pud kyi dus ston byed do// der mchod rtend yang byas te/ deng sang du yang mchod rtend de gtsug pud blangs pa'i mchod rte nang
168b5(mdo): zhes mying du chags so// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te rab tu byung yang kos ka shi pa gyon par ji ltar/ rung kyis kal te nags ram gyi gnas nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i
168b6(mdo): gos shig rnyed na ni legs so// snyam du bsams pa dang / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' la gos ngur skyog dgos par gyur/
168b7(mdo): to snyam mo// de na spu'i bu gcig cig sA'i gzugs myi mngon par byas te/ rngon pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smyig bgos nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun tu phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpas
168b8(mdo): de la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te grogs po khyod kyis gos chur smrig rnams kho ba sa byin na/ kho bo'i gos kazhi pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyid no// des smras pa gos 'di dag kyang khyod la ma
168b9(mdo): 5/ 'od rnams kyang kho bo la mdzes so// byang chub sems dpa'as sbas pa/ kho bos khyod la bsrung ngo // de nas lnga'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa'
169a1(mdo): la byind te/ gos ka shi ba rnams kyang blangs so// de nas lha'i bu des gus pa bskyed te/ lag pa gnyis kas gos de dag blangs nas/ spyi bo la bzhag ste de dag la mchod pa dang / bkur sti d+ya
169a2(mdo): pa'i phyir de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rtend du song ngo // de yang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas// der mchod rtend brtsigs te deng sang du yang mchod rtend de ngur smrig blangs pa zhes mying du chags so// gang gi tshe byang
169a3(mdo): chub sems dpas gtsug pud bcad nas/ gos ngur smrig rnams bkogos pa'i de'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong dag dka' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yid rangs te mchog tu rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes
169a4(mdo): te/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub pa rab tu byung ngo // kye grogs po rag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
169a5(mdo): par sangs rgyas nas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyurd te// sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs myed pa dag skye ba las/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba nas/ rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
169a6(mdo): na ba dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las sems can rnams yongs su spro la te// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas// bde
169a7(mdo): ba'i 'jigs pa myed pa mya ngan myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ zhi ba rdul dang bral ba'i 'chi ba myed pa'i chos kyi dbyings la dgod par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra skad phyung
169a8(mdo): bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyad nas 'og myin kyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyi gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyid dang dkun dang dbyar
169a9(mdo): gnas pa'i khang bzangs rnams dang / khri rnams dang / khyim rnams su tshol zhing / gang kyi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe gcig tu 'dus nas/ bya ku ra ra mo bzhin du hud mo 'dod par gyur to// de na bud myed 'a
169b1(mdo): cig ni shin tu mya ngan kyis nyams thag nas/ kha cig ni kyi hud bu zhes 'je rad cing du'o// kha cig ni kyi chud mying po zhes 'dzerd cing du'o// kha cig ni kyi hud khyim zab zhes 'je rang to// kha cig ni jo bo zhes 'dzem
169b2(mdo): to// kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o// kha cig ni lus rdob cing du'o// kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo// kha cig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing du'o// kha cig ni myig bsgyurd cing ngu'o// kha cig/
169b3(mdo): ni lag pa bla la rdob cing du'o// kha cig ni brang rdung zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa dpung pa rdob cing du'o// kha cig ni mgo ru nga zhing du'o// kha cig ni mgo la sa 'thor zhing du'o// kha cig ni sma 'tshig cing /
169b4(mdo): du'o// kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa bstod de 'greng nas cho nges 'thon to// kha cig ni ri dgas mo rug mangs phog pa bzhin du glo bur du rgyug cing dra'o// kha cig ni gdong kos kyis g.yogs nas
169b5(mdo): du'o// kha cig ni chu shing rlung mar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du su sa 'khor zhing du'o// kha cig ni sa la 'gyes te ma shi tsam du 'gyur ro// kha cig ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre
169b6(mdo): ldog cing du'o// kha cig ni shing rtsa nas 'byung ba bzhin du blo bu ra du sa la 'gyel nas chu'o// sgra de yang rgyal pos thos nas shag kya rnams la smras pa// ci'i phyir btsun mo 'khor na sgra
169b7(mdo): chen po grag/ shaka kya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na myi gda' zhes kada'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ myur du grong khyer ki sgo rnams chong la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig
169b8(mdo): de dag gis phyi rang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ko'u ta myi smre sngags 'don te sa la 'gre ldog cing // rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang
