192b3(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par brgyan pa sprul da to// mda' rgyang kang tsam zhig rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta lo'i stegs bu de bas mtho' ba mngon par srul da te/ shang ta la thams cad rin po che brgyus pas
192b4(mdo): phan tshun 'brel par 'dug go// shing ta la gonyis gnyis kyi bar du/ rdzing spos chus yongs su ka pa ba/ ka ser gyi phye ma bdal pa/ mye tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar
192b5(mdo): po las a tshogs pas gang ba rin po che'i stegs bus bskor pa/ nor bu rin po che bye du r+yas them sgras brgya nad pa/ chu sregs dang / bya gaka dang / ngang pa dang / dur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya swa
192b6(mdo): 'byind pa'i rdzing dag byas so// lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad wi ni spos chus chag chag 'debs so// lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni mye tog si le ma lha'i dri gsung dang ldan pa 'thor ro// shing ta la
192b7(mdo): thams cad kyi mdun logs su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag go// rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la/ lha'i bu mo tsan dan dang / a ka nu'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bdug
192b8(mdo): pa'i pog por thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur da to// rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo/ lha'i glu dbyangs le nad pa lnga khri 'khod par gyurd to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
192b9(mdo): sems dpa' zhing rnams ni rab tu bskyod/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byind/ sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs/ mye tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs gos brgya stong kyi g.yab mo na 'dor/ rnga bo che
193a1(mdo): brgya stong ni rdung / rta dang glang po che dang / klang khya ba rnams ni sgra 'byin/ bya ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang / zhu byug dang / ka la bying ka dang / shang shang de'u dang / dang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khru khrung dang /
193a2(mdo): rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/ bkra shis pa brgya stong ni 'bul zhing / lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo // gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
193a3(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa de nyid kyi nub mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des/ tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// grog
193a4(mdo): po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po banabs pa/ dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go cha sra ba banabs pa thugs yongs su myi skyo ba/ byang chub
193a5(mdo): sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad tsar phyi nad pa/ pha rol tu phyi nad pa thams cad kyi pha rold tu byond pa/ byang chub sems dang/ las thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dang
193a6(mdo): bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba sha ni tu mkhyend pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas pab thams cad la shi nad tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las
193a7(mdo): kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i za ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar
193a8(mdo): pa'i lam ston pa ded dpon chen por gyur da pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur da pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa/ sman
193a9(mdo): pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa chos kyi rgyalo chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten kyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ pad ma chen po lta bu chos thams
193b1(mdo): cad kyi gzugs ma bsnyel ba// rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ myi g.yo ba myi bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shi nad tu dri ma myed pa/ shi nad tu yongs su dag pa
193b2(mdo): shind tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu gdul ba
193b3(mdo): dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par
193b4(mdo): mdzad pa da/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrag pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi myig
193b5(mdo): rnam par sbyang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dpa' thun pas tshar bcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzog/ sa pa kun tu bstand pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi
193b6(mdo): mnga' dbang brnyed par mdzad pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis/ de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis
193b7(mdo): shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// / gang gi bsod nams dag dang gzi'i brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // bta
193b8(mdo): snyoms dpa di bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshungs pa'i lam snang ba// bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyod de'i byang chub shing drung chas par gyur// thub pa de la bsam brtul shugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod/
193b9(mdo): pa legs par bya// de la skyabs su song na ngan 'gro'i 'jigs dang myi 'phrad myi khom myi 'gyur te// lha'i nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur// lo drug bar du dka' ba
194a1(mdo): spyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud// kun kyang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis// de ni stong gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal
194a2(mdo): po ste// brgya byin tshangs pa'i nyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang myed// gang btsas tshe na zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur da pa// de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad
194a3(mdo): phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud/ gang gi phyi tshugs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang lta bar nus pa ma yin zhing // gang gi sku la mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum bcu ma gnyis legs brgyan la// gang gi gsung
194a4(mdo): 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnam tha rad tshangs dbyangs smra snyan cing gang gi thugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dod / gang dag blo gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan
194a5(mdo): bde bas 'da' bya dang / nyon mongs 'ching ba'i khri shing kun da nga 'dra ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang // gzhan las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi ba 'chi byed thob 'dod dang // gald te
194a6(mdo): sa gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod phyiragyis// gang gis rgya mtshor bcas po'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang
194a7(mdo): mang ldan pa dang zung tu 'brel da dang bzhon pa dang // me tog 'phreng ba shi nad tu mdzes pas brgyan nas skyed mos tshal gyis rab brgyan dang // rga lag mgo dang myig rnams yongs su btang ba de ni byang chub snying por
194a8(mdo): phyogs dge slong dag de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po skad cig de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyi nad te lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gyo mo dang rdo byed pa/ nor bu
194a9(mdo): dang / mu tig dang bye tu r+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul mang pa/ tra sngo zhing 'jam la ga yas su 'khyiled cing g.yung drung 'khyild pa/ ka tsa lin de'i gos ltar reg na bde ba
194b1(mdo): de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyi nad to// de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chun rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang myed do// 'jig rten
194b2(mdo): kyi khams de ltar brgya nad pa 'di phyogs bcu'i rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par
194b3(mdo): brgya nang to// byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i dang myi'i las shind tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed
194b4(mdo): pa brgya nad par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tham sa cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bur snang bar gyu ra to// 'jig rten gyi bar
194b5(mdo): dag dang / ri nag po dang / khor yug chen po dag kyang myi snang / bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na bya/ nga chub sems dpa' 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo // byang
194b6(mdo): chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba'i/ lha'i bu bcu drug yod de 'di lta ste lha'i bu ud ka li zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu mud gA l-i zhes bya ba dang / skye bgu'i bdag po dang dpa' stobs
194b7(mdo): dpung rgyan stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzind dang / sdang byed dang / dri ma myed ya dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kye tog dang / 'gro grub dang / myig thogs pa myed dang / bkod pa chen po dang / tshul
194b8(mdo): khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang / pad ma'i 'od de lha'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni/ byang chub kyi snying po yongs su sbyong ba dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir myi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go// de dag gis
194b9(mdo): kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying por brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgyad bcu 'khor yug tu rin po sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis ni bskor da/ shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun
195a1(mdo): dang/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba ri ba bdun dang / rin po che rgyus pa rim bdun gyis ni bskor/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi glegs pam rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa dag dang
195a2(mdo): gser gyi cong cong dag dang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad ma dag gis ni khebs par byamo// snying po mchog gi spos kyis ni 'dugs pa/ rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag
195a3(mdo): na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa bzang ba mngon tu mchod pa/ lha yul pa dang / myi yul ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur da to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skye
195a4(mdo): pa dang / za ba las skyes pa'i mye tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na/ byang chub
195a5(mdo): sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs tshad myed pa bkod pa dag gis/ byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par bye/ da pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to//
195a6(mdo): de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur da te/ de dag lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dag gis
195a7(mdo): mthong nas pa rab rang gi gnas dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed par gyur to// bkod pa 'di dag mthong nas gnad tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin to// e ma'o bsod nams kyi rnam par smyid pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ bas
195a8(mdo): gyis myi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do// byang chub kyi shing ki lha mo bzhi yod de/ 'di lta ste 'od ma dang / snyan ldan dang / yid bzangs dang / mdangs ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi zhing
195a9(mdo): gi lha mo bzhi po dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi shing ra ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/ yal ga dang lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs
195b1(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa khrun dang / snyoms phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa/ bstan sdug pa/ shin tu 'grel pa/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mtho' ba de dang 'tsham par 'grel ba/ bkra ba blta na sdug pa
195b2(mdo): yid du 'ong ba/ rin po/ sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor da pa/ rin po che shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i g.yer wa'i dra ba rim bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa'i 'phreng ba rim
195b3(mdo): bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyi rim bskor pa/ shing yongasu 'du sa brtos dang 'dra ba/ myig gis blta bas myi ngoms pa bskyed do// gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
195b4(mdo): byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni/ stong gsum gyi stong na po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/ sra ba sgri / yod pa/ myi byed pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o//
195b5(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'a gro ba na/ lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od de sa ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to// myi 'om pa thams
195b6(mdo): cad bcad par gyurd to// ngan 'gro 'tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyurd to// sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag gi dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur to//
195b7(mdo): radang kyis btang ba rnams mi dan mos par gyur do// 'jigs pas nyes pa rnams ni dashugs 'byind pa thob par bya dad // bcings pas bcings pa rnams ni gcings pa las grol bar gyur to// sems can
195b8(mdo): dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to// nyon mongs pas gdungs pa rnams ni yongs su gdung ba myed par gyur to// 'gres pa rnams ni sngo 'drungs par gyur to// skom pa rnams ni
195b9(mdo): sdom pa myed par gyur to// snum pa rnams ni bde bar bcas par gyur to// / zhum pa nyams chung ba rnams ni stobs sun sum tshogs par gyur to// de'i me sems can gang la yang 'dod chags dang /
196a1(mdo): zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / 'khro ba dang / chags pa dang / tha ba dang / gnod sems dang / phra dog gi gnod pa myed par gyurd to// de'i tshe sems can gang ya 'chi ba myed pa/ 'pho/
196a2(mdo): ba myed pa/ skye ba myed do// de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / gcig la gcig pha mar 'du shes bskyed par gyurd to// de la 'di skad ces byas ste/
196a3(mdo): mnar myed pa la zug gi 'am// dmyal ba myi bzang sdang ba'i// sems cad rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi / bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur // dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams// phan tshum
196a4(mdo): gnod byed ji snyed pa// thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na// de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes// yi dgas 'jig rten yi dag sa rnams// bkres skom nye ba ci snyed pa// byang chub sems
196a5(mdo): dpa'i gzi'i brjod kyis// de dag zas skom rnyed par gyur// myi 'o ma thams cad chad gyurd cing // ngan 'gro rnams kyang ba// skams par gyur// sems can thams cad bder gyur te/
196a6(mdo): lha'i bde bas rab tu tshim// myig dang rna ba myed pa dang / gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams// de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing // yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur /
196a7(mdo): 'dod chags zhe sdang las mtshogs pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang // gnod kyurd de tshe nyon mongs kun// zhi bar gyurd te bde dang ldan// smyos pa dag ni rab dran zhing // dbul po dag kya
196a8(mdo): nor dang ldan// nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing // bcings pas bcings pa grol bar gyur da// ser sna myed cing dgra myed de// gnod sems dang ni chod pa dag/ phan tshun byed pa myed gyur da te// de tshe
196a9(mdo): byams pa'i sems u gnas// pha dang ma dag bu cig la// ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar// de bzhin sems can phan tshun du// de'i tshe bu phangs bzhin du sems// byang chub sems dpa'i
196b1(mdo): 'od 'dra yis// phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang // kang ka'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyis// zhing rnams bsam gyis myi khyab gsal// ri bo nag po rnams dang ni// khor yug dag kyang myi snang gyur//
196b2(mdo): rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun// gcig bro ji bzhin de ltar sngang // lag mthil lta bur gyurd pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyad pas// thams cad
196b3(mdo): rin chen nyid du spang // byang chub snying po'i rim gro ba// lha ni de ltar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad brgyad bcu'i sa khyod nang // byang chub snying por brgyand par gyur// zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// bkod
196b4(mdo): pa chen po gang yod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi'i brje dkyis// de dag thams cad der yang sdang // lha dang klu dang ga/ nod sbyin dang // mya'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang rang gzhal
196b5(mdo): myed 'ang rnams la// dur khrod tsam du zhes par gyurd// 'di ni bkod pa de mthong nas// lha dang myi rnams ngo mtshar gyur// da// bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir// phun sum 'di 'dra/
196b6(mdo): 'di legs mdzerd// sus dpangag dang yid rnams kyis// brtson pa bya ba myed par yang // de'i yid la 'dod pa dang // bas ma pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag dang /
196b7(mdo): sngon spyod tshe na rdzogs gyur pa// las de'i rnam par sbyin pa'i sa// 'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'di 'byung // byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhis// lha'i shing ni yongs 'du ba// de bas khyad par 'phags
196b8(mdo): pa yis// byang chub snying po brgya nad pa byas// byang chub snying po bkod pa gang // lha'i sa mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod par yod myi nus// dge
196b9(mdo): slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba/ rnam par dag pa dri ma myed pa/ lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dka' ba skyed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad selang pa/ sems can la dga' ba dang
197a1(mdo): bde ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba thams cad bskyed pa des/ klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas sdang bar byas par mthong nas/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs
197a2(mdo): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// // gang phyir bdag gi gnas 'daker gyi 'od kyis brgyan par lhang nger gyur pa las// ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba'i mthong ba dang /
197a3(mdo): ji ltar 'od srung chos kyi rgyal po skyon myed pa'i dri myed 'od mthong ltar// mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig byung du the tsom myed// sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi khyim ni zhin
197a4(mdo): tu mun pas kab// khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gi rgya chen 'od kyang yod myi snga pa// mye dang nor bu dag dang dri myed klog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od myi snang // brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lU myi rnaMs
197a5(mdo): kyi 'od kyang myi snang na// de ring khyim 'di'i nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba'i dge bas mdzes gyur da la// sems kyang dka' ba skye/ da cing lus kyang bde bar gyur da la lus ni bsil gyur da te//
197a6(mdo): lus kyi steng du mtshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar gyur da pa las// bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing dru nga bzhud pa shind tu gsal// klu'i me tog mdzes dang bzang la
197a7(mdo): dri zhim gos dang mu tig do gas dang // rgyad dang gdu bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang gdug pa mchog rnams myu rang thogs la/ klu dbyangs dag dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis shing rnga dang rdza rnga bzang // brdung zhing /
197a8(mdo): 'gro ba kun gyis mchod 'os phan pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du nges// de ni langs te klu'i bu mo rnams dang lhan cig phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang // de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi'i brjid rnams kyis legs pa/
197a9(mdo): brgya nad pa zhig/ lha dang lha myin bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor// dka' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes stond cing 'dod ba mthong // klu'i rgyal de rab tu
197b1(mdo): dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu mo rnams kyang dka' zhing mgu' ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod
197b2(mdo): pa byed// mye tog rnams dang spos dang thug pa dag kyang mthong zhing sil snyan rnams kyang byed// klu'i rgyal po rab tu dka' nas thal sbyor yang dag yon tan rnams kyis bstod// 'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa su
197b3(mdo): zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyurard pa lags// bdag gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste// de rang khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i ko 'phang brnyes par gyur
197b4(mdo): gang gi don tu sngon chad dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing 'dog pa kun btang la// gang gi don tu dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms// gang gi don tu brtson 'grus
197b5(mdo): brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang shes rab 'bar mdzad pa/ khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar gyur// ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa
197b6(mdo): byang chub shing la 'dud// ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang ba stong dag khyod la skor ba rab bgyid cing // ji ltar tsa sha'i tshogs rnam sa rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byind pa dang // ji ltar
197b7(mdo): ngang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang ma'a' las mtsha'i zhing tshul du shis ldan par/ dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la bskor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// ji ster gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i 'od
197b8(mdo): rnams zhing ni brkyang mchis te// ji ltam ngan spongamatha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye dgu sdug bsdus pa ra bgyid dang // ji ster nyis zla ba'i gnas kyis rgyun chad pa semam 'ang das bus srung ba las// srid
197b9(mdo): pa gsum du skye dang rga ba thar da mdzad pa'i ded dpon de ring 'gyur// ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dka' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang // tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dod dang lha rnams bas
198a1(mdo): gtan bde ba spangs pa dang // gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis pa thams cad 'dir lhags las// srid pa gsum du skye rga tha rad par mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal por de
198a2(mdo): ring byond// ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod gshegs la// bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs// ji ltar pad ma
198a3(mdo): bzang po dri me ma mchis rnam dag dog sa brtol byung ste// de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcom gyur // bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma kang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud//
198a4(mdo): de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod bskyod pa 'am g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma ka pa ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro
198a5(mdo): la phan phyir pyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes// rgyu skar zla bA bcas shing skar mo nyi mar bcas shing mkha' las gesar lhung gda'// ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas gso
198a6(mdo): zhing rgya mtsho skams par gyur da yang gda'// skyes bu mkha sa pa la las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gdal/ khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob
198a7(mdo): bzhengs myi gda' gang gi slad du kha lo bsgyur ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang // byang chub tu yang spobs bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed par gyur // bur bcas bdag dang
198a8(mdo): klu'i bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las thar gyur da cig/ glang po dregs pa'i stobs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi// dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po dag po'i chung ma dam pa gse
198a9(mdo): kyi 'od ces bya ba/ klu'i bu mo rin po che'i gdug sA chog so/ sapa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs thog pa da/ mu tika ki do sha la sna tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha' dang myi'i 'phreng ba bcus
198b1(mdo): pa thogs pa dang / pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / klu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan du dong zhing rin po che'i mye tog
198b2(mdo): sna tshogs mngon par gtor da te/ tshigs su bcud pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do// 'khrul pa myi mnga' myi snyengs myi mdzes bag myi tsha// myi zhum myi dman rab tu dgyes pa gdul dka' ba// ma chags myi snang ma
198b3(mdo): rmongs rkam pa myi mnga' bA// chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sman pa'i zug rngu bral ba gdul ba gdul mdzad pa// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thard mdzad sman pa mchog/ kan+da
198b4(mdo): dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyend nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod 'byung ngo // ji ltar lnga tshogs rab tu dad cing dka' ra gyur da te// mye tog char pa chen po mkha' las
198b5(mdo): 'bebs pa dang // 'di dag ji ltar kos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las// de ring rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu dgyes par mdzad// shing dbang drung du gshegs la bsnyengs pa myi mnga'ar bzhugs//
198b6(mdo): bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dra ba drold// sngon kyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar// byang chub zhi ba dam pa mchog ni 'tshang rgyar mdzod// khyod kyis gang gi
198b7(mdo): don tu bskal pa bye mang du// 'gro ba dgrol ba'i don tu dka' ba spyad pa mdzad// khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la dbab kyis// shing dbang drung du gshegs te byang chub mchog reg mdzod// dge slong
198b8(mdo): dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la bzhugs nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam
198b9(mdo): mo// de nas de sa 'di snyam du bsams te/ pra bting nas bzhugs so snyam mo// de nas gnas katsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tsho gas brgya stong par snang la 'khod pa dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i es
199a1(mdo): kyis yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// de de bzhin no// skyes bu chen po de de bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rA bting ba la bzhugs
199a2(mdo): nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sa lam gyi g.yas rol na/ hA 'tshong bkra shis zhes bya ba hA sngo ba/ 'jam pa
199a3(mdo): shi nad tu gzhon pa nyams dga' ba/ sdang lor 'khyil pa lta bur 'dug pa/ g.yas su 'khyimed pa lta bur 'dug pa/ ma bya'i 'grin pa lta bur 'dug pa/ ka na di'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa
199a4(mdo): kha dog dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag rnga zhing 'dug pa dag mtho nga ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'as lam bor te/ 'tshong bkra shis pa ga la ba der song nas phyind pa dang / zhwa 'tshong wa/
199a5(mdo): shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni kun zhe sa par byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / rnam par gsal bar byed pa dang / myi chod pa dang / chags par byed pa
199a6(mdo): dang / snyan cing 'tshems pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / snu ma kha dang / dran par byed pa dang / skul ba dang / tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / myi chub pa dang / shag po ma
199a7(mdo): yin pa dang / myi brlang ba dang / myi brkam pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / rna ba bde ba dang / lus dang sems shi nad tu dka' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'thab pa dang
199a8(mdo): rnyog pa se lad pa dang / ka la bying ka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya kun la dang / shang shang de'u las batshogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa
199a9(mdo): myed pa dang / bden pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang dag pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i mdangs lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang ldan pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang
199b1(mdo): lA ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang / zab pa dang / kating dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs myed par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i sla ba 'jom pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rta dang klang
199b2(mdo): po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i ngo ro lta bu dang / klu sgrogs pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can thams can tshim par byed par
199b3(mdo): tab tab po ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba myed pa dang / myi gol ba dang / 'tsham pa dang / rigs pa dang / dus su sba ba dang / dus las myi yol ba dang / chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang / mnyen pa dang / thogs pa
199b4(mdo): byed pa dang / rgyun chad pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / !dacig gis skad thams cad sgrogs pa dang / bsam ga thams cad sa par byed pa dang / bde ba thams cad bskyed pa dang / tha dad pa'i
199b5(mdo): lam yang dag par stond pa dang sam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las myi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang mthun pa ste/
199b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'as de lta bu'i tshig gis A 'tshong bkra shis la/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bkra shis A dag pa la myur du byin// de ring ba la AhA byin don chen 'gyur// dpung dang bcas
199b7(mdo): pa'i mdud ni bcom nas su byang chub dam pa zhi reg par 'gyur// gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du// sbyin dang dus dang sdom dang gtong byas dang // tshul khrims brtul shugs dka' thub rab pyad pa/
199b8(mdo): de ni de ring ba yis thob par gyur pa// bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin 'artson 'grus stobs// bsam gtan stobs dang de bzhin shes rab stobs// bsod nams dang ni mngon shes rnam tha rad stobs// de ni de
199b9(mdo): ring ba la 'grub par 'gyur// shes ra stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni gas myed byams pa'i stobs// so so yang dag rig pa bden pa'i stobs// de ni de ring ba la 'grub par 'gyur
200a1(mdo): de ring ba la yA sbyin byas nas ni// khyod la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te// de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur myi 'gyur// khyod kyang stond pa bla na myed par 'gyur// bkra shis pas ni 'dren
200a2(mdo): pa'i tshig snyan rab thos nas// dga' zhing maku la yi de rangs rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// rA 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs// mdun du 'dug nas rab tu dga' ba'i yid
200a3(mdo): kyis 'di skad smras// g.yad te rA yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi myed pa// mchog 'gyur zhi ba blta dka' sngon gyi rgyal po'i lam thob na// yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho grags pa dpag myed khyod pa zhes
200a4(mdo): shi ka/ bdag gis ko 'phang dam pa 'chi myed thog mar 'tshang rgya bgyi// / brtul shugs dka' thub rnam mang bya dka' bskal da mang ma s+yad par// bkra shis hA mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni
200a5(mdo): thob myi 'gyur// gang tshe blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nam sa thabs kyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul myed 'gyur zhes lung ston to// bkra shis ka lad te byang chub
200a6(mdo): skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na// srog chags bsdu ba byas te spyi na bar yid gnyis khyod ma za// gang tshe nga yis byang chub thob shes bdud ci rnam par dbyes// khyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa
200a7(mdo): nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pas sha nad tu 'jam pa'i tshwa ni spar kAng blangs// seng ge ngang pa'i stabs kyis chas nas sa ni rab tu g.yos// lha klu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar da te rab tu dgra/
200a8(mdo): yid kyis// deng 'dis bdud dpung bcos nas bdud mi reg par 'gyur snyam sems// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi zhing drung du 'gro ba na/ lha'i bu rnams dang / byang chub sem
200a9(mdo): dpa' rnams kyis/ byang chub sems deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/ byang chub kyi zhing brgyad khri brgya nad par gyur da to// de na byang chub kyi
200b1(mdo): shing kha cig ni mye tog gi rang bzhin la phang du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi zhing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad stong pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shi kha cig ni tsan dan gyi rang bzhi
200b2(mdo): can la 'bar du dpag tshad 'bum pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bum pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag
200b3(mdo): tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa la pa yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na yang
200b4(mdo): ji ltar 'tsham kha'i seng ge'i khri lA'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs ting ba bshams par gyur to// byang chub kyi zhing kha cig gi drung ni pad ma'i khri stan bshams par gyur to// kha cig gi rlung
200b5(mdo): du ni spos kyi khri stan no// kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no// byang chub sems dpa' ni ro// yad pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
200b6(mdo): zhugs ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
200b7(mdo): mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang pos legs par brgya nad pa'i lus kyis byang chub kyi zhing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad kyi 'dug par kun tu sdang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha'i bu so so'i
200b8(mdo): yid la yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri lnga snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug ki/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin par shes so// ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
200b9(mdo): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa la bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa thams cad dang / lha dang myi thams cad dang 'gro ba
201a1(mdo): thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo // de lta mod kyi 'on kyang dben pa la mos pa'i sems/
201a2(mdo): can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sa rA s+phar gang thogs ste/ byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyi nad pa dang / byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/
201a3(mdo): bdag nyid kyis ragA'i che mo ni nang du bstan ra ba ni phyir bstand nas/ hA'i bting ba kun nas bzang po ba ting ste seng ge/ lta bu dang / dpa' bo lta bu dang / stobs lta bu dang / brtan pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus
201a4(mdo): lta bu dang / mthu lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang dbang phyug lta bu dang / rang byung lta bu dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bla na myed pa lta bu dang / khyad par lta bu dang / mngon par 'phags
201a5(mdo): pa lta bu dang / grags pa sta bu dang / brjod pa lta bu dang / skye na ba lta bu dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang / bzod pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / bsam gtan lta bu dang / shes rab
201a6(mdo): lta bu dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bsod nams lta bu dang / bdu da phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang / tshogs lta bur skyil mo bkrung ba tsas hA bting ba de la shar phyogs u bltas te 'dug nas/ lus
201a7(mdo): drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'di 'dra bI yid dam brtan po byas so// stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang rung // pags pa nus pa ga rnams bshigs kyang rung // bskal dmang rnyed dka'
201a8(mdo): byang chub ma thob par// stand 'di las ni lus bskyod myi bya'o// byang chub snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
201a9(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / 'dod pa pyod pa drug gi lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa myi 'byung grang snyam ste/ shar phyogs logs su gnas par gyur da to// de bzhin du lho dang /
201b1(mdo): nub dang / byang phyogs kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs par gyur da to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung
201b2(mdo): nasa'od des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs myed dpag tu myed pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur da to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin
201b3(mdo): gshegs pa dri ma myed pa'i 'od kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma myed par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul pas byang chub sems dpa'
201b4(mdo): bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor da cing mdun du ba dar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ka la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod
201b5(mdo): pa'i las kyi phyirade'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba de ste/ bu byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas/ phyogs/ bcur nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
201b6(mdo): cad 'khor gyi 'khyams bye dUr+ya sngon po dag pa las byas pa gcig tu bstand to// 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams can kyi mdun tu yang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po
201b7(mdo): la 'dug par bstan to// sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston cing / sems cad tshul du shis pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di su zhig/ 'di ltar rnam par
201b8(mdo): mdzes pa'i sems can 'di su zhig ces 'dze ra to// sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang srul te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag gis
201b9(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// ci yang myed pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yini bag chags bcas bton pa// gang kase lus las 'od phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni myed par
202a1(mdo): byas// gang gis bsod nams ting 'dzind ye shes tshogs ni bskald pa mang por kun spel pa// shag kya thub pa thub chen dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin
202a2(mdo): gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs brtsegs pa kun tu stond pa zhes bya ba/ 'od des bskul bas
202a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa'i dag gis yongs su bskor da cing mdun tu mngard te/ byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyind nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod
202a4(mdo): pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad mdze rad te/ gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs
202a5(mdo): bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di sdang bar gyurd pa 'di su'i 'bras bu ne sa 'dzed to// de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshigs su ba cad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rin po che dang spos gdugs stong
202a6(mdo): phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag/ byams pa'i yid kyis do zla myed pa bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la yul// de'i sa mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred myed bu'i mthul ldan pa// yon tan mnga' ba byang
202a7(mdo): chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa mye tog gi 'phreng ba dang / nags tshal gyi 'phreng ba mye tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyend pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
202a8(mdo): khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo'idre bcar zhes bya ba 'od des bskul pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor
202a9(mdo): cing mdun du bdard te/ byang chub kyi snying po gas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i dA ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan po'i
202b1(mdo): 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de na phyogs bcu'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dze rad te/ 'od kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di u'i yin zhes 'jed to// de nas rin po che'i
202b2(mdo): dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo po// rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dka' rin chen tog/ rin chen dam pa rin chen grags pa de chos dgas// dkon mchog gsum po rgyun myi 'chad pa'i 'tshon
202b3(mdo): 'grus brnyes// byang bachub mchog brnyes gyurd te de'i mchod pa 'di// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nyi bu zild du drag par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma 'jo/
202b4(mdo): bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul pas byang chub sems dpa' grang ba las/ 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun tu
202b5(mdo): bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems da pa' ka la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la/ mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
202b6(mdo): thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed pa de snyed 'khor gyi khyams der kun tu bstan to// de na byang chub sems dpa' zha gcig 'di skad mdze rad to// bkod pa rnam
202b7(mdo): 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dze rad to// de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis bsod nams ye shes shi nad tu mang pos yus ni rnam sbyangs shing // gang gis brtul
202b8(mdo): shugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag spangs la// gang gis khrel yod mos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa// de ni zhing rgyal drung gshegs shag kya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed de//
202b9(mdo): de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po sdang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon
203a1(mdo): tan gyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'od des bskul pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor da cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ka la ba dang / byang chub
203a2(mdo): sems dpa' ga la der song ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa 'tshegs pa mngon par sprul da te/
203a3(mdo): khang pa brtsegs pa de lus tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // / gang gi yon tan dag gis sgra dang lha myin dang // gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag rtag tu yon tan bskos// yon tan can de yon tan ldan gyi
203a4(mdo): rgyal rigs skyes// yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gi rlung / bzhugs// de nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mchis na de bzhin pa/ shegs pa'i rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rte
203a5(mdo): gyi thams rin po che 'byung bar/ byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bsku la pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa
203a6(mdo): dag gis yongs su bskor da cing mdun du bdard te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der so pa ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpal la mchod pa'i las
203a7(mdo): kyi phyir 'khor gyi khyams der rin po che'i mkha' rten grangs myed dpag tu myed pa mngon par srul da te/ rin po che li mkha' rten de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rgya mtshor bcas po'i sa dang
203a8(mdo): de bzhin rin chen rnams dag dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mchog dang zung dang bzhon pa mkha' rten brgya dang // me tog 'phreng ba mdzes dang 'dun sa dag dang bskyed mos tshal rnams dang // rkang pa lag
203a9(mdo): pa mgo dang myag btang ba de byang chub snying por 'dug/ de nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan par/ byang chub sems
203b1(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor da cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po
203b2(mdo): ka la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste/ phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang po'i a ga tsu'i srin mngon par sru la da te/ khor gyi khyams der tsan dan sprul
203b3(mdo): gyi snying po'i phyi ma'i char mngon par phab bo// dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'phrin gyi dkyil 'khor de sas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di thung ngo po// rig dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi chos kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad khyab/
203b4(mdo): dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa thob byed/ ra pa 'bebs// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba 'i khri shing tham sa cad bag chags bcas te gcod par gyur// bsam gtan rngu
203b5(mdo): 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas pa dad par byed pa 'byi/ he nad// de nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gsheka/ sa pa'i na po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa// snang ba'i yang
203b6(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas khebs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang
203b7(mdo): 'alas 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor da cing mdun du 'dar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la dang / byang chub sems dpal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ khang pa
203b8(mdo): brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang / rin po che'i mkha' rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mtshan sum bcu ra gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par 'phru la te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzug
203b9(mdo): de dag thams cad kyang sgo'i dang phyi'i mye tog gi 'phreng ba thogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su btud nas/ mye tog gi 'phreng ba sbyangs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang gis sangs rgyas
204a1(mdo): khrag khrig sngon bstod cing // gus dang bcas pas dad pa che bskyed la// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// byang chub snying por byon la ma gos phyag // de nas 'og gi phyogs na de
204a2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par bltas par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba des bskul pas// byang chub sems dpa
204a3(mdo): bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ka la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir byed du r+yal
204a4(mdo): 'khor gyi khyams der/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad ma rnams mngon tu byung bar stand to// pad ma de dag gi snying po la bud myed su sa phyed snang ba/ kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ rgyar
204a5(mdo): thams cad kyis brgyan pa bstand te/ log pa g.yas g.yos na mgul gdub dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gaM do shal las mtshogs pa/ rgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing
204a6(mdo): mye tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi sbyangs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ka ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su lus btud de/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas
204a7(mdo): nyan thos dang // rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud// khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal myed// yon tan ldan pa de la gdud pa byos// de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po sangs
204a8(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'od des bskul pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs
204a9(mdo): su bskor da cing mdun tu bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du
204b1(mdo): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang
204b2(mdo): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / gdul dang / mu tig dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon pa dang / shing ljon pa dang /
204b3(mdo): lo ma dang / mye tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
204b4(mdo): dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' dkyil nas char chen po mngon par ba ba ste/ thams cad dka' ba dang / bde ba skyed kyi/ sems can gang
204b5(mdo): la yang 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod pa myed do// de bzhin du smra/ rad te de la 'di skad ces bya ste// // phyogs bcu de dag rnam// sa nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang // phan pa myed par mchod par byang chub
204b6(mdo): lcags gyur da pa// 'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyis bkod rim dang // ral dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gis dpe' tsam nyon kha cig do shal khrag khrig ra gu dpyad byas te// nam mkha' las
204b7(mdo): mi 'brug ltar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig mkha' las mye tog gzhal myed 'ang ston da cing // cod pan rin chen thogs la gtsug phud 'phyang zhing lpags// kha cig stong pa mtshan myed smon myed mchod brjod cing //
204b8(mdo): sa las seng ge lta bur shi nad tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig sngon chad ma mthong mye tog mdzes 'thor zhing // khyu mchog ci 'dra de 'drang sha nad tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong stond cing // rma bya sta/
204b9(mdo): bu ra mkha' las shi nad tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan 'phreng brjod cing // zla ba lta bur mkha' las shi nad tu rgyas shing lpags// kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od gzer rab 'gyed de// bdud kyi gan
205a1(mdo): rnams thams cad mog yog byed cing lpags// bsod nams tshogs pas gas kha cig dbang po mchod sdong 'dral// dri myed thogs myed byang chub snying po der yang lpags// kha cig mtha' las no su can
205a2(mdo): 'dra ba 'thor// zla ba zla bzangs thang skyes rnam mdzes man da ra// ba ra sha tsam pa ka dang sna mo'i mye tog 'phreng // byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la 'thor// kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod
205a3(mdo): la// sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dka' bar byed cing lpags// kha cig ri bo lhun po la ka na thogs byed la/ bar snang gnas te mye tog skon bu 'thor zhing lhags// kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs nas ni// sa
205a4(mdo): la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags/ kha cig ri na chen mchod sdong sna tshogs thogs nas ni// rgyang ring 'dug ste d+yang chub sems dpa' stond cing lhags// zha cig tshangs pa' wA
205a5(mdo): bur zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te// yid zhir bo zhe gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// de dag ba spu dag las byams dang snying rje dang // dga' dang btang snyoms tshad myed yid 'ong sla
205a6(mdo): byung lhags/ kha cig brgya byin lnga ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi// lha rnams dag gis mdun du nas lcags gyurd cing // de dag byang chub shing drung phyi nad nas zal sbyar da te// brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu
205a7(mdo): rin cen sna tshogs 'thor// kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi sbyong ba ji lta bar// dri za srin po myi 'am ci yis yongs bskord te// klog ltar gsal ba'i me tog cha rad pa 'bebs shing lhags// dri za myi 'am
205a8(mdo): ci'i skad cig brtan pa stong // kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas// mye tog bcas shing mchog ki dri ni rab 'byind la// lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus byed kanas thogs lhags/
205a9(mdo): btud nas sa'i snying po me tog rnams kyang 'thor// kha cig pad ma ud pa la pad ma dkar po rgyas// pad ma'i snying por sum cu sa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas// de 'dra me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu logs te lpags//
205b1(mdo): chags myed yid ldan byang chub sems dpa' ma 'as la bstod// khacig spun po lha bur sus chen bsgyur te lpags// ba snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'do// bo ma thag tu mye tog 'breng ba rnams su mya rang
205b2(mdo): stong gsum dag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed// kha cig myig gnyis 'asreg pa'i bskul pa lta bu dang // de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par stond cing lhags// de dag lus las chos kyi sgo mo yang klag sa
205b3(mdo): de dag thos pas sems can khrig khrig sred pa spong // kha cig mchu ni khyim pa 'dra la bzhin mdzes shing // kha bzhin rdzogs la mya ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags// do shal sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo chas pa 'dra/
205b4(mdo): de la blta bas lha'i tshogs rnams ngoms kyi 'gyur// kha cig rdo rje lta bur gyi phyed lus can te// rkang pas 'og gi chu'i phung po 'gog cing lpags// nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin rgyas snang byed la// 'od byed nyon mongs
205b5(mdo): skyon rnams bcom pa kha cig lhags// kha cig rin po ches brgyan lag na rin cen thogs// zhing mang bye ba stong dag khebs/ par byed cing lpags// sems can ma pal phan dang 'di dang tshis
205b6(mdo): bya phyir// rin cen me tog dam pa dri zhim cha rad pa 'bebs// kha cig gzungs chen rin po che'i mdzod gyurd cing // ba spu nams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod la// spobs par ldan zhing blo
205b7(mdo): gros ldan la blo mchog ldan// rgyags shing rab dregs skye bo rtogs par byed cing lhags// kha cig ri bo lhun po rdza ltar thogs nas ni// rab tu rdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong sgra 'byin sbags// de'i sgra ni phyogs bcun
205b8(mdo): bye ba'i zhing stong ste/ bdud rtsi ma tho ba ston pa do mdado 'tshang rgyar sgrog/ byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu pa'o// / dge slong dge de ltar byang chub sems dang
205b9(mdo): la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang / phyogs bcu dag gi// sangs rgyas
206a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying por der kun
206a2(mdo): tu stand to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba/ bdud sdig can de la bdag gis ma sbran par
206a3(mdo): bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi myi chas/ bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o// de las rnam par rgyal na/ 'dod pa na dpyod pa'i lha la sachog
206a4(mdo): pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang bdud kyi 'khor ma bdud kyi ris lha'i bu sngon dgye ba'i tsha ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis/ nga'i sedra ke'i rnam par rol pa mthong na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
206a5(mdo): byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// dge slong du/ ka de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa de ltar bsams nas// de'i// tshe sbyin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spunas/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
206a6(mdo): thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig phyung ste/ 'od gzer des stong gsum gyi stong chen pol 'jig rten gyi khams 'de thams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad sdang bar byas nas mog
206a7(mdo): mgo por byas te/ rab tu g.yos par yang byas par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang sdang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to// bdud sdig can kyis 'od de
206a8(mdo): sa rnam pa 'di su sgra'i dus rlom so// sems can shin na dag pa bak+kus yang snod kya / bas gnang mas pos rgyas srid dag nir ba spangs te/ ban byed de'i bdud mi mngon par 'dod pas byung //
206a9(mdo): chu ba shing drung 'ongs kyis de ngab sgrim bgyis// de ni bdag kyang rgal la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// de 'i bdag nyid gros pas gzham yang grol bar byed// deni bdag kyang dashugs 'byin gzhan dag shugs kyang 'byin
206b1(mdo): yongs su mya ngan las 'das gzhan yang mya ngan zlo// ngan song gsum po ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur// lA myi rnams kyi grong khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur// phan 'a byed pa de ni 'dud ci thob gyur nas/
206b2(mdo): bsam gtan mngon shes bdud mi bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur// gas zerang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon pab rtse// nag yo 'is lag khyod kyi grong khyer stongs byed 'gyur// spobs byed pas kyang stobs myed 'gyur te dpung
206b3(mdo): nyams 'gyur// phyogs ni phyogs myin ci bya kar 'gro zhes myi 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas/ rmyi lam rnam pa sum bcu ma gnyis rgyas so//
206b4(mdo): rnam pa sum bcu rtsartsa gnyis gang zhi na/ 'di lta ste bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab par myos pa dang / rang gi gnas rdul gyis gang zhing mo dang gsab mas gang bar byis pa dang / bdag nyid sngags skrag
206b5(mdo): nas phyogs phyog su 'bros par phyis pa da/ bdag cod par dang bral zhing nam srung bar phyis pa dang / bdag ma mu dang gre ba dang / dkan skes par skyes pa dang / bdag nyid sti shun tu gdus pa myob pa dang / skyed pos tshas kyi lo la dngabye tog dang 'bras bu nis rnyings pa rtsis pa da/ jing des skyes ter byed pa rtsis pa dang dang
206b6(mdo): dang / khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ka la bying ka dang / ku na la dang / shang shang delu las sotogs pa/ bya'i tshogs rnams a dab gshoka zegs par skyes pa dang / rdza dang dung dang / rdza rnga dang / kha ra rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / pi bang
206b7(mdo): dang rgyud gsum pa dang / pheka dang khar ba'i sil khrol la mtshogs pa rol mo 'chi byad rnams chag grugs de sa la ltung bar myos pa dang / 'khor sdug pas kyang bdud spangs te/ ngo mdzum gnag cing phyogs gcig tu dong
206b8(mdo): nas sems shing 'khod par rgyas pa dang / chung ma'i dam pa 'phreng ba can yang mal nas ma la srung ste/ lag pa gnyis mgo la rdob par gyis pa dang / bdud kyi bu gang dag shi nad tu 'tshon 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shind tu
206b9(mdo): stobs dang ldan la dang / shinang tu gzi' brjid dang ldan pa dang / shin da tu shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dpal sa/ 'dug pa la phyag 'jas par rmis pa dang / bdag
207a1(mdo): gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi bun sab kyi bu srab ces mongs 'debs par skyes pa dang / bdag sum sa shos drim car spyod par byis pa dang / bdag mgo nus kyis gang la skyenu bsed ba me mo dang / nyam chung ba dang mangs
207a2(mdo): nyams par byis pa dang / bsil khang dang / 'ang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rib bgyis pad/ de'i sde dpon dang / gnod sbyir dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / dri za'i bdag po
207a3(mdo): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang / o ma tshugs bcas te ngu zhing cho nges btab nas byer bar rmis pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lho'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ yul 'khor sru pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang
207a4(mdo): myig myi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / thab bral dang / yongs su dka' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dang / dbang sgyur la mtshogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud la myi gus
207a5(mdo): shing / byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rgyas pa dang / zab mo'i nang na de'i ral gyi shubs nas ma phyi nad cing bdag myi shis/ pa'i sgra 'byind par rmis pa dang / rang gi 'khor gyis bdag por
207a6(mdo): bar rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang bram ze myis 'byind kyi bu ya kra s+yai shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmyis pa dang / sgo ba dka' byed kyang kun tu myi dka' ba'i sgra sgrogs par
207a7(mdo): rmis pa dang / nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa'i gnas na kan pa'i dpal lnga ngu bar byis pa dang // bdag gi dbang yang dbang myed par gyur pa rgyas pa dang / rang rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs
207a8(mdo): ma yin par myis pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig ki dra ba rnams kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas thul bar gyis pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par byis pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam
207a9(mdo): yang ltung bar mis pa dang / bdud kyi sde bkod pa thams cad kyang khas bub du skyel bar gyis te/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi myi lam du rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bur gyis so// de
207b1(mdo): ma ba rang 'dzig pa rgyun ldangs nam/ nang gyi thams cad 'ag sa te/ dathung dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang sde dpon dang / rgol dang / de dag 'dus par rig nus/ tsigs su bzad pa 'di dag smras so// bdu
207b2(mdo): des rmyi lam de dag mthong na nyams zag ste/ sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes bya dang // bu rnams dag dpa'akhor rnams gang dag yin la smras// nag po'i a lag de dag kun la yongs su dris// shakakya
207b3(mdo): nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras// lo drug bar du bya dka' brtul shugs drag po spyad// byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu bsgrims shig ces// mdang gsum par snang las ni tshigs bcad de skad grag
207b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas/ mas can bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnam rtog byed// gang tshe bdud / thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg che// des ni ngaganas ma lus stong /
207b5(mdo): par bye bar 'gyur// dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni ram/ dong la// shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong gcig de gzhol bar bya// yan lag bzhi po'i sde rnams myur du lang bsgos// gal te nga la sdug
207b6(mdo): sems myi shol ma byed cig/ dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang // mya ngan 'da' bas bdag dbu pa nyam chu pa yod myi 'gyur// de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur dan
207b7(mdo): ni// bkra ba las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar myi 'chad// dge slong dag de nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas bdud sdig can de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// yab cig ci nongs zhal gyurd cing
207b8(mdo): ni zhal mdog nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nyid lag 'dar // khyod kyis cigs na cig zigs myur du bka' so lang cig/ yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi//
207b9(mdo): rgyal myed bdud smras pa bu cig pa las nyon// ngas ni sdig pa'i rmyi lam shi nad tu myi bzad rmyis// de ring 'khor 'dir de kun ma lus smras na ni// khyod rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu skyel bar 'gyur// ded dpon
208a1(mdo): ha~M/ cis smras pa/ gsad te tha ba dus pab ste rgyal mnongs ma mchis// g.yad te de ni bcom par gyur mdongs dang bcas// kusad te khyod kyi mis lam de 'dra'i gas lags na// bzhag ma dge ste gsum
208a2(mdo): ror yongs su bsdus kyi 'gyur// bdud kyis spras pa/ bsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul ngor grags par gyurd// g.yad te brtan la brten te legs byas bdag cag rgyal// kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas las
208a3(mdo): nas su// kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag myi 'tshal de myi nus// ded dpon gyis smras pa// rgya chen dpung bdog kyang ni shi nad tu mthu chung ste// stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal// g.yad te
208a4(mdo): srid bu s+ye khyer stong gsum gang gyur da kyang // nyi ma kA TIg pu'i zil du drag te 'od kyi bgyid// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis// mkhas dang myi mthun bgyid pa de ni gsol gyi nus/
208a5(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyis/ ded dpon gyi tshig ma/ mnyan nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen po stobs che ba/ thab mo la/ dpa' ba/ 'jigs su rung ba/ spu zing zhes byed nus pa/ lha dang
208a6(mdo): myi rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ma thos pa/ bzhin gyu rad pa/ nam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur nga po'i rnam pa dang ldan ba/ rka lag sbrul brgya stod kyis dkris pa dang ldan pa/ ral gyi dang /
208a7(mdo): mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / sta re dang / rtse gsum kha gdeng dang / bo dang gtun shing dang be con dang / zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa
208a8(mdo): lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa/ mgo dang rga la ka dang / myig log par 'dug pa/ mgo dang myi ka dang / gdong 'bar 'a/ sto dang / rgal ka dbyibs myi sdug pa/ bzhin gzi'i brjid drag po dang ldan pa/ shin tu
208a9(mdo): bzhin bsgyur da cing so gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce stug cing zheng che ba/ mang po 'phyang ba sde 'bar 'bur can/ re sde dang / 'dra ba myi ke mya dang / sbrul nag dug gis rgyas pa'i
208b1(mdo): myig ltar dmar ba dag char bcug ste/ de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug pa skyug/ kha cika ni nam mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho nas phyung ba bzhin tu lag mthil du sbrul gdug pa bzhag ste za/ kha cig ni myi'ig dang khrag dang rga laH
208b2(mdo): dang / mgo dang mkhal a dang / nang krol dang / ngad skyugs la mtshogs pa za/ kha cig ni gzugs sngo bsangs dang / kham pa po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser por 'dug ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs sA/
208b3(mdo): tshogs can/ kha cig ni myig zhigs pa dang / myig khron pa lta bu dang / myig phyung ba lta bu dang / myig 'bar ba dang / myig bzur ba myi sdug pa dang / kha cig ni myig log pa dang / 'bar ba dang / myi sdug pa/ kha cig ni ri
208b4(mdo): 'bar ba thogs ste/ 'gying zhing ri gzhan la zhon te 'ong / 2cig ni shing mthon byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' logs su rgyug cing 'ong / kha cig ni na ba ni phag rna lta bu dang / zhib ma lta bu dang
208b5(mdo): glang po che'i rnga ba lta bu dang 'phyang ba dang / phag rnga lta bur 'dug pa kha cig ni rna ba myed pa/ kha cig ni keng rus mang po srul nas lus rid cing gsus pa che la sna zhom pa/ gsus pa bum pa lta bur
208b6(mdo): 'dug pa/ rkang pa mgo'i thod pa ltar 'dug pa/ pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag skams pa/ rna ba dang / snga dang / rka la ka dang / myi ka dang / mgo' bcad pa/ kha cig ni khrag 'thung 'dod pas/ gcig la gcig mgo
208b7(mdo): gcod pa/ kha cig skragag po dang / spra mye snyan pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / swa phub pa dang ldan la/ hu tu zhes bya ba dang / bi tse zhes bya ba dang / hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byind pa dang / sprugs pa len pa' dang
208b8(mdo): dge sbyong ko'u ta ma 'di gi'i dang chos te 'on cig ces zer ba dang / 'on cig ces zer ba dang / rgyob cig ces zer ba dang / rab tu rgyob cig ces zer ba dang / cings shig ces zer ba dang / zung zhig ces zer ba dang / chod cig
208b9(mdo): zer ba dang / gtubs gi ces zer pa dang / gtogs shig ces zer ba dang / bab bab du 'od cig ces zer ba dag go// kha cig ni wa dang ce spyang dang / phaka dang / bong bu dang / ba yang dang / glang po che dang / rta dang /
209a1(mdo): nga po dang / rgyang dang / ma she nga / ri bong dang / gsag dang / bse dang / ri dgas dang / go zhes sam tshogs pa'i wa gdong sa tshogs 'jigs su rung ba/ sngags pa byed pa kyi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go/
209a2(mdo): kha cig ni seng ka dang / stag dang / phag rgod dang / dred dang / spre'u dang / gzig dang / byi la dang / ra dang / luka dang / sbrul dang / ne'u la dang / nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin bis pa gsod dang / ru sbal dang / bya rog dang / bya
209a3(mdo): rgod dang / shug pa dang / nam mkhal lding pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa dag ko// kha cig ni gzugs myi sdug pa dag go// kha cig ni mgo kacig pa dang / mgo gnyis pa nas// mgo brgya stong gyi bar dang ldan pa dag go//
209a4(mdo): kha cig ni mgo myed pa'o// kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas/ ka pa brgya stong ki bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cika ni lag pa myed pa dag go// kha cig ni rkang pa gcig pa nas/ rkang pa brgya stong gi bar
209a5(mdo): dang ldan pa dag ko// kha cig ni rkang pa myed pa dag ko// 2cig ni rna ba dang / kha dang / sna dang / lte ba'i khung nas sbrul ka dugapa 'byind to// kha tsag ni rab kyi dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung
209a6(mdo): dang / rtse gsum kha ka deng dang / dgra stA dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / rdo rje che gcig pa dang / rdo rje dang / bong dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa la stsogs pa mtshon chag sor zhing gar byed la/ byang chub sems dang /
209a7(mdo): la bsdigs mo byed do// kha cig ni myi'i sor mo bcad nas 'phreng bar brgyus ste thogs so// kha cig kyang rus dang / thod pa dag 'phreng ba lta bur brgyus te thogs so// kha cig ni lus sbrul gdug pas bkris
209a8(mdo): so// kha cig ni mgo la zhugs ling mye can thogs te/ glang po dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he la zhon no// kha cig ni smi tshugs su 'dug la khab lta bu'i sku can drag go// kha cig ni
209a9(mdo): ba lang dang / bong bu dang / phag rgod dang / ne'u le dang / ra dang / sug dang / byil dang / spre'u dang / ce spyang ki spu lta bu dang ldan la/ sbrul gdug pa spyug cing lcags kyi thu lum myed pa dang / mye 'byind pa dang
209b1(mdo): lpags dang / rangs 'bar ba'i chab 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang / sngags kyi bye mtshan po che'i char 'bebs pa dang / sprin nag po bsdus te/ rlung gi char 'bebs pa dang / mda'i 'phrin bsdus te char 'dze
209b2(mdo): pA dang / mun kanag stond pa dang / sgra 'byind cing byang chub sems dpa' logs su rgyug pa dag go// khacig ni zhags pa bskor ba dang / rin po che bsnyil bar byed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug par byed pa dang
209b3(mdo): ri chen po las mchod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po skul ba dang / rgyug pa dang / 'bros pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag 'thor ba dang / lus bskor ba dang / gad mo cher dgod pa dang / brang rdung ba dang / brang la rdob pa
209b4(mdo): mgo bsig pa dang / mgo 'bar zhing skra gyen du 'greng ba dang / phan tshur shugs byung ste/ rgyug cing lnga'i myig lta bus byang chub se mas dpa' la 'jigs par byed do// bud myed rgan mo dag kyang
209b5(mdo): zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/ 'di skad du t+ya dbu/ kyi chud nga'i bu/ longs shig longs la myur du bros shig ces 'dze rang to// srin mo'i gzugs dang / sha za mo'i gzugs dang
209b6(mdo): yi dgas long ba theng po/ bkres pa rid pa lag pa bsgreng ba zha gtsus pa dag kyang ngu zhing 'jigs pa stond to// sngangs par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i mdun na rgyug go// bdud kyi dpung 'dus pa rnam
209b7(mdo): pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad cu kho ra khor yug tu gang bar gyur da to// bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po bye ba phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdig can rnams kyi dpung dag gis thad ka dang /
209b8(mdo): steng gang bar gyurd to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gnod sbyin grul yum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs// srin po yi dgas sha za'i gzugs dang bcas// 'jig rten myi sdug drag gzugs ci snyed pa// thams
209b9(mdo): cad sgyu 'is der ni// mgo gcig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas// mgo stong bar du ldan pa'i gnod sbyin dang / lag cig la ka gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas// lag stong bar du ldan pa rab tu ma nga //
210a1(mdo): rkang cig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas// rkang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang // kha bzhin sngol yus ni ser ba dang // kha bzhin ser la lus ni sngo ba dang // kha bzhin dkar la lus ni gnas
210a2(mdo): pa dang // kha bzhin gnag la us ni dkar ba dang // kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang // de 'dra'i phyag brnyan dag gi dpung yang sbags// stag dang sbrul dang phag gi gdong can dang // glang po dang bong du
210a3(mdo): mo'i gdong // sre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang // de 'dra'i khagadong ldan pa'i dpung rnams lhags// ral pa rdzes la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mang // lug 'go rus pa 'bar 'bur lnga pa can// lus ni
210a4(mdo): mye'i khrag gis rab tu sngags pa gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag der ya pa lhags// rkang pa dag ni dko' ba'i rkang pa 'dral// myig gi 'bras bu spre'u'i myig dang mtshungs// mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche
210a5(mdo): ba 'dra// kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags// lus kyi dbyibs ni srin 'dra ba ste// myig ki 'bras bu gnyis ni/ bar du 'bar// rna ba dag ni ra'i rna ba 'dra// kha gdong de 'dra'i
210a6(mdo): dpung rnams der yang lhags// kha cig dag ni lag na dbyig thogs// tho ba ma dung thung che gsum la ka na thogs// kha ciH/ ri bo lhun po lag na thogs// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs
210a7(mdo): can gnod sbyin lhags// kashol thogs 'khor lo thogs shing myika bsgyur dang // ri che chen po laka na thogs pa dang // rlung dang rdo dang gnas lcags rab 'bebs shing // gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba der
210a8(mdo): lpags// rlung ni rab tu gtong zhing char yang 'bebs// brgya phrag stong gi klog kyang rab tu 'bya ning // 'brug gi sgra yang sgrog cing ljon pa bsgyel// byang chub shing gi lo ma tsam myi g.yo// char pa rab tu
210a9(mdo): 'bebs shing rlung yang gtong // chu bo 'bebs shing chu 'is sa yang gang // de ltar 'jigs su rung ba mtshan mo byung // de'i nub mo sems myed shing yang 'gyel// thams cad dbyibs myi sdug cing gzugs myi
210b1(mdo): stug/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang // yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po// lhun po lta bur sems ni g.yo ba myed// sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmyi lam mtshungs pa dang // sprin dang 'dra/
210b2(mdo): bar chos rnams kun la rtog/ de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog pas na// legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas// gang zhig nga dang nga'i snyam sems shing // dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa//
210b3(mdo): myi mkhas 'dzind pa gnas des mthong nas ni// 'jigs par gyur da cing bdag kyang rab tu myos// shakra kya'i sras pos chos rnams brten byung ba// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du gtogs// nam mkha' lta bu 'i
210b4(mdo): sems dang rab tu ldan// dpung bcas g.yo'i sgyu mthong yang myos pa myed// dge slong dag de ltar btud sdig can ki bu stong pa'o/ dkri nang nas/ ded dpon la mtshogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub
210b5(mdo): sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni/ bdud kyi g.yas// ro lang du 'khod par gyurd to// gang dag bdud kyi phyogs byed// pa de dag ni/ bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol tu 'khod par gyur
210b6(mdo): to// de nas btud sdig can gyis rang gi bu de dag la smras pa/ su bu caka ci 'dra ba'i dpung kyis byang chub sems dpa' gdul ba bya/ de na g.yas rol na bdud kyi shu dred dpon zhes bya bas pa la
210b7(mdo): tshigs su 'acad de smras la// klu'i dbang thog nyid log slong 'dod dang // glang po'i dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang // mi dgas rgyal po gnyid logo slong 'dod pa// deni myur 'di legs gnas spong bar 'dod
210b8(mdo): g.yon rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros ngan pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// bltas pa tsam gyis snying yang rab tu 'gas 'gyur la// 'jig rten dag ni snying po ldan pa la zhi chen 'gas// bdag ni bltams
210b9(mdo): phog na 'gro ba 'chi 'pho ltar// 'tsho bar gyur pa'i mthu ni de la ka la mchis// ka yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa// bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'gas na myi rnams la// bdag bsgrim ci /
211a1(mdo): shes smras snying po ka la yod// gal te bltas pas ri bo lhun po 'jig gyur da kyang // de'i mdun tu khyod ni myig 'byed yod myi nus// gzhan yang myi kang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing /
211a2(mdo): de'i chu ni rngubs te 'thung bar nus gyur da kyi// de'i kha bzhin dri ma myed la mngon gsum du// blta ba de ni de bas sdug bsngal che zhes smras// g.yon rol nas lag brgya pa zhes bya bas smras pa// bdag gi lus
211a3(mdo): 'di lag pa brgya mchis pa// gcig gis kyang ni mda' brgya 'phang bgyis te/ dge sbyong de'i lus ni dashug par bgyi// yab cig bder gyur dam shol khyod gshegs shig/ g.yas rol nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas sbas
211a4(mdo): pa/ ba spu rnams kyang ni phyir lag pa byin// lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod// lag pa re rer de ltar mdung yod kyang // de dag kyis kyu de la rdes myi nus / ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa
211a5(mdo): bsgoms// byams ldan thub pa de'i sku la ni// duka dang mtsho/ na dang mye 'is myi tshugs te// mtshon cha 'phangs pa thams cad mye/ tog 'gyur// gzhan yang mkha' dang sa dang chu la stobs ldan gang
211a6(mdo): myi'am gnod sbyin ral gyi dgra sta thogs// myi dbang bzod pa'i sto bas ldan de drung phyi nang // sa chen stobs ldan de kun stobs chung 'gyur// g.yon rol nas gzil brjid drag shul can zhes bya bas
211a7(mdo): smras pa/ bdag ni de'i lus bzang ki// khong du zhugs de bsreg par gyis// 'brog gi mye ltar chu du yi/ rkang dang bcas pa'i shing yang skams// g.yas rol nas myig bzang kyis smras pa/ khyod ni ri rab sa'i
211a8(mdo): rang zhugs te// thams cad ma lus sreg par nus kyur dkyang // khyed dang 'dra ba gang ka'i bye snyed kyis/ 'i thugs ldan de ni bsreg myi nus// gzhan yang ri bo thams cad 'gul yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po zad
211a9(mdo): kyang srid// nyi zla sa la ltung yang srid// sa ni zhu bar gyur kyang srid// 'jig rten don tu brtson mdzad pa// thugs dam nges par mdzad pa po// byang chub dam pa ma thob par// zhing chen drung nas bzhengs
211b1(mdo): myi srid// g.yon rol nas lag rings kyis bgyings te smras pa// khyod kyi gnas 'dir mchis bzhin du// bdag gi sug pas nyi ma dang // zla ba skar ma rnams kyis gnas// thams cad rab tu mnye' bar bgyi
211b2(mdo): rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po las// tshul du shis par chab kyang blang // yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste// rgya mtsho 'i pha rol dor bar bgyi// yab cig dpung 'di gzhag du gsol// khyod ni thugs ngan che ma mdzad// byang
211b3(mdo): chub shing de drungs phyung ste// sug pas phyogs phyogs gtor bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas dpa' thob pas// spras pa/ kal te byed ni dregs 'byings te// lha dang lha myin dri bar bcas// sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// de dag
211b4(mdo): lag pas phyer rlog kyang // khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni// kang kau bye ma snyed nams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can// de'i ba spu g.yos myi nus// g.yon rol nas 'jigs byed kyis smras pa
211b5(mdo): dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du// yab khyod ci slad rab tu bsnyengs// de la dpung grogs ga la mchis// ji skad khyod 'dir de la bsnyengs// kayas rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis spras pa/ 'jig rten dag
211b6(mdo): ni nyi zla dpung ma mchis// 'khor los sgyur dang seng ge dpung ma a chis// byang chub sems dpa' 'di na dpung ma mchis// 'on rgyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom par spyod// g.yon rol nas glags lhas
211b7(mdo): kyis smras pa// mdung zung ste gsum dbyug to ras kyi ta// glang po shing rtarkang tang ma mchis pa// dge sbyong gcig pu mchis pa de bdag gis// ro mod dkum gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs yab// g.yas rol nas bsod des/
211b8(mdo): brgyad kyis smras pa/ sred myed bu ltar gyi phyed myi shigs sku dang ldan// bzod stobs go mnabs brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gyi mnga'// rnam par thar da gsum gzhon pa zhes rab ga'u lags yab/ bsod nams spobs/
211b9(mdo): kyis de ni bdud kyi dpung las rgyal// g.yon rol nas phyir myi ldog pas smras pa// 'brog mye sA la tshig pa phyir myi ldog// labos pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir myi ldog/ mkha' las rdo rje 'bab pa phyir myi ldog
212a1(mdo): shag kya'i bu las ma rgyal bdag gnas myed// g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis smras pa// gsher ba'i khwa dang 'phrad na me yang ldog// brag gi che mor bab na mda' yang ldog/ rdo rje sar bab de nas gang du 'gro/
212a2(mdo): zhi ba bdud rtsi ma thob de myi ldog/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ yab cig bar snang la ni ri mo bri ber nus kyang gdal// sems can ji snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bsnur nus kyang gdal// yab cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags pas bcing du nus kya
212a3(mdo): gda'// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni bskyod myi nus// g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa// lta ba'i gdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg par gyis// rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang thal bar
212a4(mdo): bgyi/ bdag gis do mod de gnyis thal bar klag par bgyis/ yab cig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su gsol // g.yas ro lad nas don grub kyis smras pa/ 5/ gsad te dug gis 'di kun kang
212a5(mdo): gyur da la// stong gsum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur da kyang // yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis// dug ni dug ma yin pa// ra rab tu 'gyur// srid pa gsum gyi gdug pa drag po ni// 'dod
212a6(mdo): chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti muka ste// de dag de'i sku dang thugs la myed// mkhal la rdzab dang rdul ni myed pa bzhin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang rab tu dag/ sems can kun la byams pi thugs
212a7(mdo): dang ldan// de la mtshon dang dug gis yod myi tshugs// de bas yab cig thams cad bzlog tu gsol// g.yon rol nas dka' ba chags pas smras pa// bdag gis sil snyan stong dag ra ba bgyis te// lha'i bu mo brgyad
212a8(mdo): pa bye stong gis// chags par bgyis te grong khyer mchog tu bkri// 'dod la dka' bar khyod kyi dbang du bgyi// g.yas rol nas chos dgas smras pa// de 'di rtag tu chos la dgas pas dgyes// bsam gtan dgyes
212a9(mdo): shing bdud rtsi don la dges// sems can tha rad par mdzad dang byams la dges// 'dod chags dka' la de ni dgyes myi mdzad// kayon rol nas rlung kyi shugs shes bya bas spras pa// bdag gi shugs kyis nyi zla myid
212b1(mdo): bgyis la// nam mkha' las ni rlung yang rab btang zhing // ya ba cig de mod dge sbyong bzung nas ni// rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras
212b2(mdo): so// ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs drag pa ltar// ka lad te lha dang myi rnams de 'drar gyur da// de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang // zla myed kang zag de la gnod kyi nus// g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo gros kyis spras
212b3(mdo): pa// de 'dra ba'i drag po phal cher gyur da kyang ni// khyod kyi nga rgyal cung zad gzhom myi nus// bkyi ba thams cad mang pos 'grub lags na// gcig pus khyod la ci bkyi smos ci 'tshal// g.yas rol nas eng ge'i blo gros
212b4(mdo): kyis smras pa// sa la seng ge khyus 'khod sngon ma byung // lta ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khyus myi 'khod// gzi'i ldan bden pa pha rol gnon pa po// skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyang khyus myi 'khod// g.yon rol nas
212b5(mdo): thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas smras pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sras/ po 'tshon 'grus dang // shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra sgrogs pa// / tshig 'bar de 'dra' yab kyis sngon gas nad tam// / myur du dge sbyong
212b6(mdo): de ni gzhom du bzhud// g.yas rol nas seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shesabya bas smras pa// nags tshal dag gi khrod na wa mang po// seng ge/ myed pa de na sgra yang sgrog/ seng ges smra bsgrags 'jigs pa thos
212b7(mdo): pa dang // skrag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu 'bros// de ltar bdud bu myi mkhas 'di dag kyang // myi mchog gsung de ma thos de b.ram du// de dag spyi rtos byed cing byung rgyal smra// myi'i seng ges gsung bsgrags bros pa
212b8(mdo): gyurang // g.yon rol nas nyes par bsam pa sems pas smras pa// bdag gis gang bsams myur du 'dir 'grub na// de ni ci smad dpung tshogs 'di myi lta// gang phyir langs te myur du myi 'bros pas// de ni gled pa cho ga
212b9(mdo): ma 'tshal pa// g.yas rol nas don legs par bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa// de ni myi glen pha rol gnon pa ste// khyed cag glen zhing shi nad tu ma bsdams pa// khyed kyis de'i mthu tshal yod myi
213a1(mdo): shes// de'i shes rab stobs kyis thams cad lam// bdud kyi bu ni kang ka'i bye ma snyed// khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu tshal can// de'i 'aspu gcig kyang g.yos myi nus// gsad par bsams
