213a2(mdo): pa myi 'grub smos ci dgos// khyed ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems// gus dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis// 'di ni srid gsum rgyal por gyurd pas na// thab mo ma byed par ni slar log shig// de bzhin du
213a3(mdo): sbyar da te de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs dang / nag po'i phyogs pa stong du tshang ba de dag thams cad kyis so so nas bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras so// de nas bdud sdig can gyi sde dpon bzang po zhes bya ba de
213a4(mdo): bahud sdig can la tshigasu pa de smras pa/ gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang // skyong dang phyi 'i ci'i tshogs rjes dang // lha byin dbang dang sdong dab po zhes// bal mo sbyar te de la phyag 'tshal ra// khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lag+sa pa / tshangs pa 'od gsal lha'i bu nas dang
213a5(mdo): gan yang ris kyi lha nas de dag kun// de la phyag 'tshal ba lta spos ci 'tshal// khyod kyi sras lo shwa rab tsA// stobs dang ldan zhi sI gzhungs pa// de dag byang chub seMs dang la// snying dang mthun 'gyur/ phyag 'tshal lo// dpag tshad brgyad bcur khyab pa'i// gnod
213a6(mdo): sbyin la batshogs bdud dpung 'di// phal cher rab tu dang yid kyis/ kun kyang nyes pa myed la lta// 'jigs su rung zhing drag bsgyur ba / dpung tshogs myi bzad 'di gzigs nas// ngo mtshar ma gyur/
213a7(mdo): zhum myi mnga'// nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur// kang na dpung 'di gnas pa der// wa dang 'ug pa sgra 'byin pa// bya rog bong bu sgra 'byind pas// myu rad du slar ni ldog po'i rigs// byang chub snying por gzigs
213a8(mdo): su gsol// pa ta kun ta ngang pa dang // khu byug ma bya mngon bskor bas// nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung 'di gnas pa der // rdul dang sngag tsha'i char 'bab la// sa dkyil me tog char 'bal pas/
213a9(mdo): bdag gi tshig bzhin ldog pa'i rigs// gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de// shang shong gyurd cing tsher mas gang // sa dkyil dri myed gsar gyur da pas// shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs// ka lad te myi 'dod snga byis pa'i//
213b1(mdo): rmyil de dag mngon sum gyur da// drang srong rnams kyis yul brlag pa// de bzhin dpung 'di thal bar rlog/ rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog/ tshangs pas byin gyis gros byas pa// dan ta ka'i nags tshal tshig/ lo a zhig
213b2(mdo): tu Am skyes// drang srong brtul shugs spyod pa po// dka' thub ldan pa 'jig rten na// ji snyed 'khod pa kun gyi mchog/ 'byung po kun la myi 'tshe 'di// gang gi lus la mtshan rab 'bar// khyim nas kyang ni byung ba de// nyon
213b3(mdo): mongs pham byas 'tshang rgya zhes// khyod kyis sngon chad ma gas nad tam// rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don tu// 'byor pa 'di dag 'di 'dra sprulang // de bas nges par sems can mchog/ sbyin bsreg dam pa len par
213b4(mdo): 'gyur// 'di ni mdzod spu dI myed pa// bye ba khrag khrig zhing du mas// de yis bdag cag mog mog bgyis// bdud dpung des bcom gdon myi 'tshal// srid pa'i tshe nas lha rnams kyis// de'i spyi
213b5(mdo): zug bltar myi nus// nges par gzhan gyis ma bstand par// thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur// ji ltar lhun po 'khor// yu ka dang // nyi zla brgya byin tshangs pa dang // shing ljon rnams
213b6(mdo): dang ri mchog kun// sa dkyil phyag 'tshal bgyid lags na// ba sod nams stobs can shes rab stobs// ye shes stobs can bzod pa'i stobs// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa de// bdud phyogs
213b7(mdo): stobs myed mdzad par nges// glang pos so ma btang sdod dang // seng ges ji ltar wa bcom dang // nyi mas srin bu rtse khyer wAr// bde bar gshegs pas dpung bcom 'gyur// tshig de skad thos pa dang // bdud kyi zhu kun
213b8(mdo): zhig gi nang tu khros nas myig dmar por gyur da te/ spras pa/ khyod ni gcig pu de'i bsngags pa dag/ shinang tu dpag tu myed par 'arjod byed na// gcig pu des ni ci zhig bya bar nus// 'jigs su rung ba dpung rjen
213b9(mdo): ma mthong ngam// de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu bdud rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya bas smras pa// 'jig rten nyi zla seng ge dang // 'khor los sgyur la grogs byed myed// byang chub bzhugs nas nges pa'i// byang chub
214a1(mdo): sems dpa' grogs myi dgos// de ras byang chub sems dpa' sa bdud mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gang mthong bas bdag gi dpung byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i nang du zhugs so snyam du sems shing / bdud/
214a2(mdo): bros par gyur pa dang / bros nas kyang ni yang ma yin no snyam nas/ yang slar log ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phend cing / ri rab tsam gyi mi de dag kyang byang chub

214a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas parabya ba'i phyir/ pad ma mda' ma brgya pa rgyas pa lta bu bzhin bskyod do// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sa lag pa g.yas pas mgo byAH/

214a8(mdo): tog sil mar yang gyur nas/ sa la 'thor ba dang / 'phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas/ byang chub kyi shing brgya nad par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i bkod pa 'byor pa de dag mthong nas/ bdud sdig can

218a1(mdo): pa rings par lhags kyur dwa te// shing gi lcug ma gzhon nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis skyod pa bzhin// kar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing dru ba 'dug marjod par byed// dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos
218a2(mdo): ka'i dus 'di ste// skyes pa dag dang bud myed dga' bar bgyi Ti mun pa rdul yang bcom// zhu byug dang ni dang pa rma bya sgra 'byind bya tshogs rnams kyis gang // 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la da bab bo//
218a3(mdo): bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dka' zhing brtul shugs dka' thub pyod kyurd pa// ri'i rgyal po lta bur mya g.yo nyi me sha ra da ma thag pa'i gzugs// 'brug sgrags lta bur sgra snyan ri dgas dbang pos sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po//
218a4(mdo): 'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa// 2dod pa yod dang dgra dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa// byis pa'i skye bos nye bar ste nad kyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag
218a5(mdo): spangs pa// kang tu bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud ci brnyes pa/ 'idus la bab gyur da kyis// do mo bdud las rgyal te stobs// bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur// sgyu rnams bstan
218a6(mdo): nas spras pa zhal ras pad ma 'dra ba kasan du gsol// khyed ni rgya sa po dbang phyug dam pa sa bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// bud myed dam pa'i tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dag rab tu bgyid gyur
218a7(mdo): na// thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni rtsi bgyis spongs la dka' ba bste nad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa// da ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang myi rnams kyis mchod la// chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs
218a8(mdo): bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// slob dang myi slob bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed// chos kyi dga' bas dga'i yul la nga'i yid ni dga' ma yin// de dag gis smras pa// re shig dar la bab
218a9(mdo): pa ma yol dang po thor bur gyur da pad// khyed ni reg shig snyun gis ma btab myi shis bkres par ma gyur da dang // ci srid dar la bab cing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur da pa// de srid par du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod
218b1(mdo): pa'i dga' ba spyang du gsol// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa// ci srid do yod dal ba dam pa 'chi myed dkon pa rnyed pa dang // ci srid lha dang lha myin grong khyer myi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang // ci srid rga dang
218b2(mdo): dnga'achi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa// de srid pa ni 'jigs myed grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgom par bya// de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i gnas nas sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos bskor pa dang /
218b3(mdo): 'thab 'bral 'thab 'bral rab dang dka' ldan rab dang bdud kyi grong khyer na// lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud myed dbang du gyurd nas 'dod dka' la// rol cing pyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dkris pa rgya chen mdzod
218b4(mdo): byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'dod pa phye'i zil thigs bzhin du myur da la ston dka'i sprin dang mtshungs// klu'i bu mo khro ba lta bur shi nad tu 'jigs par byed pa yin// brgya byin 'thab 'bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag
218b5(mdo): bdud kyi dbang du song // 'phags myin rnams kyis 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su zhig dka'// de dag gis spras pa// shi nga mchog 'di dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing mye tog rgyas 'gyur sa/ shang
218b6(mdo): shang de'u dang khu byug sgra 'byin dpung ba skra 'byin ldan pa gzigs// sa las mA 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing snum la srang lo can mchis pa/ nags mchog myi ci tshogs kyis bstend par na chung rnams / dges par
218b7(mdo): mdzod// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa// lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag tu kyi dbang gis mye tog rgyas// bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lhags// gang zhig dus na sa la skyes pa
218b8(mdo): pa rnams kyang skams par 'gyur// pa 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par s+yad// bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa// zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig pad ma 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can// snyan cing
218b9(mdo): yid du 'ong ba'i tshig ldan so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra// 'di 'dra'i lha'i gnas 'ang dkon na myi'i gnas na ka la mchis// gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes// byang chub sems dpas
219a1(mdo): smras pa// lus ni ngan skyugs myi ka tsang srin bu'i rigs kyis gang ba shig shig po// myur du shes shing 'jig pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong // rgyu bar bcas dang myi rgyu ba'i 'gro la bde ba
219a2(mdo): mchog byed pa// go 'phang 'chi 'pho myed pas skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya// de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu mal drug bcu rtsa bzhi myong bar 'gyur ba ste// rkang rngub gser gyi phag ska 'khrol zhing kos kyang shag shika
219a3(mdo): byas nas ni// 'dod pa'i mda' yis phog pa rgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di skad smras// jo bo khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bstend myi bgyi// srid pa kun gyi nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad smras
219a4(mdo): 'dod pa ral gyi mdu thung che gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi spu kri 'dra// sbrul gyi mgo dang e mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pas na// bud myed yon tan 'phrog pas de phyir nga yis bud myed tshogs rnams spangs// bud myed yon tan
219a5(mdo): rnam pa mang pos khrag khrig bye ba de dag kise// gang gi tshe na glang po phrug ku'i stabs can de brjod ma nus tshe// ngo che skyengs nas thub pa/ li rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// dka' zhing mgu la
219a6(mdo): bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas// pad ma dri ma n+ye da pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lta bu'i zhal// mar gyis sbyin sre/ gyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba// srid pa brgyan
219a7(mdo): s+yad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur da cig/ bdag nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol// de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shing dang tsam pa ka 'dA na ma mang bstod// mchog tu gyur
219a8(mdo): pa'i ri ltar myi g.yo' ba la bskor ba byas nas ni// song ste pha'i rkang la mgo bos phyag 'di skad cig kyang sbas// yab cig lha dang myi'i bla ma de la khong khro spangs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad ma'i
219a9(mdo): 'dab ma 'dra ba'i myig gis blta/ de ni chags pas skye bo myi blta de la khro gnyer ma mchis lags// lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla lhung bar 'gyur yang gda'// srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud
219b1(mdo): myed rnams kyi dbang myi 'gyur// de nas 'dud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos na de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid myi 'de la yid ma rangs shing / tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa// kye myi shes shing /
219b2(mdo): glen de khyed kyi gzugs dang kha rod ma mthong ngam/ ci ltar gyur da na de byang chub kyi snying po las bslang bar ma nus// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis rang gi pha la tshig su bcwa bas smras pa/ snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma
219b3(mdo): mchis te// gsang ba chen po lta yang sdang ba mchis ma lags// spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis// lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shind tu zab// bud myed nongs pa rgya chen the tso
219b4(mdo): ma mchis rtogs// 'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags kas ma mchis// gang zhig de'i sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba// lha yul myi yul 'di na lha myi de ma mchis// de la bud myed sku
219b5(mdo): rnams gas lags bstan dan yab/ chags bcas gang lags de 'i snying khu 'gyur rigs na// de dag mthong yang de'i sems ni gtsi ga ma g.yos// ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni myi lagayol mchis
219b6(mdo): bsod nams gzi'i brjid brgyas bltam yon tan gzi' brjid rdzogs bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul shugs pyod// lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag dge/ de dag de'i rkang pa
219b7(mdo): mgos gtugs phyag kyang 'tshal// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa thob gyur da nges// yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa myi 'tshal te/
219b8(mdo): stobs ldan de dang 'thab par sbyor 'di tshogs rab tshe// yab cig mkhal la nor bu rin chen gtsug phud can// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gus par gnas// rin cen 'byung gnas yan lag mye tog
219b9(mdo): 'phreng bas brgya nad// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs// gang dag sems pa mchis dang gang dag sems ma mchis// shing ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkhal sdang dbang po dag/ yon tan
220a1(mdo): ri bo mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las/ yab cig do mod slar log na ni legs pa 'dra// gzhan yang kang gi pha mthar myi phyinang der ni rgyal myi bgyi// gang zhig caca nas myi phyi nad de ni brko myi bgyi// kapal bcwo
220a2(mdo): pa yang gsol de ni dkrug myi bgyi// gang gis yid myi bde bar 'gyur ba de myi bgyi// dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste dpal ldan dang / 'phel mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / ma'as ma
220a3(mdo): dang / mdangs stobs dang / bden smra dang / ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas/ dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/ mngon tu bstod par byed de/ seMs
220a4(mdo): can dag pa khyod ni dkung sla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o// blo rnam par dag pa khyod ni gdugs dang po sha rad pa ltar lhang nge'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni chab kyi nang nas pad ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o// seMs
220a5(mdo): can dag pa khyod ni nags 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes// pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni 'khor yug ki ri ltar mngon par
220a6(mdo): 'phags pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po ches bltam zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nim mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o//
220a7(mdo): sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur da cing thugs shind tu brtan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni mtsho ma dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa myi mnga'o// sems can dam
220a8(mdo): pa khyod ni rlung mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rtag tu myi chags shing / thugs gnas ma mchis pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' bo/
220a9(mdo): sems cadan dam pa khyod ni sred myed kyi bu ltar thub par dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las myi bzhengs pas dam bcas pa brtan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni dang
220b1(mdo): po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar myi ldog pa'o// sems cad dam pa khyod ni ring por gyi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan pa 'byon pas/ brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi zhing /
220b2(mdo): kyi lha mo rnams kyis dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpal 'phel bar byed do// dge slong dag len gnas gtsa pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de/ rnam pa thaH
220b3(mdo): drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sdig can mi khrung khrur rgan po ltar sems khongs su chud cing dmas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni glang po rgan po 'dam du bying ba ltar nyam chung ba'o// sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor zhas ches pa pham pa ltar
220b4(mdo): gcig pur gyurd pa'o// sdig can khyod na nad kyis nyen pa 'gro ka tu bor ba ltar gnyis su myed pa'o// sdig can khyod na gling bu kha la gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs myed pa'o// sdig can khyod ni shing
220b5(mdo): rlung kyis btab pa ltar skye la pa'o// sdig can khyod ni 'dron pa lam stor pa ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni myi/ dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman pa'o// sdig can
220b6(mdo): khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor smra ba'o// sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa myi bzo' ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zild kyis gnon pa 'o// sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros
220b7(mdo): par 'gyur ba'o// sdig car khyod ni rnam par 'thor rlung gis gtor da pa'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig cad khyod ni sprang po bzos rnams zad pa ltar dus myi shes pa'o// sdig can khyod ni sdod chag pa rdul gyis gang
220b8(mdo): ded pang spang bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sprul la bab pa ltar de ba char gcod par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni myo na/ lag bcad pa skar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o// dge slong
220b9(mdo): dag da ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyams smad pa byas so// dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi snyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par
221a1(mdo): byed de/ bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni dpa' bos pha rol kyi sde bcom pa ltar byang chub sems dpa'as do mod pham par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni gyad stobs chu du la kyang stobs chen po
221a2(mdo): bab pa ltar/ de mod byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni srin bu A khyer la nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpa' sa zi lad kyis gnon par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod
221a3(mdo): ri phub ma spar gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni wal seng ge bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpa spangs par byas pa 'gyur ro//
221a4(mdo): sdig can khyod ni shong sa la chen po nas bcad pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni myi mdze' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpa' sa brlag
221a5(mdo): par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ba rjes kyi chu la nyi tshan chen po bab/ pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas/ par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni myi g.yon can gsad par byas pa
221a6(mdo): shor ba ltar/ de mod byang chub sems dpas bros par byed par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni mye'i tsha bas bung ba'i khyu ltar/ de mod bya chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can
221a7(mdo): khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du 'jug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po mdab ma bregs pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas seM sa yongs su
221a8(mdo): chud par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni 'brog dkon par lam rgyakas chad pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas 'phongs par bya la 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems
221a9(mdo): dpas smre sngags 'don tu bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni sreg pa'i bskal pas hA dang / nags tshal ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas rnyings par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ro'i rtse mo la rdo rje
221b1(mdo): bab pa ltarade mod byang chub sems dpas bsnyil bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed
221b2(mdo): kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha'i tshogs kyis yang dag bskul ba thos kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur da te// slong zhing rgyob cig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig/
221b3(mdo): 'di ni rang nyid rgal nas nga'i yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur// langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad myed ces smra// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ri'i rgyal po lhun po
221b4(mdo): gnas nas g.yo srid 'gro ba thams cad myed 'gyur srid// skAradama'i tshogs rnaMs thams cad zla bar bcas pa mkha' las salhung yang srid// sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur
221b5(mdo): srid rgya mtsho chen po skams srid kyi// pa 'dra'i zhing gi rgyal po'i// drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yang myi srid// bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang // lha dang
221b6(mdo): lha myin tshogs bcas myi dang dud 'gro rnams// kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du 'gyur// kho bo'i yul na 'dug pa langs la tshig bzhin gyis// byang chub sems dpas smras pa
221b7(mdo): gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang myin// yang dag bltos pa yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin// gald te ngan 'gror myi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug/ dbang byed khyod ni ste bzhin byang chub ngas
221b8(mdo): thob 'gyur// bdud kyis sbas pa/ dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig pu dkon par ci zhig byed// khyod kyis gang btsal de dang 'phrad par sla ma yin// rab 'gro shes ldam lus mtshogs dka' thub rab bsgrims kyang //
221b9(mdo): go 'phang mchog de ma thob myi 'gyur khyod ci smos// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa// khro ba'i zil gnon blo dang lha yul 'dod pa dang // bdag la rtag dang myi rtag snyam du gnas pa dang // yul du 'gro bas thar
222a1(mdo): snyam gnas pa'i// drang srong myi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub spyad// de dag yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes bu smra// khyab dang phyogs gcig ches dang kha cig rtag ces smra// lus can lus
222a2(mdo): myin yon tan myin dang yon tan can// byed pa po dang byed po myin zhes gzhan dag mdzer// stan 'di 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pa sde dpung bcas// khyod pham byas ste byang chub rdul myed deng thob nas// 'gro ba 'di
222a3(mdo): la 'byung dang byu ba dang mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal zhi ba'i bsil ba'i dngos po bstand par bya// bdud ni 'khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du chub pa'i tshig tu smras pa// dge sbyong 'di zung shig/ gcig pu dgon par
222a4(mdo): bor bar gyur da pa 'di ni nga'i mdun nas zung la song ste myur du dbang ru gyis// nga'i khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phru gas su chu ka ste sgo ba byed du chug/ stug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnam
222a5(mdo): pa mang po 'don cing lha'i khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mtho// dbyos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// nam mkha' la ni// ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs cha cha ris ris phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang
222a6(mdo): srid// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni myi yis rab tu bsgribs te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid// nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rig ra ba'i byed byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed
222a7(mdo): par nus srid kyi// khyod dang 'dra ba'i rab tu mang po bkrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyod nus myi 'gyur// bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer// dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra 'byin yang /
222a8(mdo): bdud dpung ni nad tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni// kyi hud bu sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur da ces zer// 'dzam krung gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar ser// shi nad tu gzhon nu lha myis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os/
222a9(mdo): khyod deng g.yul ngo chen por rab tu brlag 'gyur te// dbang po lha myin lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bying ka'i sgra skad kyis// bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin cho gas de la smras//
222b1(mdo): myi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa// de ni shing mchog drung nus pa 'dra slong bar 'dod// gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul bgrang dang // gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho mu 'byi nad dang //
222b2(mdo): skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor ba// des kyang shing drung 'dug pa la ni 'tshe myi nus// bdud 'khros sems kyis gnya' shing kang gi bar tsam 'dug/ shugs nas byung ba'i ral gyi rnon po lag na thogs// dge
222b3(mdo): skyong myur longs pa'i bsam pa bzhin du song // 'od ma'i myu gu sngo star de mod bcad da re// byang chub sems dpa' spras pa// gald te stong gsums rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur da la// kun gyi
222b4(mdo): lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba'i ral gyi thogs gyur da kyang // de dag dra'i ba spu bskyod par myi nus pa la gnod byed smos ci dgos// sun 'byi nad ma rings shig dang de'u re brtags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya/
222b5(mdo): rnga mo ban lang chen po mgo dang 'jigs myig dang // myur gdug/ sbrul dang myig gdug myi bzad 'dra ba dag/ mye 'bar kha dog che/ mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing // bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs
222b6(mdo): dang lcags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhid ga tu sgra sgrog cing // rdo rje'i lce dang lcags kyi thu lum char pa 'be sa// ral gyi mdung thung no dang dgra lta dug can 'bebs// sa ni brtog
222b7(mdo): bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms// kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni mda' brgya 'phen// kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang mye yang 'thor// chu skyes chu srin la stsogs pa dag mtsho nas len// kha cika nam mkha'
222b8(mdo): lji du bsgyur nas klu yang 'pher// kha cig khros nas lpags kyi bu lum ra rib tsam// mye 'bar khwa dog me mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen// sa la skyugs nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed// 'og gi chu'i lung
222b9(mdo): po'i chu'ang rnam par 'khrug/ kha cig de'i mdun dang de'i rgyab du mchod // kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchog/ rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la// glog ltar rab tu 'bar ba myig nas mngon
223a1(mdo): tu 'byin// bdud kyi dpung ni bsgyur pa myi sdug byas mthong nas// sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ci bzhin rtog/ 'di la bdud myed stobs myed 'gro myed bdag kyang myed// chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba'i 'jig
223a2(mdo): rten gsum po 'khor// myig dang skyes pa bud myed myed cing bdag gi myed// rna dang sna dang de bzhin sde dang de bzhin lus// chos 'di byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang bral// brten nas skye ste nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong //
223a3(mdo): bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shi nad tu stong zhe na// 'dul 'thun gnod sbyin nges pa gang yin de dag gis// lag pa'i mtshon cha mye tog 'phreng bar mthong 'gyur ces// rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te// de'i
223a4(mdo): laka mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog spras pa// sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes chibs stong 'khor lo can// 'dze gling gser 'bar 'dra ba bsod nams dkris bstend pas// tshul tu shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs
223a5(mdo): mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas// tshig tu smras pa sa 'di nga'i dbang yin te// ngas ni sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khri/ ka sna tshogs byas// slong la myi sbyin snyam ste don myed gzhar ma
223a6(mdo): byas// chu dang mye dang rlung ni nga'i dbang yin te// tshangs pa skye dgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang // kang dag phyogs bcu dka na bzhug sa pa'i sangs rgyas dang // bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub yan
223a7(mdo): lag 'phags pa dbang // sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga'i dbang // brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtad de bzhin shes rab dang // tshad myed bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga'i dbang // rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams
223a8(mdo): cad nga'i dbang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ses can mtha' dag ji snyed pa// de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang // gtan pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa sdoms kyang ni// de dag nga'i ba spu brgya'i
223a9(mdo): char myi phod// de yis tshul du shis par lag pa sa la brda bas// khar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur da// bdud kyi sgra thos nas ni sa la skye la 'gyur te// nag po'i ra lag rgyob shig zung shig sgra yang
223b1(mdo): thos// lus la rdul byung gzi' brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog 'gyur// rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur// brang chung chod nges 'don cing 'jigs nyen mgon yang myed// bdud kyi yid 'khrul/
223b2(mdo): gyurd cing sems ni myos par gyur pa// glang po rta dang bzhon pa shing rta sa la lhung // srin po grul bum dag dang sha za sngangs shing rgyug/ mgo rmongs lam myi rnyed cing gnas myed skabs kyang myed// rlung btab nags myes bya
223b3(mdo): ltar bltas nas song bar gyur da// pha ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag/ gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes dri bar byed// de'i rkyen kyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing chod// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur da te mtsho ba'i skabs kyang mye
223b4(mdo): bdud dpung rgya che mang ba myi 'khrugs rnyed pa de// thams cad rnam par 'thor cing tha dkur gyes gyur da te// zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur da// mthong nas smras pa gsad te gson na dga' zhes 'dze rad/
223b5(mdo): shing gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas// chu'i bum pa thogs te na ka po'i \u0f7f lag gtor // mya rang tu longs la phyi shol ma byed rkyend du song / bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur da pa yin// bdud kyis spras/
223b6(mdo): pa// bdag gi bu'i snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te// sems can shind tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na// sdug bsngal 'jigs phongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang // cir myi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid
223b7(mdo): bdag gis thob// lha mos smras pa// de myi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa myed la nyes byed pa// de ni nyes dang sdug bsngal ba dang phongs pa dang // cir mya rung ba'i bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang // gsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma
223b8(mdo): rnyed par 'gyur// lha dang lha myin mkha' lding myi ci srin po'i dbangapa// tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og myin bcas pa dag/ 'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i dpung bcom pas// 'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de'i rgyal ba brjod
223b9(mdo): rgyan 'phreng chu bo zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul// mye tog a ka ru dang rgya spos tsan dan phye char 'bebs// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu bkrol ba byed cing tshig brjod pa// dpa' bo dgra tshogs rgyal rnams khyod la dga'
224a1(mdo): pa mdzad par 'gyur// bstan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs// rgya chen phan mdzad dpa' bo do mod byang chub brnyes// stobs bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag rig pa dang // sangs rgyas
224a2(mdo): yul rnams thams cad do mod brnyes par 'gyur// bdud 'dul ched du 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs al sus mthong ba// bye ba sum bcu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi//
224a3(mdo): de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon // bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes ste/ nyi shu ka cig pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom
224a4(mdo): ba dgra btul ba g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ga dan bsgreng bas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod
224a5(mdo): pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can// bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par bya ste gnas so// de rtog pa dang // dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste// sems kyi rgyud gcig
224a6(mdo): du gyur da pas// rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa ting nge 'dzin de las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can gsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par bya ste gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags bral bas btang snyos
224a7(mdo): la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa 'de ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum
224a8(mdo): pa rdzogs par byas ste gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba btang snyoms dang / dran pa yongs
224a9(mdo): su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi par rdzogs par bya ste gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa// yongs su byang ba 'od gsal ba nyon mongs pa myed pa/ nye ba'i
224b1(mdo): nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa las su rung bar gnas pa/ myi g.yo bar gyur pas// nam gyi cha stod la lha'i myig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtor to//
224b2(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i myig yongs su dag pa/ myi'i las zhi nang tu 'das pa/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha don ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa nas mthong ngo // las jis
224b3(mdo): babazhin du rlo ma'i sems can rnams kyang ste/ kye ma sems can 'di dag sus kyis nyes pas spyad bu dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad ba dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la bskur ba 'debs
224b4(mdo): log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par blta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung gi sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag na
224b5(mdo): sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par 'khyad pa dang ldan pa dag ko 'phags pa rnams la bskur pa myi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste
224b6(mdo): de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus ni gnas bde 'gro mtho' ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyurabadag ces bya bar rab tu shes so// de ltar lha'i khyig rnam par
224b7(mdo): dag pa'i myi yis shind su 'das pa/ sems can 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gro ma song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dag dang / las mi pa bzhin
224b8(mdo): du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stong la rig pa mngon sum du byed do// mun pa sel to// sdang ba bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par
224b9(mdo): zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ myi g.yo bar gyur pas/ nam gyi gung thun la
225a1(mdo): sngon gyi gnas rje su drang pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtor to// de bdag dang sems can gzhan dag gi sod gi gnas rnaM pa du ma rjes su dran te/
225a2(mdo): 'di lta ste skye ba gcig dang gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang skye lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /
225a3(mdo): skye ba bye ba dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / skye ba bye ba khraka khrig brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khri ga brgya
225a4(mdo): stong phrag du ma nas/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / chags pa'i bskald pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dag tung rjes su dran no// bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te
225a5(mdo): mying ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur da to// rus ni 'di zhes bya'o// ri gas ni 'di zhes bya'o// kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o// kha zas mi'o/ di lta bu zhig za za'o// tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo// yun
225a6(mdo): ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo // bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che mo zhes bya ba zhig du skye sa so// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes
225a7(mdo): so// de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ sul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur
225a8(mdo): snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa myed pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa las su rung bar gnas pa/ myi g.yo bar gyur da pas/
225a9(mdo): nam gyi cha smad skya reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnga brdung ba'i nam chod tsam na sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa des 'di snyam tu bsams te/ sred pa yod pas
225b1(mdo): lend pa 'byung ste/ lend pa'i rkyend ni sred pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du bsams te/ gang yod pas sred pa byung / sred pa'i rkyen da ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/
225b2(mdo): tshor ba yod pas sred pa 'byung ste/ sred pa'i rkyend ni tshor ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas tshor 'byung / tshor ba'i rkye nad ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du
225b3(mdo): bsams te/ reg pa yod pas tshor ba byung ste/ tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas reg pa byung / reg pa'i rkyen ni gang san snyam nas des 'di
225b4(mdo): snyam du sems te/ skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rkyen ni skye ba ched drug yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug byung / skye mched drug gi rkyen
225b5(mdo): nig pa yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/ mying dang gzug sa yod pas/ skye mched drug byung ste/ skye mched drug gi rkyen ni mying dang gzugs yin no// snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems
225b6(mdo): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas mying dang gzugs byung / mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di ste/ ma du bsams te/ rnam par zhes pa yod pas mngon tu bya ba'i phyir
225b7(mdo): sems mngon par bsgrub cing mngon par gtod te/ de 'dis ma du sems te/ kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chib dang / chi 'pho ba dang kye mug bsngal bar gyur da pa yin na/ 'on kyang rgab dpa nga
225b8(mdo): dang / 'chib las 'tshogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba myi zhes te/ e la 'orga la dben pa dang / 'chi ba las 'tshogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di thams
225b9(mdo): cad zad par bya ba zhes na/ ci ma chung snyam nas de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ka yod pas rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ skye ba yod pas
226a1(mdo): rga zhi byung ste/ rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpal 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye ba byung / skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams te
226a2(mdo): srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byung / srid pa'i rkyend ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams
226a3(mdo): te/ lend pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyen ni le nad pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas lend pa byung // lend pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas
226a4(mdo): des 'di snyam du bsams te/ rnam par shes pa yod pas/ mying dang gzugs byung ste/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod
226a5(mdo): pas rnam par shes pa byung / rnam par shes pa'i rkye nad ni gang yin/ snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'du byed yod pas na// ma par shes pa byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no/
226a6(mdo): snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du se mas te/ gang yod pas 'du byed byung / 'du byed kyi rkyen da ni ga po ye na snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa yod pas
226a7(mdo): 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam mo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa'i rkyend kyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyend kyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i
226a8(mdo): rkyend kyis mying dang gzugs/ mying dang gzugs kyi rkyend kyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyend kyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyend kyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkye nad kyis lend pa
226a9(mdo): lend pa'i rkyend kyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyend kyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyend kyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mya bde' ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur
226b1(mdo): tre/ de ltar sdug bsngas kyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam lo// dge slong dag sngon ma mos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'thung kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed cing yang du byed pas/ bya cu
226b2(mdo): sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ myig skyes/ rig pa skyes// mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// sdang ba byung ngo // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
226b3(mdo): myed pas rga shi myed par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gags snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ skye ba myed na rga shi myed par 'gyur te/ skye ba 'gag pa na shi 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub seMs
226b4(mdo): dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang myed pas skye ba myed par 'gyur gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas des 'di snyam du sems te/ srid pa myed na skye ba myed par 'gyur te/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba
226b5(mdo): 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snya ma du sems te/ kang myed pa zhes bya ba nas// rgyas par sbyard te/ 'du byed myed par 'gyur/ kang 'gags pas 'du byed 'gags
226b6(mdo): snyam pa'i bar du'o// des 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa myed pas 'du byed myed par 'gyur te/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'a du byed 'gag ko// 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'a/
226b7(mdo): go zhes bya ba nas/ skye ba 'gag pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig/
226b8(mdo): 'dri 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i bar du'o// dge slong dag de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed cing yang du byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ myig skyes/ rig pa skyes/ ma
226b9(mdo): be shes pa skyes// yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// sdang ba byung ngo // dge slong dag ngas de'i tshe 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//
227a1(mdo): 'di ni zag pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i zag po
227a2(mdo): 'di ni lta ba'i zag pa'o// 'dir zag pa ma lus par 'gag ko// 'dir zag pa ma lus par gyi sdang bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ma rig pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i
227a3(mdo): 'gog pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i 'gog pa'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni ma rig pa ma lus par myi snang bar 'gyur te/ nub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro// 'di dag ni
227a4(mdo): 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'du byed 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di ni rnam par shes
227a5(mdo): pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rnam/ par shes pa'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di
227a6(mdo): ni mying dang gzugs so// 'di ni mying dang gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni mying dang gzugs 'gog pa'o// 'di ni mying dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba
227a7(mdo): bzhin du shes so// 'di ni skye mched drug go// 'di ni skye mched drug gi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni skye mched drug gakog pa'o// 'di ni skye mched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
227a8(mdo): du shes so// 'di ni reg pa'o// 'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni reg pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni reg par 'gog par 'gro ba'i sdom mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni tshor ba'o/
227a9(mdo): 'di ni tshor ba kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog pa'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni sred pa'o// 'di ni sred pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sred pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sred
227b1(mdo): pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di mi lend pa'o// 'di ni lend bI kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni le nad pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni lend pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni srid pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i kun 'byung
227b2(mdo): // 'di na srid pa 'gog pa'o// 'di na sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni skye ba'o// 'di na skye ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni skye ba'o 'gog pa'o// 'ad ni skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di na
227b3(mdo): rga ba'o// 'di ni rke ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rga ba'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni rga ba'i 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni 'chi ba'o// 'di ni 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni 'chi bI 'gog pa'o// 'di ni/ 'chi ba 'go/
227b4(mdo): par 'gro ba'i lam mo// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di dag ni mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid kyi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po
227b5(mdo): 'ba' zhig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas/ 'gog par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di/ ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o//
227b6(mdo): 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa ra 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha smad skya reng
227b7(mdo): 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rdza brdung ba'i nam chod tsam na/ skyes bu dang skyes bu dam pa dang / skyes bu mchog dang / skyes bu chen po dang / skyes bu khyu mchog dang / skyes bu glang po dang / skyes bu seng ge dang / skyes bu skyes
227b8(mdo): mchog dang / skyes bu dpa' bo dang / skyes bu hrul bod pa dang / skyes bu cang zhes pa dang / skyes bu pad ma dang / skyes bu pad ma dkar po dang / skyes bu ljid khyer ba dang / skyes bu la mo sbyar ba bla ra myed pas 'phags pa 'o/
227b9(mdo): ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / mngon tu bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sems kyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ bla na
228a1(mdo): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rig pa gsum thob bo// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das mngon par
228a2(mdo): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis mye tog gtor cig ces byas so// de na lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus nas/ de dag gis de dag la smras pa// grogs po dag sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
228a3(mdo): rgyas rnams kyang brda mdzad cing marda' mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis brda ma mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor da cig/ dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis
228a4(mdo): su gyurd pa mkhyend nas/ shing ta la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ der zhugs nas lam gyi rgyud ni chad do// rdul ni nye bar zhi ba'o// zag pa ni skams te yang myi zag go// lam ni chad de yang myi
228a5(mdo): 'jug go// 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o zhes// che// da du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog gis gtor da te// de nas lha'i mye
228a6(mdo): tog pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyurd to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mun pa mun dag dang ni bral/ sred pa ni rnam par sbyangs lta ba ni zlog
228a7(mdo): nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par 'khrugs// zug rngu ni phyung / mdud pa ni bkrol/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bsnyal/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng / bag la nyal ba rnams ni bton / chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen pa/
228a8(mdo): yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen / sems can gyi khams ni rnam par bkod/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni bsngags/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni spang
228a9(mdo): nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung/ sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par gzigs// sems can gyi pyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen da/ sems can gyi nad gso' ba ni thugs su chud/ bdud ci'i sman sbyar /
228b1(mdo): pa ni grub/ sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung / sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thard par mdzad pa pon gyur da/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'i 'jog pa por ni gyur da/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por/ de bzhin gshegs/
228b2(mdo): pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs/ rnam par grol ba'i thabs ni brnyes/ thams cad mkhyen dpa' nyid kyi grong khyer du ni zhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par ni 'dres/ chos kyi dbyings thug
228b3(mdo): su chud pa las dbyer myed par ni gyu rang to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir thog ma myed pa'o stsal dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes 'dun pa dang po la byang chub kyi snying po de nyid ni bzhum
228b4(mdo): so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ma zag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad skad cig de dang thang cig de dang
228b5(mdo): yud tsam de la mchog tu bde ba dang ldan bA gyu rad to// 'jig rte/ ra gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar byas nas/ 2// jig rten gyi bar sdig pa sdig pas khyab pa mun nag ces bya ba snga
228b6(mdo): ma bzhin no// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// sdig rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'gul kun tu 'gul
228b7(mdo): kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// chem chem// rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'u ru'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur// kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// sangs
228b8(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ chos kyi dgab pa dag kyang sbyar ro// chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
228b9(mdo): po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khyebs par gyur da te/ rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ste/ de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
229a1(mdo): myed dpag tu myed pa dag snang bar byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams kyang kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur da te/ sems can mkhas pa'i pad ma ye shes kyi mtsho
229a2(mdo): las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa byung ngo // thugs rje chen po'i sprin yang dag par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman gyi chos kyi char 'bebs
229a3(mdo): pa'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu gu skyed pa/ dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnam par 'byi dad par byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur ro// zhes 'dze rad to// de la 'di skad ces bya
229a4(mdo): ste// skyes bu seng ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te// sta nad pa bsam gtan bde ba mngon tu mdzad nas ni// gang tshe stobs pa cus rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur da tshe// phyogs bcu'i sangs
229a5(mdo): rgyas zhing ma bye ba g.yos par gyur // chos 'dod byang chub sem/ sa dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa// zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smas ma bsnyel tam// bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dra
229a6(mdo): shin tu 'jigs dpung de// shes rab bsod nams stobs da nga brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom// khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gdugs rnams bskur// nges pa skyes bu
229a7(mdo): chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul// khyod kyi gnas mchog 'chi myed mya ngan myed pa brnyes// srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa myur du phob// phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyang ste// ka la
229a8(mdo): bing kA'i sgra yis gsung du 'arjod pa ni// bdag cag ji ltar byang chub pol skur khyod sangs rgyas// dper na mar dang mar gi snying khu mtshungs 'dra zhing// dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag mi
229a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs pa mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang / brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang /
229b1(mdo): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / dpa' ba dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sman pa'i mchog dang / zug rtsu 'byind pa chen po dang / seng ge ltar myi snyoms shing spu zing zhes/
229b2(mdo): byed pa myi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shi nad tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas/ drim myi mngal ba// rig pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyend pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las rgal bas pha rol du phyin pa dang / rin po che'i
229b3(mdo): gdugs gcig 'dzind pas rgyal rigs su gyurd pa dang / sdig pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur da pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyu rad pa dang / chags pa thams cad las
229b4(mdo): yang dag par 'das pas/ dge sbyong du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas cang sbra can du gyur pa dang / rgyal mtshan ma bskal bas dpa' ba dang / stobs bcu mngal bas sha nang tu stobs dang ldan pa
229b5(mdo): dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs/ su rdzogs par rig nas/ byang chub kyi snying po logs su phyogs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'di ni
229b6(mdo): shing gi rgyal drung du// bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas// ri rasta bur myi g.yol bzhugs// bsnyems pa myi mngal 'bros myi mdzad// 'dis ni bskald pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa ya si//
229b7(mdo): byang chub dam pa yang dag bslabs// des nga 'di ni de yod mdzes// byang chub dam pa chos ldan// 'di yis bskas pa bye mang du// tshul khrims brtul shugs dka' thub kyis// brgya byin tshangs pa ril tu brlag/
229b8(mdo): 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// bzod pa'i stobs kyi ko mnabs te// sdug bsngal rnams ni deng du blangs// des ni gser mdog 'od dang ldan// 'di yos bsgral pa bye mang du// brtson 'grus stobs dang tshal gyis ni/
229b9(mdo): gzhan dag phyir bsnyil mdzad mdzad de// des ni bdud kyi sde las rgyal// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes kyis// thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod// des ni do mod 'di la mchod//
230a1(mdo): 'di yos bskal pa bye mang du// shes rab dag ni gsan pa bsngags// sems can bye ba phan yang btags// des na byang chub myur tu brnyes// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud/
230a2(mdo): las rgyal// 'di ni lha'i bdud las rgyal// des na mya ngan myi mnga'o// 'di ni shi nid tu lha'i lha// lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i tshe// 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// bsod nams don tu gnyer ba'i zhing // 'chi
230a3(mdo): myed 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa// 'di ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste// 'di la sbyin pa btab na bde// byang chub dam pa thob bar du// bar ma dor ni chud myi za// 'di yis mdzod spu mdzes pa yis// zhing mang bye ba gsal bar bgyi/
230a4(mdo): nyizla dag kyang ba'i tu drag/ sems can rnams la sdang bar gyurd/ 'di'i gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te// gzugs kyi nges pa legs pa'i gzugs// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan pa bzhed// 'jig rten gsum
230a5(mdo): na mchod pa'i 'os// 'di pyad shin tu nam dag ste// zhing na mas dang ni sems can tshogs// sems dang ldan da sems myed/ pa// mang po dag la'ang rang byung gzigs// 'di snyan shi nad tu rna
230a6(mdo): dag ste// lha'i dag dang myi'i dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sgra dang // mtha' yas pa'i sgra rnams gas nad// 'di'i ljags ni yangs pa ste// ka la bying ka'i 'jam dbyangs dang // 'chi myed rab
230a7(mdo): tu zhing 'gro ba'i// chos mi 'di las bdag cig mnyand// bdud kyi sde rnams gzigs kyur da kyang // de'i thugs mi 'khrugs myi mngal// sna'i tshogs rnams gzigs gyur kyang // shind tu thugs gzhungs dges kyi
230a8(mdo): mnga'// 'di yis mtshon dang mda' rnams kyis// bdud kyi sde las rgyal ma lags// bden pa brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// sdang ba'i gyad las 'di rgyal lo// gdan las ma bskyod bzhin du naM// de'i sku las
230a9(mdo): gnod ma byung // de'i skabs u byams myi mnga'// zhe sdang gyur pa'ang mal lags so// kang dag khyod las chos thos nas// bsgrub pa'i bgyid pa 'tshal ba'o// lha dang mya rnams 'di'i dka ni'i// rnyed pa
230b1(mdo): legs par rnyed pa lags// rgyal ba bsod nams gza'i mngal ba// khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis// myi'i zla ba'i khyod 'dra' bar// kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog/ skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pas byang chub
230b2(mdo): sangs rgyas nas// khrag khrig zhing rnams bskyod cing bdud kyang pham mdzad de// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bing ka'i sgra skad kyis// 'dren pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa'i 'di gsungs so// bsod nams rnam spyan
230b3(mdo): bde ste sdug bsngal thams cad sel da// bsod nams ldan pa'i mye'i bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub// bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur da du reg par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po/ 'thob// de bas
230b4(mdo): bsod nams bya bas chog par su zhig 'dzind// bdud mi chos mnyan pas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin // skye bo myed pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzind// sems can don byas pas kyang
230b5(mdo): chog par su zhig 'dzind// byang chub sems dpa' sa lag pa brkyang ste tshig brjod pa// mchod pa byas kyis rang rang dag gi zhing / du deng // kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal
230b6(mdo): nas sna tshogs bkod pa'as rang rab dag gi zhing du dong / dpung rnams phan phun chen po 'byung ba de gzigs nas// bdel bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam par rol da// dpung bcas
230b7(mdo): bdud las rgyal te bdud 'i reg zhig ces// sems can rnams kyis mtshungs myed sems kyis byang chub spo dang // dge' slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub kyi zhing drung na seng ge'i gdam la bzhugs te/
230b8(mdo): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rold pa dpag tu myed pa mdzad de// de dag ni bskal par yang bstand par sra ba ma yin no//
230b9(mdo): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// / sa 'di leg mthil lta bur mnyam par gnas par gyur to// mdab ma' brgya' pa'i rgyas pA 'od dang ldan pa byung // lha rnams brgya stang
231a1(mdo): lha rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud// seng ge sgra'i mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong // stong gsum shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang // ri'i rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying por 'dud// stobs ban+d+ha'i gan du
231a2(mdo): song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud// 'di yang myi'i seng ge byang chub snying por ro la// sku las 'od zer brgya stong dag ni rab bskyed ste// rgyal bri zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zhi// de na skad cig yud tsam myi khom skams par gyur/
231a3(mdo): sems can gang la'ang za ba rgyags sdang gnod pa myed// 'di yang myi'i seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i ro la// nyi zla nor bu mye dang klog ltar lha'i 'od// 'od dang ldan pa'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lham me myin// 'gro ba gang gis kyang ni
231a4(mdo): smyon pa'i gtsug myi mthong // 'di yang myi'i seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i ros da// phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang nam drug gsos// de yis bdud kyi sde rnams shing bal bzhin du dkrugs// bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ni
231a5(mdo): mo gang 'dri ba// 'di yang myi'i seng ge gdan la rol pa lags// mdo/ na par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub kyi
231a6(mdo): snying po sa bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te/ wAtsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab nas/ tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 'jig rten kasal bar
231a7(mdo): mdzad pa byung // 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten ldongs par gyur pa la// nyon mongs spangs pa myig sbyin pa// khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal// bsod nams dag gis dgongs pa rdzogs/
231a8(mdo): dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzogs// khyod ni 'gro ba tshim mdzad 'gyur// sdig pa myi mngal 'dam las rgald// 'go'u ta ma'i tha la bzhugs// sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis// khyer ba rnams kyang
231a9(mdo): skal bar 'gyur// shes rab chen po khyod 'phags ste// 'jig rten dag na zla ma mchis// 'jig rten chos kyis khyod myi gos// chab na mchis pa'i pad ma'i bzhin// 'jig rten rang nas gnyid log 'di//
231b1(mdo): mun pa'i phung pos gtibs pa la// khyod ni shes rab sgron ma yis// rab tu sad par mdzad par spyod// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ride nas ni// nyon mongs nad kyis gzird pa la// nad rnams kun nas thar da mdzad pa/
231b2(mdo): smand pa'i rgyal po yang dag 'byung // 'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas// myi 'om rnams ni stong par 'gyur// lha rnams dang ni myi dag kyang // bde ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// skyes bu khyu mchog nges pa khyod//
231b3(mdo): blta bar gang dag dpa bgyid pa// de dag bskal pa stong rnams su// nam yang ngan 'gror mchil myi 'gyur// gang dag chos nyan gyur pa rnams// de dag mkhas shing nad byed dang // zab dang phung po zad pa dang // 'jigs
231b4(mdo): ba myed pa rnams su gyur da// nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni// kun kyang lend pa ma mchis par// myur nga du rab tu grol gyur te/ dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu 'thob// de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te/
231b5(mdo): sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os// de dag yon phul myi chung ste// / kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags// dge slong dag de ltar gnas ka/ tsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon
231b6(mdo): bar bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod // de nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs
231b7(mdo): pa la/ mye tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cho ga bzhin du mchod nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su
231b8(mdo): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa thugs zab gsung ni shi nad tu snyan// thub mchog tshangs dbyangs klu star gsung snyan mchog// byang chub rab mchog shind tu dam pa brnyes// dbyangs kun mthar/
231b9(mdo): 'byind khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod skyabs khyod klang khyod ni dpung gnyen to// khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad// khyod na smin pa'i dam pa zug rngu 'byin// gso' ba phan mdzad khyod ni dam pa
232a1(mdo): mchog// mar me mdzad pa gzigs ma thag tu khyod// byams dang thugs rje sprin gyis dra ba bsgrubs// mgon po bdud rtsi rgyun ni char phob la// lha dang myi rnams gdung ba zhi bar mdzod// khyod ni srid gsum
232a2(mdo): myi gos pad ma 'dra// khyod na mye ge yo myo skyod lhun po 'dra// khyod ni thugs dam myi g.yo'i rdo rje bzhin// yon tan mchog kun mnga' ste zla ba 'dra// dge slong dag de ltar 'od gsal ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mdo/
232a3(mdo): bar bstod nas zal mo sbyar da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa las mtshogs pa po// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po/
232a4(mdo): la bzhugs pa la nor bu rin po che bye ba khraka khrig brgya stong du mas sA sa pIH/ rin po che'i tra bas bkab ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas na sa/ tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
232a5(mdo): bar bstod do// dge ba dri myed shes rab 'od dpa gzi'i brjid ldan// mtshan gyi dam pa sum bcurartsa gnyis mchog mngal ba// dran dang / ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'// mnyel pa myi mnga'
232a6(mdo): khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// dri gsum dri myi mnga' badra myed dri ma bral// 'jog rten gsum du gnas shing rig pa gsum brnyes pa// rnam par tha rad pa dam pa gsum gyi myig sbyin pa/
232a7(mdo): spyan gsum dri ma myi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dus ngan rnyog pa bsal ba rab tu zhi thugs ldan// thugs pa che thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thub pa dgyes pa 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi ba
232a8(mdo): khyod ni yod gnyis grol bar mdzad pa btang snyoms dges// brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rang 'apyod rnam par dag cing spyod pa'i pha rol phyind// bden pa bzhi po stond pa rnam
232a9(mdo): tha rad dges pa po// grol bar gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang krol mdzad pa// stobs dang btson 'grus ldan pa'i bdun po 'dir lhags pa// shes rab btson 'grus de bzhin byams pas phan mdzad nas// khyod
232b1(mdo): kyis go// 'phang dam pa 'chi ba myed pa brnyes// g.yon can dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu 'am/ tshangs pa las batshogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
232b2(mdo): pa la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar da te de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi dkar po'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gal
232b3(mdo): ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / tha re chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gi
232b4(mdo): mngon par bstod do// khyod stobs shi nad tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung dra ga po bdag cag mngon sum ste// bcud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig gcig la pham par mdzad// khyod ni bzhengs pa
232b5(mdo): ma gyur da sku yang mya g.yo'i gsu yang brjod pa ma mdzad de/ thub pa don kun grub pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyod la bad ka phyag 'tshal// bdud po bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang ga'i
232b6(mdo): bye ma skyed// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing g.yo' ma rus// mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phragadu ma kang ka'i bye ma snyed mdzad de// byang chub shing drung bzhugs
232b7(mdo): pa de na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags// byang chub pyad pa dam pa pyod mdzad tshe ga nad tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang // phangs pa'i sras dang bran po de bzhin skyed mos tshal dang grong khyer dang // yul 'khor grong rdal dag
232b8(mdo): dang rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mol 'khor dang glang po dang // dbu dang spyad dang ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par mdzes// pa ni sangs rgyas kyu rad te bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul khro'i go bgos nas// sems
232b9(mdo): can bye ba khrag khrig mang po sdug bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyurd pa rnams// dam chos gru yis nyid kyis bsgral bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa// khyod kyi smon lam de grub lags te srog chags rnams
233a1(mdo): kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur// smra ba'i khyu mchog 'jig rten myig sbyin mdzad la bstod pa'i bsod nams de// bdag cag thams cad dka' mgu yid gyur da thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du smon pa lam 'debs/
233a2(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs myed yang dag bsgrubs nas ni// de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams cad mkhyenang nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud kyi bu rnams kyis
233a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar da te// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i bu brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor da te mdun du
233a4(mdo): bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dzam bu gling gi gser ki pad ma ga gis mngon par gtor da te/ spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gi sa mngon par bstod do// gsung ni dpyas ma mchis shing ma 'khru lang
233a5(mdo): rnam par ma 'khrugs pa// mum rdul bral zhing 'chi phyed rtogs par thugs su chud par gyur // lha yul myi yul ba'i dpal dang bkye ba ga/ zhal myed 'os// rab tu 'bar bri blo gros ldan la mgo zas phyag 'tshal lo//
233a6(mdo): dka' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs spang ba rdul dang dri ma sel// shi nad tu dag 'ba'i gsung kyis lha dang myi rnams dga' bar mdzod// sku mchog 'od gzer rgyas pa dri me shi nad tu myi mngal bas// lha dang myi'i bdag po
233a7(mdo): bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal// pha rol tshogs rnams rab tu 'jom pa gzhan gyi khyod mkhas pa// lha dang myi'i srid par dag la bgazhan gyi blo se lad pa// shind tu mkhas pa sgo ldan gzhan gyi pyod pa rnam par bye// stobs bcu
233a8(mdo): mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lama'i dang rnam pa rgyu ba mdzod// srid pa 'dzind dang sdug bsngal log 'dzi nad rgya chen 'dor se lad te// lha'i blo gros dul mdzad bzhin du 'dul ba mdzod// zla bzhin du ni mkhru' las phyogs bzhi'i dag tu nAM
233a9(mdo): rgyu ba// srid pa gsum 'dir rmad byung myig dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog/ lha' dang myi'o srid pa dga' yang yul la 'khrul myi mnga'// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i dag la la skyes pa po// 'khor la sgrogs par
233b1(mdo): 'jig rten gsum na khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen lags// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang sgyur las batshogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de
233b2(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor da cing ma dun du bdar te/ de bzhin gshegs
233b3(mdo): pa la dam gyi lnga lngas g.yogs nas/ s+yad snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dri ma nam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi sdang ba yang dka 'phags// gti mug dang ni lha dang ma rig 'joms pa mdzes dang
233b4(mdo): dpal gyis rgyas// log pa'i lam la dga' bI skyes bu 'di dag 'a myed 'god mdzad pa// 'jig rten 'dir 'byung mchod rten ga/ yul pa dang kyi yul pas mchod pa// khyod ni gsol ba'i spad pa mkhas pa bdud 'artsi bde/
233b5(mdo): ba sbyin pa po/ lha dang nyon mongs pa dang ma rig bsngaklas pa sngon kyi bag la nyal// lus can rnams kyi nid kun sngon gyi rgyal ba li la ma kyis seld pa ste// de bas sman pa dam pa 'dren pa khyod mis
233b6(mdo): la rnam par rgyu// nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma rnams dang mye dang de bzhin nor bu dang // brgya byin tshangs pa li 'od rnams dpal sdug spyan sngar lam me a lags te// shes rab snang ba mdzad dang 'od mdzad 'od
233b7(mdo): dang dpal kyis rab tu rgyas// khyod kyi ye shes chad byung mngon sum gyur pas mgo bas phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan bded dang bdes byani gsung // dul 'thugs zhi dbang po yul ba rab tu zhi ba'i zugs
233b8(mdo): ldan pa// ston pa sku dang phyi'i 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba ston mdzad pa// shag kya thub pa myi'i khyu mchog lnga gyis mchod la phyag 'tshal lo// ye zhes mnga' ba ye shes bka' mchod mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa//
233b9(mdo): dri ma gsum pas la rig pa gsum dang rnam par thard gsum stond pa po// thub pa blo gros ji ltar gdul ba skal dang skal myed rab mkhyen pa// stong gsum rmad du byung ba sta myis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
234a1(mdo): dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod ras thal mo sbya ra te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas lha'i
234a2(mdo): bu yongs su dga' ldan/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab ste/
234a3(mdo): spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs te de ni khyod kyis rgya chen chos kyang bshad// khyod kyi bstand pa de na de dung lnga'i bu rnams chos khyod rgyun gyi 'chad// khyod la
234a4(mdo): bsta bas ngoms par myi 'gyum chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed kyi 'gyur// yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten smon ma khyod la mgo dang yid tu sa phyag 'tshal lo'o// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te re rje
234a5(mdo): khyod kyis kyi khom thams cad spangs// gang che byang chub shing drung ba shugs che 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs rab tu ni// gang gi yid du byed byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad// khyod kyi
234a6(mdo): ma de ni rab tu rdzogs kyis 'khor lo rgya chen skya du bskor// chos chas pa dag chos mnyan pa kyi zhe ste// srog chags stong phrag sang ji sdod cing mchis// 'am po gyuche namyur na 'doms gsos/
234a7(mdo): srog chags spyong rnams srid las nal du gsol// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu yongs su dka' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
234a8(mdo): 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sotshogs pa 'thab 'bral gyi lha rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ mye tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug
234a9(mdo): pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ spyan snga nas tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// tshul khrims ting 'dzind de bzhin
234b1(mdo): shes rab kyis// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga la lhag/ chos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// byang chub snying por lha'i sa kang bgyis pas// bkod pa mdzes
234b2(mdo): pa de dag mthong lags te// ji ltar khyod la lha dang phyis mchod pa// de ni gzhan gang la yang 'os ma lags// khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te// gang ga don tu dka' ba mang po 'khyod// sha ning tu gson can sde dang bcas
234b3(mdo): las rgyal// khyod kyis bla na myed pa'i byang chub brnyes// phyogs bcu dag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur // shes rab smon mas 'jig rten gsum pa gsal// khyod rab ba sel bar 'gyur ba ste// 'gro la bla na myed pa'i
234b4(mdo): myig sbyin pa// khyod la bstod pa bskal par brjod kyang ni// khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu'i mtha' ma mchis// yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten rnam par grags// de bzhin gshegs pa khyo / phyag 'tshal 'tshal// de ltar rab
234b5(mdo): 'thab bral la batshogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de ba/ zhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar da te/ de bzhi na gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
234b6(mdo): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byini sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams balhan cig tu me tog dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyas mtshan dang / bdan bkod pa rnams kyis de 'a/
234b7(mdo): gshegs pa la mchod nas// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa ma 'khrul kha nam lo myi mngal rtag tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra// phyogs bcu dag tu ye shes 'od grags bsod nams ngag
234b8(mdo): dang gzi'i brjid ldan pa po// thub pa khyod kyis sngon cad sangs rgyas brgya phrag mtha' yas yang dag mchod pa mdzad// de'i yul de yis byang chub zhing drung bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur // tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting
234b9(mdo): 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal mtshan tog/ rga shi 'jom par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig rten dag la myig sbyin pa// thub pa dri ma gsum dang tha ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba// shag kya khyu mchog 'gro
235a1(mdo): bdag gi chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi// khyod kyi 'tshon 'grus mthu yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur da lags te// shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i
235a2(mdo): stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang // bsod nams de dag bcom ldan 'das khyod byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe na mtha' yas te// stobs dang ldan pa da rang byang chub snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur/
235a3(mdo): dpung tshogs ya thal yas mthong nas dge sbyong rgyal po byang chub snying por bzhugs pa de// nyams par myi 'gyur grang zhes lha rnams thams cad rab tu spangs shing skrag par gyur // khyod ni 'byung po rnaMs kyis bsnyengs par ma gyur sku yang ga yo bar myi mnga' ste// khu I phyag
235a4(mdo): gis brdabs na kun tu g.yos te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur da// ji ltar snga ma rnams kyis seng ge'i khri yi byang chub de pa brnyes gyur da pa// de ltar khyod kyis rje su sangs rgyas mtshungs shing mnye ste gzhan du gyu pa ya ka/ sI kyang ma nye zhing seMs kyang mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis thams cad
235a5(mdo): mkhyen nyid brnyes// des na khyod ni 'jig rten dam par rang / byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing // dge slong dag de ltar/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcurartsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang
235a6(mdo): lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyarang te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug ko// de nas rgyal po chen po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lho'i
235a7(mdo): bu rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyi nad nas/ mye tog a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / snga ma'i mye tog dang / bar sha ka dang / dA nu ska re'i 'phreng ba dang / chun po thogs te lha'i
235a8(mdo): bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas lha'i klu dbyangs lend pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas ste/ tshul dpa'athun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// shi nang tu gsung snyan dbyangs ni yid
235a9(mdo): du mchi// zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dpab// 'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljags ni rab yangs pa// thub mchog dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha myi rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur pa// sgra skad
235b1(mdo): gang dag 'jig rten mchis pa kun// khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung bas na// myi'i sgra skad thams cad zi lad kyis gnon// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs zhi// myi myin dka' ba rnam par dag pa skyed// rnyog
235b2(mdo): pa ma mchis snying gis yoms nas// de kun 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob// khyod ni myi mazhes rnams la brnyas myi mdzad// mkhas pa'i rgyags pas rnams kyang rgyags ma gyur // khyod ni 'gying ba myi mnga' zhum/
235b3(mdo): myi mnga'// rgya mtsho'i dbus nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin// de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten 'byung bas na// myi rnams 'dir ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed// pad ma dpal ltar nor rnams sbyin pa po// de ltar 'jig
235b4(mdo): rten kun la chos sbyin mdzad// de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi las matsogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar da te
235b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'a'o// da // de nas bar sdad kyi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags te/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mchod pa'i/
235b6(mdo): las kyi phyir/ bar snang thams cad rin po che'i dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang // rin po che'i ba dan rnams dang / rin po che dang / dAr kyi lnga ldi dang
235b7(mdo): rin po che'i me tog rna rgyan dang / mu tig gi chun 'khor dang / su tig gi lnga ldi sna tshogs rnams lus phyed phyung ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba dang / zla kam rnams kyis legs par brgya nad nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul
235b8(mdo): lo// phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par sdod do// thub pa mkhal la bdag cag mchis nas ni// 'gro ba'i khyod kun ji bzhin gsal bltas shing // sems can dag pa khyod kyi yod pa bas
235b9(mdo): de ltar khyod kyi thugs gcig 'khrul ma mthong // mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa// myi'i 'dren pa gang dag nam mkha' khyab// 'di ltar de dag nam mkha'i lus lags pas// gzhal myed
236a1(mdo): khang rnams la yang gnod ma mchis// bar snang nas ni mye tog char bab pa// stong chen byung bur rab tu gang gyurd pa// de dag ma lus khyod kyi skur bab kyang // 'bab chu rgya mtshor 'bab pa bzhi
236a2(mdo): ru gyur da// gdugs dang mye tog na rgyan mye tog 'phreng // mye tog tsam pa ka'i lnga ldi dang // rgyan 'phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang mthong // lha'i sa gtor da kyang 'dres par gyu rad ma mchis// bar snang thams can
236a3(mdo): lha'i sa gang gyur da te// 'di la skra tsam bzhag pa'i gnas ma mchis// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa bgyid kyang ni// khyod la rgyags pa 'am ngo mtshar gyur da myi mnga'// de ltar bar snang kyi lha rnams kyis
236a4(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa' la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyard te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas sa bla'i lha
236a5(mdo): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ sa gzhi thams cad legs par phyags te/ byugs nas spos chu sa chag chag btab ste/ mye tog gis chal par bkram nas
236a6(mdo): ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi bla re bris te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do stong gsum rdo rje lta bur myi shigs gnas par gyur da// pa 'dir bkra
236a7(mdo): pa sha dang rus pa rkang skams kyang // byang chub ma re ka da ni 'di nas myi ldang zhes// rdo rje'i gnas kyis de ni byang chub snying por zhugs// gsad te myi'i seng ge khyod kyis stong gsum kun// byin gyis a brlabs na ni gang
236a8(mdo): dag rkang mthil gyis// bye ba'i zhing rnams bskyed pa de ltar shugs che ba// byang chub sems dpa' lpags tshe ma lus zhigs par gyur da// sa phyogs gdu sems can dam pa 'chags pa ni// sa bla'i rnyed pa rgya chen lem
236a9(mdo): bar rnyed// 'jig rten rdul rnams ji snyed khyod kyis snang bar mdzad// stong gsum mchod rten gyur na khyod sku smos mi 'tshal// 'og gi chu'i phung po brgya stong ji snyed dang // sa'i steng na 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba ci snyed pa// stong gsum sa rnams thams
236b1(mdo): cad bdag cag gzung bar bgyi// khyod la kun 'bul ji ltar bzhed bzhin pyad du gsol// gang du khyod ni bzhugs sam chag gam mnald pa dang // go'u ta ma bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po nyan thos dang // chos gtam gsung dang gang yang de
236b2(mdo): dag nyan pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub phyir sde'o// de ltar sa bla'i lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying pos bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar na te// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
236b3(mdo): zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// / mngon par bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu sa gsum pa'o// / dge slong drag de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstod ci
236b4(mdo): skyil mo khrung ma bshigs spyan myi 'dzums par shing gi rgyal po lag zigs shing // bsam gtan dang dga' ba'i zas kyis bde ba myong bar byang chub kyi shing drung du zhag bdun 'das par gyur to// de nas
